Title: Crown Hunt
Description: During the Korean War, soldiers unearth the ancient Korean Silla Dynasty crown jewels. Psychopathic killers steal them. Harriett, eccentric detective, and Don, track the killers across Virginia and Korea to recover the treasure.

Title: Dune
Description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

Title: After We Fell
Description: Just as Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes. Revelations about her family, and then Hardin's, throw everything they knew before in doubt and makes their hard-won future together more difficult to claim.

Title: Cruella
Description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

Title: Infinite
Description: A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

Title: There's Someone Inside Your House
Description: The graduating class at Osborne High is being targeted by a masked assailant, intent on exposing the darkest secret of each victim, and only a group of misfit outsiders can stop the killings.

Title: Fear Street: Part One - 1994
Description: A circle of teenage friends accidentally encounter the ancient evil responsible for a series of brutal murders that have plagued their town for over 300 years. Welcome to Shadyside.

Title: Passing
Description: "Passing" follows the unexpected reunion of two high school friends, whose renewed acquaintance ignites a mutual obsession that threatens both of their carefully constructed realities.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Description: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: No One Gets Out Alive
Description: An immigrant in search of the American dream who, after being forced to take a room in a boarding house, finds herself in a nightmare she can't escape.

Title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
Description: A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.

Title: Chaos Walking
Description: Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

Title: Fear Street: Part Two - 1978
Description: Shadyside, 1978. School's out for summer and the activities at Camp Nightwing are about to begin. But when another Shadysider is possessed with the urge to kill, the fun in the sun becomes a gruesome fight for survival.

Title: Nightbooks
Description: Follows Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories who is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.

Title: Nightmare Alley
Description: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

Title: The Lost Daughter
Description: A woman's beach vacation takes a dark turn when she begins to confront the troubles of her past.

Title: Things Heard & Seen
Description: An artist relocates to the Hudson Valley and begins to suspect that her marriage has a sinister darkness, one that rivals her new home's history.

Title: SAS: Red Notice
Description: A small army of well trained criminals led by Grace Lewis have hijacked a train deep beneath the English Channel.

Title: Cherry
Description: Cherry drifts from college dropout to army medic in Iraq - anchored only by his true love, Emily. But after returning from the war with PTSD, his life spirals into drugs and crime as he struggles to find his place in the world.

Title: Fear Street: Part Three - 1666
Description: The origins of Sarah Fier's curse are finally revealed as history comes full circle on a night that changes the lives of Shadysiders forever.

Title: The Woman in the Window
Description: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

Title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
Description: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

Title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
Description: A pair of interwoven stories set in the past and present follow an ambitious journalist determined to solve the mystery of a forbidden love affair at the center of a trove of secret love letters from 1965.

Title: Without Remorse
Description: An elite Navy SEAL, goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

Title: Fever Dream
Description: It will tell the haunting story of broken souls, toxins, looming environmental and spiritual catastrophes, and the ties that bind a parent to a child.

Title: 12 Mighty Orphans
Description: Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way.

Title: Mothering Sunday
Description: A maid living in post-World War I England secretly plans to meet with the man she loves before he leaves to marry another woman.

Title: Moxie
Description: Inspired by her mom's rebellious past and a confident new friend, a shy 16-year-old publishes an anonymous zine calling out sexism at her school.

Title: The Kissing Booth 3
Description: It's the summer before Elle Evans is set to head off to college, and she has a big decision to make.

Title: The White Tiger
Description: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

Title: Sounds Like Love
Description: Fashion assistant Maca has just about got her life together after a devastating breakup, when Leo, the man who broke her heart returns. Seeking support from best friends, Adriana and Jime, all three will learn love can be complicated.

Title: Lost Illusions
Description: An adaptation of Honoré de Balzac's novel "Lost Illusions".

Title: The Marco Effect
Description: One day Marco discovers a dead man. After learning that Marco may have invaluable information, Commissioner Mørck is determined to find and rescue him.

Title: The Forgiven
Description: The Forgiven takes place over a weekend in the High Atlas Mountains of Morocco, and explores the reverberations of a random accident on the lives of both the local Muslims, and Western visitors to a house party in a grand villa.

Title: Trollhunters: Rise of the Titans
Description: The heroes from the Trollhunters series team-up on an epic adventure to fight the Arcane Order for control over the magic that binds them all.

Title: JJ+E
Description: Two youngsters are raised in the same city, yet they live light years apart, separated economically, socially and culturally. That is until the day they start in the same high school class.

Title: Flora & Ulysses
Description: When Flora rescues a squirrel she names Ulysses, she is amazed to discover he possesses unique superhero powers, which take them on an adventure of humorous complications that ultimately change Flora's life and her outlook forever.

Title: Three Floors
Description: The story of three families living in three apartments in the same bourgeois condominium.

Title: Confessions of an Invisible Girl
Description: When the clever but socially-awkward Tetê joins a new school, she'll do anything to fit in. But the queen bee among her classmates has other ideas.

Title: Bram Stoker's Van Helsing
Description: When his fiancée Lucy falls victim to a mysterious illness, Arthur Holmwood turns to a former rival in her affections - Dr John Seward - for help. Seward calls in his mentor, Professor Van Helsing, who quickly uncovers a terrifying truth.

Title: Everything Went Fine
Description: When André, 85, has a stroke, Emmanuelle hurries to her father's bedside. Sick and half-paralyzed in his hospital bed, he asks Emmanuelle to help him end his life. But how can you honor such a request when it's your own father?

Title: 8-Bit Christmas
Description: In 1980s Chicago, a ten-year-old sets out on a quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation - the latest and greatest video game system.

Title: Dogtanian and the Three Muskehounds
Description: Dogtanian is a young swordsman who dreams of joining the legendary Muskehounds. After proving his skills and earning their trust, he and the Muskehounds must defend the King from the evil Cardinal Richelieu's secret plot to seize power.

Title: Dr. Bird's Advice for Sad Poets
Description: In the emotionally charged, wild and humorous world of sixteen year old James Whitman, we see his struggle to overcome anxiety and depression by seeking advice from Dr. Bird - an imaginary pigeon therapist - in the wake of his sister's disappearance.

Title: Sweet & Sour
Description: Faced with real-world opportunities and challenges, a couple endures the highs and lows of trying to make a long-distance relationship survive.

Title: Dutch
Description: For Dutch, survival is the ultimate score, and power is the deadliest high of all. When he gains control of an African drug lord's stolen heroin business, Dutch quickly makes it the most feared drug empire on the East Coast.

Title: Vengeance Is Mine, All Others Pay Cash
Description: In a society ruled by machismo, a hibernating "bird" becomes a serious matter. In a life of brutality, the sleeping bird is an allegory for a peaceful and serene life, even when the whole world tries desperately to rouse it.

Title: As in Heaven
Description: On a farm in the late 1800s an intense waiting begins when a mother goes into a complicated labour, and 14-year-old Lise must prepare herself for a night that may change her life forever.

Title: School's Out Forever
Description: A 15-year old flees to his school after an apocalyptic event.

Title: Simone
Description: A mysterious, erotic and haunting love story between a writer/professor at Puerto Rico's leading University and an aspiring artist from the immigrant Chinese community.

Title: At the Mountains of Madness
Description: A group of scientists studying climate change discover untold horrors on a disastrous expedition to the Antarctic in September 1992. Inspired by the H.P. Lovecraft short story.

Title: We Couldn't Become Adults
Description: Prodded by a friend request, a forty-something recalls his past relationships from the 90s onward, looking for his vanished hopes and dreams.

Title: Rickshaw Girl
Description: A Bangladeshi girl bravely attempts to help her struggling family by disguising herself as a boy and driving her father's prized rickshaw for much needed extra money. Based on the acclaimed middle-grade novel by Mitali Perkins.

Title: Inu-oh
Description: A fictionalized depiction of the life of Inu-oh ("King Dog"), a 14th-century Japanese performer of music drama at the time of its transition from the folk art of sarugaku ("monkey music") into the formalized traditions of Noh and kyôgen.

Title: Alice in Panchalinadu
Description: The movie revolves around the life of Alice, a resident of Delhi, after she visits her ancestral home in Pachalinadu, an infamous village in Idukki known as the hub for robberies.

Title: The Seeding
Description: The 1st film in a horror trilogy based on the book from AB Gibson.

Title: Geez & Ann
Description: They first met at an alumni event. The first meeting was very memorable for the dreamer Ann and the mysterious Geez.

Title: Candela
Description: The lives of three strangers -A high society girl, a lonely lieutenant and a drag queen cabaret performer- intertwine on the eve of a hurricane following the mysterious death of a young poet and drug dealer.

Title: The Show Must Go On
Description: 5 individuals share how the world of cinema changed their lives until film was deemed obsolete. 10 years later, their friendship, the movie industry and the entire world would be forever altered yet again but now by a deadly pandemic.

Title: Asakusa Kid
Description: Before he hit it big, Takeshi Kitano got his start apprenticing with comedy legend Fukami of Asakusa. But as his star rises, his mentor's declines.

Title: The Heaven None Missed 3
Description: Meirose strives to create heaven in her family, with her husband and their two children. One day, Ray, a man from her past, returns and wants to build his lost paradise with Meirose and Akbar.

Title: By Deception
Description: A promising novelist finds himself trapped in a terrifying reality as he reckons with the notion that a murderer is in his midst.

Title: Prvok, Sampon, Tecka a Karel
Description: Four friends battle their midlife crisis by completing several challenges.

Title: Na mo Naki Sekai no End Roll
Description: Kida and Makoto share a powerful bond. The former outcasts spend a decade fighting to both the apex of the underworld and legit society so that Makoto can propose to a certain rich woman, which would be an epic scheme to change the world.

Title: Gump - pes, který naucil lidi zít
Description: A stray dog named Gump is searching for his place in the human world. He wishes to get a companion, but has to endure several challenges along the way.

Title: The Tender Trap
Description: In 2011 the startling news broke around New Zealand that Sharon Armstrong, a middle-aged grandmother and public servant who worked for the Maori Language Commission had been arrested in Argentina with 5kg of cocaine in her suitcase.

Title: Burns House
Description: A young woman revisits her childhood home, a place with a long history of violent and unnatural deaths.

Title: Gang Gang
Description: Gang Gang is based on the novel by Quanie Cash "Gang Gang". A tale of 4 friends involved in the Opium Epidemic in Tennessee.

Title: Spící mesto
Description: All the parents suddenly fall asleep, and children have to survive in the world. A thrilling adventure showing what can happen when chaos reigns and children are forced to face the pitfalls of the world on their own.

Title: Gaia, Envoy to the Council of the Fourth Dimension
Description: A time-traveling guardian must save Earth

Title: The fall of Usher's house
Description: The main character comes to his childhood friend, not suspecting what awaits him.

Title: 365 Days
Description: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.

Title: The Invisible Man
Description: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

Title: After We Collided
Description: Based on the 2014 romance novel of the same name, this follows the love life of two young adults.

Title: The Witches
Description: A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.

Title: Emma.
Description: In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.

Title: Enola Holmes
Description: When Enola Holmes-Sherlock's teen sister-discovers her mother missing, she sets off to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy around a mysterious young Lord.

Title: Dolittle
Description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

Title: The Dry
Description: Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken hometown to attend a tragic funeral. But his return opens a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

Title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
Description: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."

Title: You Should Have Left
Description: A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.

Title: Rebecca
Description: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

Title: Let Him Go
Description: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Spenser Confidential
Description: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.

Title: The Midnight Sky
Description: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

Title: All the Bright Places
Description: The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

Title: The Call of the Wild
Description: A sled dog struggles for survival in the wilds of the Yukon.

Title: The War with Grandpa
Description: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.

Title: Spontaneous
Description: Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

Title: A Perfect Enemy
Description: A successful architect is approached on his trip to the Paris Airport by a chatty girl. Although the meeting seems fortuitous, soon there be a turn that will transform the encounter into something much more sinister and criminal.

Title: The Rhythm Section
Description: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

Title: Artemis Fowl
Description: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

Title: The Postcard Killings
Description: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

Title: Words on Bathroom Walls
Description: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

Title: Son of the South
Description: The true story of one young white Southerner in the Summer of 1961, caught in a place and time where he had to choose which side he was on.

Title: The Secret Garden
Description: An orphaned girl discovers a magical garden hidden at her strict uncle's estate.

Title: Gabriel's Inferno: Part One
Description: An intriguing exploration of seduction, forbidden love, and redemption, a captivating and passionate tale of one man's escape from his own personal hell as he tries to earn the impossible: forgiveness and love.

Title: The Last Thing He Wanted
Description: A veteran D.C. journalist loses the thread of her own narrative when a guilt-propelled errand for her father thrusts her from byline to unwitting subject in the very story she's trying to break. Adapted from Joan Didion's namesake novel.

Title: Concrete Cowboy
Description: Sent to live with his estranged father for the summer, a rebellious teen finds kinship in a tight-knit Philadelphia community of Black cowboys.

Title: The Kissing Booth 2
Description: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

Title: Summer of 85
Description: French teenager Alexis's boat capsizes, and he is rescued by David, who ends up as his boyfriend.

Title: The Quarry
Description: A drifter (Shea Whigham) kills a traveling preacher and takes his place at a small-town church, but the police chief (Michael Shannon) suspects foul play.

Title: Dragon Rider
Description: A young silver dragon teams up with a mountain spirit and an orphaned boy on a journey through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

Title: Black Beauty
Description: A wild horse and a teenage girl forge an unbreakable bond which keeps them connected for a lifetime.

Title: Stargirl
Description: An unassuming high schooler finds himself inexplicably drawn to the free-spirited new girl, whose unconventional ways change how they see themselves - and each other.

Title: Miss Fisher & the Crypt of Tears
Description: After freeing a young girl from her unjust imprisonment in Jerusalem, Phryne Fisher begins to unravel a mystery concerning priceless emeralds, ancient curses and the truth behind the suspicious disappearance of Shirin's forgotten tribe.

Title: Bad Therapy
Description: A couple seeks out Judy Small, a marriage counselor; but the counselor is more than what meets the eye.

Title: Last and First Men
Description: Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness.

Title: Beasts Clawing at Straws
Description: A struggling restaurant owner, caring for his sick mom, finds a bag of cash in a sauna locker, while a customs officer gets into trouble when his girlfriend runs off with money he borrowed from a loan shark.

Title: Berlin Alexanderplatz
Description: A man from Guinea-Bissau moves to Germany, where he is befriended by a drug dealer and two women.

Title: Turncoat
Description: 1944. Walter Proska is a young Wehrmacht soldier who begins to question the purpose of the war, who the real enemy is and whether his real duty should be to his fatherland or his own conscience.

Title: Gabriel's Inferno: Part Two
Description: Professor Emerson learns the truth about Julia but his realization comes too late. Julia is done waiting for him to remember her and wants nothing more to do with him. Can Gabriel win back her heart before she finds love in another's arms?

Title: Gabriel's Inferno: Part Three
Description: Someone dark returns from Julia's past with bad intentions. Gabriel has secrets he needs to share, but worries that he'll lose everything if he does. Will their relationship weather the test of secrets revealed?

Title: Mama Weed
Description: A translator working for the police gets involved in the other side of drug dealing.

Title: Broil
Description: Broil follows a dysfunctional family vying to control the future of their wealth.

Title: The Speech
Description: A recently dumped man awaits a reconciliation text message from his ex during a seemingly never-ending family dinner.

Title: Altered Carbon: Resleeved
Description: On the planet Latimer, reawakened Takeshi Kovacs must protect a teenage tattooist named Holly while investigating the death of a yakuza boss alongside Gina, a strangely familiar no-nonsense CTAC agent.

Title: Night Shift
Description: Three officers are tasked with escorting an illegal immigrant to Charles de Gaulle airport, where he will be forced onto a plane and sent back to his homeland. But when they find out about the truth, they have to make a difficult choice.

Title: Unknown Origins
Description: Madrid, 2019. A serial killer is spreading chaos. Anonymous people with no apparent connection are being murdered while imitating the first appearances of the most famous superheroes.

Title: Fukushima 50
Description: Workers at the Fukushima Daiichi facility in Japan risk their lives and stay at the nuclear power plant to prevent total destruction after the region is devastated by an earthquake an tsunami in 2011.

Title: The Crickets Dance
Description: Southern attorney Angie Lawrence searches of the rightful owner of a journal recovered from an antebellum home she inherited. The journal is full of mystery and history that just may lead her to the future she has always dreamed of.

Title: Last Words
Description: It is 2085. A young man, one of the few survivors of the human community of old, embarks on a long voyage to find others.

Title: Final Kill
Description: An aging protection specialist takes on one last job before retirement, protecting a couple who stole eight million dollars from a ruthless crime family.

Title: Home Front
Description: In a village where everyone knows everyone, four veterans of the Algerian War are haunted by their past.

Title: Poly
Description: The adventures of Shetland pony Poly, in the South of France.

Title: Appearances
Description: In this psychological thriller, a ridiculed French woman in Vienna seeks to avenge her honor while concealing her efforts from the bourgeois community of fellow expatriates, where lies and slander reign.

Title: Narcissus and Goldmund
Description: Goldmund is to study in the monastery Mariabronn. His father sent him there. There he meets a religious monk named Narcissus. He has subjected himself to a strict life and lives completely ascetically.

Title: Mariposa
Description: Iqbal (Angga Yunanda) is like a Mariposa butterfly to Acha (Adhisty Zara). Each time someone approach, he always runs away. Acha is determined to win Iqbal, a man known to be handsome, smart, yet cold.

Title: One Day We'll Talk About Today
Description: Three siblings live in happy-looking families, but one of them changes and gets warned by his parents, prompting the rebellion of the three siblings which led to the discovery of the secrets and great trauma in their families.

Title: The Time of Indifference
Description: based on the novel by Alberto Moravia.

Title: Small Country: An African Childhood
Description: A touching childhood set during the conflict in Rwanda between ethnicities Hutu and Tutsi - adapted from the book of Gaël Faye.

Title: Die Känguru-Chroniken
Description: Comedy based on the radio comedy and the bestselling books and audio-books by Marc-Uwe Kling.

Title: My Blood & Bones in a Flowing Galaxy
Milea
Description: Milea made the decision to part with Dilan as a warning for Dilan to stay away from the motorcycle gang. But the parting which had been only a bluff for Milea became a parting that lasted until they graduated from college and grew up.

Title: Lassie Come Home
Description: Remake of the 1943 movie based on Eric Knight's book "Lassie Come Home".

Title: Theater
Description: Nagata is the director of a theater troupe. Unfortunately, he is rather unsuccessful on his finances which makes the crew has little confidence in him.

Title: Pirates Down the Street
Description: When pirate family Blunderbuss moves to boring Sandsborough, the neighbors aren't too happy. Michael and his new pirate friend Billy try to get the family to blend in, but then archenemy Crooked Cornelius arrives in town.

Title: Blue, Painful and Brittle
Description: Kaede and Hisano form a club. When Hisano vanishes, Kaede throws himself into bringing change to the club.

Title: 18 Kilohertz
Description: Teenagers in 1990s Almaty witness an unprecedented heroin boom and need to face its deadly consequences.

Title: #FriendButMarried 2
Description: Ayudia (Mawar De Jongh) is not satisfied enough in enjoying the moment as a wife, but she suddenly becomes pregnant. Her personality changes completely and becomes lazy and super sensitive.

Title: Rekindling Christmas
Description: The special time of the year, and the magic of the season is depicted with stirring episodes.

Title: Where No One Knows Us
Description: The deportation of two Chechen refugee children from Austria is temporarily suspended after their mother attempts suicide.But what will happen to the family now?

Title: Japan Sinks: 2020 Theatrical Edition
Description: A massive earthquake destroys Tokyo and upends the tranquil life of siblings Ayumu and Go Muto. Amid the chaos, they attempt to escape the city with their parents, but hour by hour the islands of Japan are sinking, gradually trapping them.

Title: Zombacter: Center City Contagion
Description: An underfunded university professor is on track to build the world's first bio-computer using genetically engineered bacteria when something goes terribly wrong. Now that something is top of the food chain.

Title: Dangerous to Know
Description: A troubled young woman recovers from a suicide attempt in a secluded cabin, but when a series of unexplained and terrifying incidents occur, she realizes someone-or something-has a far darker future planned for her.

Title: Wilson's Silence
Description: Wilson has not said a word in 20 years. Based on the book Wilson's Silence by Walter Isotopes.

Title: Farewell: Comedy of Life Begins with a Lie
Just Speechless
Description: An unspeakable act of betrayal leaves one man silent for 20 years.

Title: Fedora: Opera Film
Description: A very successful theatrical piece is the basis of Fedora by Umberto Giordano.

Title: It Chapter Two
Description: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

Title: Little Women
Description: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

Title: Jojo Rabbit
Description: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

Title: Jumanji: The Next Level
Description: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

Title: Pet Sematary
Description: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

Title: Motherless Brooklyn
Description: In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend.

Title: In the Tall Grass
Description: After hearing a young boy's cry for help, a sister and brother venture into a vast field of tall grass in Kansas but soon discover there may be no way out...and that something evil lurks within.

Title: The Informer
Description: An ex-convict working undercover intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison.

Title: The Goldfinch
Description: A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In a rush of panic, he steals 'The Goldfinch', a painting that eventually draws him into a world of crime.

Title: The Good Liar
Description: Consummate con man Roy Courtnay has set his sights on his latest mark: the recently widowed Betty McLeish, worth millions. But this time, what should have been a simple swindle escalates into a cat-and-mouse game with the ultimate stakes.

Title: The Silence
Description: When the world is under attack from terrifying creatures who hunt their human prey by sound, 16-year old Ally Andrews (Kiernan Shipka), who lost her hearing at 13, and her family seek refuge in a remote haven.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Description: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

Title: First Cow
Description: A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.

Title: True History of the Kelly Gang
Description: Based on Peter Carey's novel. The story of Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s.

Title: Let It Snow
Description: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

Title: Daniel Isn't Real
Description: A troubled college freshman, Luke, suffers a violent family trauma. He then resurrects his charismatic childhood imaginary friend Daniel to help him cope, not realizing how dangerous Daniel is.

Title: The Personal History of David Copperfield
Description: A modern take on Charles Dickens's classic tale of a young orphan who is able to triumph over many obstacles.

Title: Pinocchio
Description: Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits.

Title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
Description: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

Title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
Description: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

Title: Wounds
Description: Disturbing and mysterious things begin to happen to a bartender in New Orleans after he picks up a phone left behind at his bar.

Title: The Aftermath
Description: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

Title: The Wandering Earth
Description: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.

Title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
Description: Hired to steal a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic painters of all time, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

Title: Zeroville
Description: A young ex-communicated seminarian, Ike "Vikar" Jerome, arrives in Los Angeles on the same August day in 1969 that a crazed hippie ''family'' led by Charles Manson commits five savage murders.

Title: The Painted Bird
Description: A young Jewish boy somewhere in Eastern Europe seeks refuge during World War II where he encounters many different characters.

Title: Only the Animals
Description: A woman disappeared. After a snowstorm, her car is discovered on a road to a small remote village. While the police don't know where to start, five people are linked to the disappearance. Each one with his or her own secret.

Title: The Golden Glove
Description: A serial killer strikes fear in the hearts of residents of Hamburg during the early 1970s.

Title: Earthquake Bird
Description: An enigmatic translator with a dark past is brought in for questioning after an ex-pat friend, who came between her and her photographer boyfriend, ends up missing and presumed dead.

Title: The Prince
Description: A '70s-set homoerotic prison drama based on a low-circulated pulp novel, tracking the sexual, often-violent and eventually murderous experiences of 20-something narcissist Jaime.

Title: Oh, Ramona!
Description: A teenager named Andrei transitions from a teenager into an adult.

Title: Native Son
Description: A young African-American living in Chicago enters into a seductive new world of money and power after he is hired as a chauffeur for an affluent businessman.

Title: Into the Labyrinth
Description: Samantha, a young girl who was kidnapped, resurfaces in shock after being imprisoned and hospitalized.

Title: A Dog's Way Home
Description: A female dog travels four hundred miles in search of her owner throughout a Colorado wilderness.

Title: Invisible Life
Description: Kept apart by a terrible lie and a conservative society, two sisters born in Rio de Janeiro make their way through life each believing the other is living out her dreams half a world away.

Title: I Lost My Body
Description: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

Title: Who You Think I Am
Description: Claire, a 50-year-old divorced teacher, creates a fake Facebook profile of a 24-year-old woman. She finds a photo of a pretty young blonde and uses it. She has created an entirely fictional character, but why?

Title: La influencia
Description: After moving back to her family home to care for her dying mother, a nurse haunted by her childhood memories must struggle with an evil force in the house.

Title: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
Description: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

Title: Storm Boy
Description: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.

Title: Held for Ransom
Description: The story of Danish photographer Daniel Rye, who was captured by ISIS in Syria in 2013 and held hostage for 398 days.

Title: Carmilla
Description: An atmospheric, coming-of-age love story steeped in eerie mystery and inspired by the gothic novel of the same name.

Title: Heroic Losers
Description: In times of the infamous Argentinian Corralito, the neighbors of a little town trace a plan to recover the money they lost after learning that their bank manager and a corrupt lawyer have stolen it.

Title: Martin Eden
Description: Martin Eden struggles to rise above his destitute, proletarian circumstances through an intense and passionate pursuit of self-education, hoping to achieve a place among the literary elite.

Title: Adam
Description: Awkward teen Adam spends his last high school summer with his big sister, who throws herself into NYC's lesbian and trans activist scene. In this coming-of-age comedy, Adam and those around him encounter love, friendship and hard truths.

Title: En komikers uppväxt
Description: Novelist Jonas Gardell adapts his own bestseller about growing up in 1970s-era Sweden with its countless perils, heartbreaks, and shifting alliances, in this painfully savvy feature from director Rojda Sekersöz (Beyond Dreams).

Title: Close to the Horizon
Description: Jessica knows exactly what her life is supposed to look like and where it takes her. But then she meets Danny. He has a complicated past and could confuse all their plans. Jessica has to decide.

Title: Out Stealing Horses
Description: A grieving widower moves to the country where a chance encounter rekindles memories from his past.

Title: The Exception
Description: Four women work together at a small NGO in Copenhagen that specialises in genocide. When two of them receive death threats, they suspect a Serbian war criminal; but then they start suspecting and turning against each other.

Title: Animals
Description: Best friends Laura and Tyler fellow deviants, enablers and co-dependents. Laura is getting married and their booze and drug-fuelled Thelma and Louise life is in jeopardy and finds herself suspended between the two unable to give either up.

Title: Piranhas
Description: A gang of teenage boys stalks the streets of Naples armed with hand guns and AK-47s to do their mob bosses' bidding.

Title: Tuscaloosa
Description: Alabama, 1972. As Billy falls for a patient at his father's mental asylum, his best friend becomes involved in a radical civil rights movement against Tuscaloosa's power elite.

Title: The Mystery of Henri Pick
Description: An editor discovers a novel that she considers to be a masterpiece, in a library whose particularity is to collect the manuscripts refused by the publishers. The text is signed Henri Pick, a Breton pizza maker who died two years earlier.

Title: In Family I Trust
Description: After discovering that her boyfriend is cheating on her with a famous TV reporter, a woman returns to her family home to find herself.

Title: El Hijo
Description: Lorenzo, a 50 y.o. painter, is having a child with his new wife, Sigrid. She gets stranger and stranger - or he does. He claims, the baby's been switched.

Title: Three Days and a Life
Description: Christmas 1999, in a peaceful little village in the Ardennes. The life of a young boy named Antoine will soon be devastated by three tragic events : the death of a dog, the vanishing of a child, and a big ravaging storm.

Title: Sadako
Description: A group of people must find out how to stop the newborn deadly curse, which has born and gone viral after a Youtuber accidentally captured a vengeful ghost on camera.

Title: Samurai Marathon
Description: In 1855, a daimyo sends his men on a grueling marathon to discover if they're tough enough to face the newly arrived Americans. Misunderstanding his intent, the Shogun dispatches assassins.

Title: Perfect Nanny
Description: When Myriam, the mother of two young children, decides--despite the reluctance of her husband--to resume her activity in a law firm, the couple starts looking for a nanny.

Title: Mariette in Ecstasy
Description: Set in a turn-of-the-century religious community about a nun who has recently taken her vows.

Title: Masquerade Hotel
Description: A serial (3) killer leaves a GPS code of his next target with each victim - this time Hotel Cortesia Tokyo. A detective goes undercover as hotel staff - haircut, manners etc.

Title: Advantages of Travelling by Train
Description: A woman finds herself living in her schizophrenic and abusive boyfriend's dark spiral full of insanity and perversion

Title: Once Upon a River
Description: Margo Crane's odyssey on the Stark River introduces her to a world filled with wonders and dangers.

Title: Spread Your Wings
Description: Based on the real story of Christian, a specialist on wild goose migrations, and the adventure he and his son embarked.

Title: Habibie & Ainun 3
Description: This movie follows the story of Hasri Ainun Besari Habibie's young life when she was in high school and medical college. She was known as a smart figure who became an idol and admired by many male students, including B.J. Habibie.

Title: Baby Jane
Description: Jonna (19) is leaving her small town just after finishing her education, going to the big city, enjoying big city life until she is attacked by a man at night. She is saved by the 30 year old woman Piki, and falls in love with her.

Title: Kuessipan
Description: Two girls grow up as best friends in an Innu community who promised each other to stick together no matter what. But their friendship is shaken when Mikuan falls for a white boy.

Title: 12 Suicidal Teens
Description: Twelve kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

Title: Text
Description: College student Ilya spends 7 years in prison on a fake drug bust. Coming out, he wants revenge on the dirty cop, Pyotr. He gets Pyotr's smartphone filled with personal info and starts texting - pretending to be Pyotr.

Title: Out in the Open
Description: In a tyrannical and oppressive Spain of misery and poorness, a child starts a runaway looking for freedom.

Title: This Earth of Mankind
Description: A native Javanese boy and a mixed-Dutch girl fall in love during the early 20th-century colonial turbulence in Dutch East Indies (now Indonesia).

Title: Shah Jahan Regency
Description: Based on the acclaimed novel Chowringhee by a Bengali novelist Mani Shankar Mukherjee.

Title: Baantjer het Begin
Description: A mild-mannered police detective freshly stationed in tumultuous 1980 Amsterdam enters a race against time when he encounters a violent plot against the Dutch royal family.

Title: I Wish Someone Were Waiting for Me Somewhere
Description: The story of a sibship of four, two men and two women, at a key moment in their lives.

Title: Birches
Description: Inspired by a best selling novel by British author, Adrian Plass, BIRCHES tells the story of a prominent author/speaker who struggles to pick up the pieces of his life and start over after the untimely death of his young wife.

Title: National Street
Description: In 1989 Vandam was used to be called a national hero. Today, he is almost unknown, a loser like many others. His fight for the woman he loves is a fight for his dignity, and it will be his downfall.

Title: Dilan 1991
Description: Dilan and Milea officially date. But Dilan is threatened to be expelled from school due to involves in gang fights. One day, when he is planning to fight again, Milea asks him to quit the motorcycle gang or their relationship ends.

Title: Poslední aristokratka
Description: The picturesque story of the Czech-American family of Count Frantisek Antonín Kostka of Kostka who learns that his aristocratic fore bearers have left him their ancient family seat - the Castle of Kostka.

Title: Mr. Jasoos
Description: Based On Kanu Bhagdev's Novel "JASOOS", Mr. Jasoos revels around a murder which has more than 3 suspects and each has a strong motive for doing this murder. Find Out How Vijay Mane AKA Mr. Jasoos solves complicated case in the film.

Title: Corporate Prey
Description: In a dystopian future, one corporation controls most of the world through genetic mods, food, and drugs. A senior geneticist's lover dies, launching his quest against the psychopathic CEO and the "families" that control "The Corporation."

Title: Foreseen
Description: Is Karmen's ability to write a gift or a curse? She is about to find out if her entire life is a lie.

Title: Voda co ma drzí nad vodou
Description: About the Slovak poet Jozef Urban (1964-1999) whose debut in 1985 was awarded the Ivan Krasko Prize. Urban used paradox as a working tool from the beginning; he is a poet of intellect.

Title: Ready Player One
Description: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

Title: Red Sparrow
Description: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

Title: The Meg
Description: A group of scientists exploring the Marianas Trench encounter the largest marine predator that has ever existed - the Megalodon.

Title: Annihilation
Description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

Title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
Description: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

Title: Bird Box
Description: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

Title: Fifty Shades Freed
Description: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

Title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
Description: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

Title: Malevolent
Description: A team of scam artists get more than they bargained for when a job at a haunted country estate gets out of hand.

Title: Wildlife
Description: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job.

Title: Love, Simon
Description: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.

Title: Mortal Engines
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.

Title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
Description: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare".

Title: The Darkest Minds
Description: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

Title: The Kissing Booth
Description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

Title: Leave No Trace
Description: A father and his thirteen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

Title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
Description: In the aftermath of World War II, a writer forms an unexpected bond with the residents of Guernsey Island when she decides to write a book about their experiences during the war.

Title: Mary Poppins Returns
Description: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins, the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

Title: The Girl in the Spider's Web
Description: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

Title: Death Wish
Description: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

Title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and wreak havoc on her love life.

Title: The Hate U Give
Description: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood best friend Khalil at the hands of a police officer. Now, facing pressure from all sides of the community, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what's right.

Title: Hunter Killer
Description: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general.

Title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
Description: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

Title: A Wrinkle in Time
Description: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

Title: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
Description: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

Title: London Fields
Description: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.

Title: Ophelia
Description: A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

Title: Dumplin'
Description: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

Title: Tell It to the Bees
Description: In 1950s small town Britain, a doctor develops a relationship with her young patient's mother.

Title: Christopher Robin
Description: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

Title: Fahrenheit 451
Description: In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.

Title: If Beale Street Could Talk
Description: A young woman embraces her pregnancy while she and her family set out to prove her childhood friend and lover innocent of a crime he didn't commit.

Title: The Night Eats the World
Description: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

Title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
Description: Merricat, Constance and their Uncle Julian live in isolation after experiencing a family tragedy six years earlier. When cousin Charles arrives to steal the family fortune, he also threatens a dark secret they've been hiding.

Title: Every Day
Description: A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.

Title: Down a Dark Hall
Description: A troubled teen named Kit Gordy is forced to join the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, just to find herself trapped by dark forces around its mysterious headmistress, Madame Duret.

Title: Red Joan
Description: The story of Joan Stanley, who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.

Title: Galveston
Description: After escaping a set up, a dying hitman returns to his hometown of Galveston where he plans his revenge.

Title: A Million Little Pieces
Description: A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted.

Title: The Little Stranger
Description: After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.

Title: Wij
Description: Eight teens - four guys and four girls - are the best of friends. One summer, out of boredom they experiment with all manner of new means to entertain themselves. This degenerates into some extreme behaviour and will lead to tragedy.

Title: Juliet, Naked
Description: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

Title: Journal 64
Description: A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution.

Title: Sherlock Gnomes
Description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo (James McAvoy) and Juliet (Emily Blunt), recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes (Johnny Depp) to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Title: Aniara
Description: A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

Title: The Land of Steady Habits
Description: After leaving his wife and his job to find happiness, Anders befriends a drug-addicted teen, sending him down a path of reckless and shameful behavior.

Title: Ladies in Black
Description: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies in Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

Title: The More You Ignore Me
Description: Mental illness, Morrissey and guinea pigs.

Title: Back Roads
Description: In 1993, Harley's dad is shot dead and his mom goes to prison. He has to earn money and look after his 3 kid sisters. No college. Over 2 years, family secrets are slowly revealed. Will a good therapist be enough?

Title: I Still See You
Description: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

Title: Transit
Description: A man attempting to escape occupied France falls in love with the wife of a dead author whose identity he has assumed.

Title: A Fortunate Man
Description: A gifted engineer flees his austere roots to pursue wealth and success among Copenhagen's elite, but the pride propelling him threatens to be his ruin.

Title: Thugs of Hindostan
Description: Recruited by the East India Company, a local thug infiltrates a troop of patriotic bandits who plan to overthrow the British regime and reclaim their independence.

Title: The Chaperone
Description: In the early 1920s, a Kansas woman finds her life forever changed when she accompanies a young dancer on her fame-seeking journey to New York City.

Title: Lady J
Description: Fooled by a notorious libertine, a widow plans her revenge.

Title: White Fang
Description: Based on the timeless novel by Jack London. A loyal wolfdog's curiosity leads him on the adventure of a lifetime while serving a series of three distinctly different masters.

Title: The Warning
Description: Ten-year-old Nico receives a threatening letter and now his life is in danger. No one seems to believe him except one person that he doesn't know who has come to believe that fate itself wants the boy dead and tries to prevent it.

Title: Nappily Ever After
Description: Violet Jones tired of waiting for her longtime boyfriend to propose, breaks up with him. But old feelings, and heaps of jealousy, no doubt, arise when he promptly begins dating another woman.

Title: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir
Description: Ajatashatru Lavash Patel has lived all his life in a small Mumbai neighborhood tricking people with street magic and fakir stunts. He sets out on a journey to find his estranged father but instead gets dragged on a never-ending adventure.

Title: We the Animals
Description: Manny, Joel, and Jonah tear their way through childhood and push against the volatile love of their parents. As Manny and Joel grow into versions of their father and Ma dreams of escape, Jonah embraces an imagined world all on his own.

Title: Perdida
Description: A policewoman, whose childhood friend disappeared in Patagonia years ago, starts a new search to find answers and soon finds her own life in danger.

Title: The Little Witch
Description: The story of a young and nice witch who learns everything there is to know about magic, in order to be accepted by the other older mean witches.

Title: Bel Canto
Description: A world-renowned opera singer becomes trapped in a hostage situation when she's invited to perform for a wealthy industrialist in South America.

Title: I'll Be Watching
Description: After narrowly escaping the clutches of a deadly stalker, a young woman flees to a remote town where she rebuilds her life and finds the man of her dreams...until the man of her nightmares tracks her down.

Title: Cut Off
Description: Thriller set in the world of Forensic Pathology. Coroner Paul Herzfeld finds a capsule in the head of a heavily mutilated corpse, containing a phone number and single word: the name of his daughter.

Title: Open Seas
Description: Three young friends grow up as students in Amsterdam when the death of one's father puts everything into a new perspective.

Title: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver
Description: Jim Knopf and Luke the Engine Driver embark on an adventurous journey through fantastic worlds to free the kidnapped Princess Li Si from the impenetrable Dragon City and solve the secret of Jim's mysterious origins.

Title: Pengin haiwei
Description: A fourth-grader, Aoyama-kun, investigates the mysterious reason behind the sudden appearance of penguins in his village, which is somehow related to a power from a young woman working at a dental clinic.

Title: Intrigo: Death of an Author
Description: One solitary man at the rudder in a small open boat ploughs through a troubled sea off the Dutch coast.

Title: Yardie
Description: British crime drama film directed by Idris Elba based on the novel of the same name by Jamaican-born writer Victor Headley.

Title: It Comes
Description: One day, a visitor leaves Hideki a memo of his unborn daughter's name "Chisa". Two years later, Hideki's house is attacked by a sinister presence. To protect his family, Hideki asks for help to perform a ritual to break an unknown spell.

Title: The Tobacconist
Description: Based on the international bestseller by Robert Seethaler. A tender, heart-breaking story about one young man and his friendship with Sigmund Freud during the Nazi occupation of Vienna....

Title: Adam und Evelyn
Description: Summer 1989, East Germany. Adam works as a tailor, Evelyn as a waitress. They are planning a vacation together when Evelyn finds out that Adam is cheating on her and decides to leave for the holiday on her own.

Title: Black Tide
Description: The disappearance of a boy sends an alcoholic cop on the track of a suspicious teacher while falling for the grieving mother.

Title: Ánimas
Description: This time, horror comes fron the other side.

Title: Okko's Inn
Description: After losing her parents in a car accident, Okko starts living in the countryside with her grandmother who runs a traditional Japanese inn. While she prepares to be the next owner of the inn, Okko can somehow see friendly ghosts.

Title: High Resolution
Description: High Resolution, an adaptation of Tao Lin's novel Taipei, tracks Paul and Erin as they confront what it means to be young and in love in the early days of the 21st century.

Title: School's Out
Description: A substitute teacher is put in charge of a class of future geniuses after their teacher commits suicide.

Title: The Bromley Boys
Description: The true story of Sports' Greatest Underdog.

Title: Homestay
Description: When "Temporary Body" is a wonderful award from heaven. Min has 100 days to change his life.

Title: Eva
Description: A playwright encounters a mysterious woman when he takes shelter in a chalet during a violent snowstorm.

Title: Soul Sessions
Description: Soul Sessions explores the timeless nature of love. The film follows two soul mates who serendipitously cross paths across many lifetimes, until one decision tears them apart and may alter their destiny forever.

Title: The Black Book of Father Dinis
Description: A picaresque chronicle of Laura, a peasant maid, and Sebastian, the young orphan in her charge, against a backdrop of overflowing passion and revolutionary intrigue in Europe at the twilight of the 18th century.

Title: Hoffmaniada
Description: Based around three of Hoffmann's tales; Klein Zaches, The Golden Pot and The Sandman, with the main character being Hoffmann himself.

Title: Café Funiculi Funicula
Description: In a specific cafe and chair in Japan, one can travel back in time while drinking a cup of coffee. There are, however, 5 rules/restrictions. It opens for closure and changing one's future but not present.

Title: Fumiko's Legs
Description: When older man Tsukakoshi asks Unokichi to paint it is of his mistress, the geisha Fumiko. Tsukakoshi loves the feet and legs part of Fumiko's anatomy. The fetishism gives the art student a commission to put his talent to use.

Title: #FriendsButMarried
Description: Ayudia (Vanesha Prescilla) and Ditto (Adipati Dolken) have been best friends for 12 years. And for all those times, Ditto has been secretly in love with her. Until one day, Ayudia told him that she's gonna get married.

Title: Dilan 1990
Description: Milea (Vanesha Prescilla) met with Dilan (Iqbaal Ramadhan) at a high school in Bandung in 1990. An unusual introduction brings Milea to know the uniqueness of Dilan who is smart, kind, and romantic in her eyes.

Title: The Wanderings of Ivan
Description: Ivan is a young Russian vagrant in Paris. Rejected by all, he takes refuge in the woods of Vincennes. But this new haven of peace turns into a nightmare when Ivan tries to resist the traffic of an underworld wildlife.

Title: Right Here Right Now
Description: On New Year's Eve in Hamburg, a young club owner is struggling to keep the party going when a violent ex-pimp, the police, a former rock star and the love of his life are all coming for him.

Title: L'école est finie
Description: Agathe Langlois, Parisian, has everything to be happy and she has just been established as an English teacher. But when she learns that she is transferred hundreds of kilometers from her home, in the countryside, it is the cold shower

Title: The Smiles of Sad Men
Description: 3 different stories of men connected by their failure becoming alcoholics. Will they get the help to overcome alcohol or replace it with something else?

Title: Rompis
Description: After graduating from high school, Roman (Arbani Yasiz) continued his studies in the Netherlands and forced to distance himself from Wulan (Adinda Azani). The romance between them starts to change when other girls appear in Roman's life.

Title: The Great Controversy Ended
Description: Based On Ellen G.White's Classical Novel That Shows Earth's Ultimate End-Time Episodes Which Will Take Place In The Near-Soon Future And The Ultimate Clash Of Good And Evil That Will Culminate With The Glorious Return Of Jesus Christ.

Title: The House Where the Mermaid Sleeps
Description: Separated mother Kaoruko awaits the graduation of their daughter for the divorce proceedings to begin and subsequently be finalized. Tragedy strikes when the daughter will never graduate. She is comatose and brain dead due to an accident.

Title: Two Men in Suits
Description: A story that spans a hundred years in Germany. It is a domestic epic about three generations of lakeside landlords, dealing with war and destruction, old power and new wealth, and the so-called »Years of Plenty«.

Title: I Thought You Were a Nice Man
Description: A beautiful young woman with a horrible secret is protected by a loving family.

Title: LOUDER! Can't Hear What You're Singin', Wimp!
Description: A super-loud singer is losing his voice due to his overuse of a super-loud voice-drug. Will a super-soft singer be able to help him somehow?

Title: The Garden of the Middle Class
Description: The body of a decapitated woman appears in the house of a legislator. His couple and a prosecutor will try to find out what is hiding behind the crime, discovering a mafia plot that involves political power.

Title: Tealight
Description: The Indonesian younger generation in the country are being urged to prepare for the so-called demographic bonus. Follows Genta, a young creator working as a creativepreneur by day, and a lifelong nightmare sufferer by night.

Title: It
Description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

Title: Call Me by Your Name
Description: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

Title: Gerald's Game
Description: A couple tries to spice up their marriage in a remote lake house. After the husband dies unexpectedly, the wife is left handcuffed to their bed frame and must fight to survive and break free.

Title: Papillon
Description: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

Title: The Ritual
Description: A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, Northern Europe, but encounter a menacing presence there stalking them.

Title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

Title: Murder on the Orient Express
Description: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

Title: Molly's Game
Description: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

Title: Wonder
Description: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

Title: Fifty Shades Darker
Description: While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

Title: Crooked House
Description: In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.

Title: The Foreigner
Description: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.

Title: Atomic Blonde
Description: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

Title: American Assassin
Description: After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.

Title: The Snowman
Description: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

Title: The Dark Tower
Description: A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.

Title: Disobedience
Description: A woman returns to her Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her for her attraction to a female childhood friend. Once back, their passions reignite as they explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.

Title: You Were Never Really Here
Description: A traumatized veteran, unafraid of violence, tracks down missing girls for a living. When a job spins out of control, Joe's nightmares overtake him as a conspiracy is uncovered leading to what may be his death trip or his awakening.

Title: Cold Skin
Description: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

Title: The Circle
Description: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

Title: The Mountain Between Us
Description: Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

Title: Mudbound
Description: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.

Title: The Beguiled
Description: The unexpected arrival of a wounded Union soldier at a girls school in Virginia during the American Civil War leads to jealousy and betrayal.

Title: T2 Trainspotting
Description: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.

Title: Everything, Everything
Description: A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.

Title: Before I Fall
Description: February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

Title: The Little Hours
Description: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation.

Title: A Dog's Purpose
Description: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
Description: A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.

Title: The Shack
Description: A grieving man receives a mysterious, personal invitation to meet with God at a place called "The Shack."

Title: The Girl in the Fog
Description: Special agent Vogel is sent to an isolated town in a remote mountain valley to investigate the case of a sixteen years old's disappearance.

Title: The Man with the Iron Heart
Tulip Fever
Description: An artist falls for a young married woman while he's commissioned to paint her portrait during the Tulip mania of seventeenth century Amsterdam.

Title: Double Lover
Description: Chloé, a fragile young woman, falls in love with her psychoanalyst, Paul. A few months later she moves in with him, but soon discovers that her lover is concealing a part of his identity.

Title: The Wife
Description: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm to see her husband receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.

Title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
Description: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

Title: The Bye Bye Man
Description: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

Title: My Cousin Rachel
Description: A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.

Title: iBoy
Description: After being shot, Tom wakes from a coma to discover that fragments of his smart phone have been embedded in his head, and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.

Title: The Invisible Guardian
Description: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

Title: Stratton
Description: A British Special Boat Service commando tracks down an international terrorist cell.

Title: The Children Act
Description: As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.

Title: The Dinner
Description: Two sets of wealthy parents meet for dinner to decide what to do about a crime their sons have committed.

Title: Voice from the Stone
Description: Set in 1950s Tuscany, Voice from the Stone is the haunting and suspenseful story of Verena, a solemn nurse drawn to aid a young boy who has fallen silent since the sudden passing of his mother.

Title: On Chesil Beach
Description: In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.

Title: Wonderstruck
Description: Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

Title: The Bookshop
Description: England 1959. In a small East Anglian town, Florence Green decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop.

Title: D'après une histoire vraie
Description: A writer goes through a tough period after the release of her latest book, as she gets involved with an obsessive admirer.

Title: Tuntematon sotilas
Description: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

Title: Submergence
Description: James and Danielle meet on vacation and fall in love. She's going to the dark North Atlantic bottom to find life. He's going to Somalia to find a terrorist but gets a dark cell.

Title: The Breadwinner
Description: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

Title: OtherLife
Description: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.

Title: Lean on Pete
Description: A teenager gets a summer job working for a horse trainer and befriends the fading racehorse, Lean on Pete.

Title: Breath
Description: After developing an interest in surfing, a teenage boy and his friend forge an unlikely friendship with an older surfer.

Title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
Description: An adrenaline seeking snowboarder gets lost in a massive winter storm in the back country of the High Sierras where he is pushed to the limits of human endurance and forced to battle his own personal demons as he fights for survival...."

Title: Thank You for Your Service
Description: A group of U.S. soldiers returning from Iraq struggle to integrate back into family and civilian life, while living with the memory of a war that threatens to destroy them long after they've left the battlefield.

Title: Rebel in the Rye
Description: The life of celebrated but reclusive author, J.D. Salinger, who gained worldwide fame with the publication of his novel, "The Catcher in the Rye".

Title: Mary and the Witch's Flower
Description: Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers.

Title: Vengeance: A Love Story
Description: A group of strangers come to the aid of a single mother seeking to bring her rapists to justice.

Title: The Motive
Description: A man obsessed with the idea of writing "high literature" starts to cause conflicts around him to write about it.

Title: The Hunter's Prayer
Description: An assassin helps a young woman avenge the death of her family.

Title: The Leisure Seeker
Description: A runaway couple go on an unforgettable journey in the faithful old RV they call "The Leisure Seeker".

Title: Submission
Description: A cynical college professor takes a keen interest in a talented young writing student.

Title: November Criminals
Description: After his friend is murdered, a Washington, D.C. teenager undertakes his own investigation of the crime.

Title: The Tribes of Palos Verdes
Description: When the situation at her idyllic Palos Verdes home turns volatile, young Medina attempts to surf her way to happiness.
