Description: David, a waiter, finds an unpublished manuscript in a dresser drawer. To impress a girl, he claims to be the author. When the novel becomes a best-seller the real author introduces himself in his life and begins to take-over David's life.

Title: Rööperi
Description: Professional criminals in Finland from 1966 to 1979.

Title: Wild Chicks and Life
Description: The girl gang and its five members are getting older and are therefore dealing with more grown-up problems while still knowing that friendship is one of the most important things in life.

Title: Las viudas de los jueves
Description: In a gated community, where everyone seems to have it all, secrets start to come out.

Title: Wild Grass
Description: A quirky woman who spends her free time as a pilot has her purse stolen; when a mysterious man finds her wallet, they embark on a peculiar romance.

Title: The Beautiful and Damned
Description: Twenty something trust fund kid Anthony Patch and his party girl wife Gloria Gilbert are disinherited by their wealthy benefactor grandfather and their lives spiral out of control in a blizzard of drugs, sex and eventual violence.

Title: Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha
Description: A woman is found dead in a mysterious circumstances. Several discrepancies arise in the findings, which eventually leads to the closure of the case. Years later, Haridas decides to reopen the case.

Title: Täällä Pohjantähden alla
Description: A new film-adaptation of Väinö Linna's famous book here Beneath the North Star.

Title: Der Knochenmann
Description: Private Investigator Brenner is handling a case at the grill-station "Löschenkohl". There he finds - besides some chicken - also other meat...that doesn't belong in a good meal.

Title: The Possessed
Description: Based on the True Story, The Watseka Wonder, America's first documented possession in 1870. A chilling story of a 13-year-old girl from the small town of Watseka, Illinois who became possessed by spirits of the insane dead.

Title: Diamant 13
Description: A cop goes up against his lifelong friend, who has become one of the city's biggest drug traffickers.

Title: The Boy with the Sun in His Eyes
Description: Grieving over the death of his friend, an American goes to work for a b-movie actress in Italy, only to discover that living the stylish life could have fatal repercussions and second-guessing his decision to become her personal assistant.

Title: El Contrato
Description: Peter McShade is a hitman, whose contract involves killing the major mobster of the Iberian Peninsula, but nothing is what it seems.

Title: The Front Line
Description: An Italian man looks back from his jail cell on his youthful exploits as a political extremist with understanding, candour and remorse.

Title: Snow White and Russian Red
Description: An aggressive thug has problems with his girlfriend. Over the course of several chaotic days he walks around the hood, takes drugs and confronts himself with other women.

Title: Street Boss
Description: Based on the true story of how the FBI brought down one of Detroit's most notorious mobsters.

Title: Closed for Winter
Description: Tells the story of a woman's journey to overcome the events of the past and to find a way to move on. It is a story of dark secrets and the power of and celebration of letting go.

Title: Questione di cuore
Description: Two men strike up a close friendship after suffering a heart attack.

Title: Gyeolpeurenjeu
Description: A young woman suspects her new boyfriend of infidelity and discovers that he actually has two other girlfriends. She meets the other women and the three of them become best friends.

Title: The Dreamer
Description: This movie is an adaptation from a popular novel by the same title, and sequel to Laskar Pelangi. It portrays two village boys with a dream of traveling to Paris, to study at Sorbonne University.

Title: Kirpi
Description: Kirpi, the vengeful practical joker finally finds a match for his habit: Tahir Yaman. Prank and revenge loop of the duo will drag them to very complicated situations.

Title: Une petite zone de turbulences
Description: Retired Englishman George Hall's hypochondria worsens and takes its toll on his family.

Title: Interceptor
Description: When Special forces agent Matvey Sobolev survives an explosion, he realizes he must master the art of absolute inner power before confronting his powerful rival, Kurylo, a cruel leader of a criminal syndicate.

Title: Summertime Blues
Description: The life of 15 year old Alex is turned upside down, when his parents are divorced and find new partners right away. After a fight at school, the mother takes him over to England, where Alex chaotic life continues.

Title: El corredor nocturno
Description: A stressed insurance executive runs from his pressurized life, but what he finds along with his freedom is far less certainty.

Title: Gunjô: Ai ga shizunda umi no iro
Description: A drama centered on a young woman who heads to her father's home in Okinawa to try and cope with her boyfriend's death.

Title: Tsurugidake: Ten no ki
Description: In 1907, a group of men climb an unconquered peak in the last unmapped region of Japan.

Title: Die Perlmutterfarbe
Description: A student's lie about a book he damaged leads to an unexpected campaign of hate against the members of another class.

Title: Castle Under Fiery Skies
Description: An achievement-type of story: a builder/carpenter/architect goes through trials and tribulations to construct an impressive castle for his employer, the major Japanese historical figure, Oda Nobunaga.

Title: Being in Heaven
Description: A journey of revelation and awakening that reveals the truth about our search for meaning, freedom and personal happiness. Are you ready to be transformed forever?

Title: Shayô
Description: After World War II, a small aristocratic family in Japan has lost all of their money.

Title: Hotel Atlântico
Description: A road movie that follows a solitary man as he sets of on a journey to the south of Brazil. The strange characters and absurd situations he encounters along the way present an extraordinary portrait of human relations.

Title: Twilight
Description: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

Title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
Description: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

Title: The Reader
Description: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

Title: Body of Lies
Description: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

Title: Jumper
Description: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

Title: Let the Right One In
Description: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Description: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

Title: Revolutionary Road
Description: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

Title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
Description: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.

Title: The Ruins
Description: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

Title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Description: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
Description: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

Title: The Other Boleyn Girl
Description: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.

Title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
Description: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

Title: Inkheart
Description: A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

Title: City of Ember
Description: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

Title: The Forbidden Kingdom
Description: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Title: Blindness
Description: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness.

Title: Pontypool
Description: A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.

Title: Appaloosa
Description: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

Title: The Wave
Description: A high school teacher's experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.

Title: Babylon A.D.
Description: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

Title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
Description: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

Title: One Missed Call
Description: Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.

Title: Red Cliff
Description: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

Title: Nights in Rodanthe
Description: A doctor, who is travelling to see his estranged son, sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.

Title: Red
Description: A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.

Title: Nim's Island
Description: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
Description: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

Title: House
Description: In rural Alabama, two couples find themselves in a fight for survival. Running from a maniac (The Tin Man) bent on killing them, they flee deep into the woods and seek refuge in a house.

Title: Brideshead Revisited
Description: A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to World War II.

Title: The Secret Life of Bees
Description: In 1964, a teenage girl in search of the truth about her mother runs away to a small town in South Carolina and finds a family of independent women who can connect her to her past.

Title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
Description: Four college freshmen and best friends find that it may take more than a shared pair of jeans to help them stay in touch as their lives go in different directions.

Title: The Tale of Despereaux
Description: An unusually brave mouse helps to restore happiness to a forlorn kingdom after making friends with a gentleman rat.

Title: Diary of a Nymphomaniac
Description: A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.

Title: The Informers
Description: One week in L.A. in 1983, featuring movie executives, rock stars, a vampire and other morally challenged characters in adventures laced with sex, drugs and violence.

Title: The Oxford Murders
Description: At Oxford University, a professor and a grad student work together to try to stop a potential series of murders seemingly linked by mathematical symbols.

Title: The Secret of Moonacre
Description: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.

Title: The Garden of Eden
Description: A young American writer completes his service in WWI and travels across Europe with his wife and her attractive Italian girlfriend. Based on the novel by Ernest Hemingway.

Title: Winter in Wartime
Description: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands, a teenage boy gets involved in the Dutch Resistance after coming to the aid of a wounded RAF pilot.

Title: The Mysteries of Pittsburgh
Description: Based on Michael Chabon's novel, the film chronicles the defining summer of a recent college graduate who crosses his gangster father and explores love, sexuality, and the enigmas surrounding his life and his city.

Title: Killshot
Description: Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

Title: The Lazarus Project
Description: A former criminal is drawn into a criminal endeavor and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.

Title: Elegy
Description: Cultural critic David Kepesh finds his life, which he indicates is a state of "emancipated manhood", thrown into tragic disarray by Consuela Castillo, a well-mannered student who awakens a sense of sexual possessiveness in her teacher.

Title: Terribly Happy
Description: A thriller about a Copenhagen cop who moves to a small town after having a nervous breakdown.

Title: The Coverup
Description: The story centers on around the mysterious death of repeat drunk driving offender Thacker and the discovery of his body in an alley behind the Marshalltown, Iowa, police department after his latest DUI arrest.

Title: My Sassy Girl
Description: A sweet Midwestern guy with his life planned out for himself is wooed, groomed, and ultimately dumped by a complicated, elusive gal.

Title: Miracle at St. Anna
Description: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.

Title: Winged Creatures
Description: A group of strangers form a unique relationship with each other after surviving a random shooting at a Los Angeles diner.

Title: Dream Boy
Description: Chronicles the relationship between two gay teenagers in the rural south in the late '70s.

Title: Arn: The Kingdom at the End of the Road
Description: The Knight Arn is sent on a last mission against Saladin. He has to win this battle, before he can go home to Sweden, and finally marry his Cecilia and start a family. But the peace back home is threatened by the Danes.

Title: Adam Resurrected
Description: In the aftermath of World War II, a former circus entertainer who was spared from the gas chamber becomes the ringleader at an asylum for Holocaust survivors.

Title: Fatso
Description: Overweight loner Rino spends his days in seclusion, until his dad rents a room to an overtly sexual girl who challenges Rino to break down his walls.

Title: Painted Skin
Description: An action-thriller centered on a vampire-like woman who eats the skins and hearts of her lovers.

Title: Afterwards
Description: Newly divorced lawyer Nathan Del Amico is shaken up after he meets a doctor who claims that he can sense when select people are about to die.

Title: Suspect X
Description: It's another battle of the wits for the brilliant but eccentric physicist, Yukawa, and detective, Kaoru.

Title: Morphine
Description: A drama that chronicles the civil war that raged after the 1917 Bolshevik revolution.

Title: Arráncame la vida
Description: Set in 1930's in Puebla, Mexico, a young woman finds herself in an arranged marriage to a prominent politician (Andres Ascencio). As his career progresses, she finds it more difficult to remain a loyal, loving wife.

Title: The Crew
Description: As a major heist approaches and with betrayal all around him, a respected crime boss has to summon all his street nous and killer instinct as he fights for survival.

Title: Love Me No More
Description: The back story is a marvelous and gorgeous social commentary on the type of generous actions we could all take - to enrich our often-solitary elder-citizens' lives.

Title: Blackout
Description: Three people from different walks of life find themselves trapped inside a stalled elevator. What at first seems like an inconvenience rapidly escalates into a nightmare.

Title: The Man Who Loved Yngve
Description: A teenage boy loses his footing when he finds himself drawn to the new boy in class.

Title: Forbidden Legend of Sex and Chopsticks
The Kreutzer Sonata
Description: Based on "The Kreutzer Sonata" by Leo Tolstoy.

Title: The Narrows
Description: 19-year-old Brooklyn boy Mike tries to balance a scholarship to NYU and his sophisticated Italian neighborhood roots, as well as an eager-to-marry girlfriend, a proud father and a less lawful transport job. After Tim McLoughlin's novel.

Title: Disgrace
Description: After having an affair with a student, a Cape Town professor moves to the Eastern Cape, where he gets caught up in a mess of post-apartheid politics.

Title: La Bohème
Description: The opera "La Bohème" is about the tragic love story of Mimí and Rodolfo, set in Paris in the year 1830.

Title: Krabat
Description: A boy learns the black arts from an evil sorcerer.

Title: Three Kingdoms
Description: Based on "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luo Guangzhong. It ranks as one of China's four most important pieces of literature.

Title: The Sky Crawlers
Description: The Kildren, a group of eternally young fighter pilots, experience the sudden loss of innocence as they battle the enemy in astonishing dogfights above the clouds.

Title: Dolls and Angels
Description: A teen-aged girl tries to escape difficult circumstances in a Parisian suburb by becoming a model.

Title: Trouble at Timpetill
Description: The children of a small European mountain village end up being its only residents, soon after the adults cannot take their behavior any longer.

Title: Un barrage contre le Pacifique
Description: A troubled mother's spirit crumbles when her adult children strike out for independence. Feeling abandoned she contemplates taking drastic action.

Title: The Hanged Man
Description: A story of a passionate sentimental initiation out of the ordinary; with a crime story and suspects, and two young characters.

Title: A French Gigolo
Description: A married construction worker leads a double life as a male prostitute serving rich ladies.

Title: Scusa ma ti chiamo amore
Description: Mayhem ensues when a 37-year-old ad executive on the rebound falls for a bubbly high school senior.

Title: The Garden of Sinners: Remaining Sense of Pain
Meu Nome Não é Johnny
Description: The true story of João Guilherme Estrella ("Johnny"), a young middle-class bon vivant who became a big-time cocaine dealer in Rio de Janeiro in the early 1990s.

Title: Varg Veum - Falne engler
Description: Murder and trouble hits Veum when he meets up with classmates in the rock-band Camp, when he resumes contact with a former flame Rebecca, now wife of his buddy. A Varg Veum mystery by best-selling crime novel by Gunnar Staalesen. Staalesen.

Title: The Golden Boys
Description: A romantic comedy, set on Cape Cod in 1905, about three 70-year-old retired sea captains who try to lure an attractive middle-aged woman into marriage.

Title: Det som ingen ved
Description: Thomas' sister is a journalist and wants to talk to him but "drowns" just before. In her apartment he finds papers about biochemical weapons and the Danish intelligence agency their dead dad was in. Thomas investigates.

Title: Freche Mädchen
Description: Three teen-aged girlfriends navigate multiple love triangles.

Title: Tutta la vita davanti
Description: A brilliant recent graduate struggles to find work. After falling into a babysitting job, she is introduced by the child's mother to the world of the international call center, its employees, and the fast pace that drives them.

Title: Käsky
Description: There is civil war in Finland. Between whites vs reds. A woman soldier of reds is captured by the whites. She is ordered to be executed.

Title: The World is Big and Salvation Lurks Around the Corner
Description: The story of Alex, who, with the help of his charismatic grandfather, Bai Dan, embarks on a journey in search of his real self.

Title: Dracula's Guest
Description: DRACULA'S GUEST follows the story of two young lovers, Bram and Elizabeth. Dracula kidnaps Elizabeth and takes her to his castle while Bram sets out across Europe to rescue her.

Title: Verses of Love
Description: A man who try to get through a complicated relationship in the Islamic way.

Title: Lonely Street
Description: Bubba Mabry, a gullible private detective, becomes the prime suspect in a tabloid reporter's murder after being hired to snoop on him by a mysterious celebrity.

Title: Senseless
Description: Based on Stona Fitch's novel, this is the story of a wealthy US businessman (Behr) whose brutal kidnapping and torture are streamed online as part of an ultra-violent reality TV show.

Title: De brief voor de koning
Description: The medieval quest of sixteen-year old Tiuri, who risks his future as a Knight to fulfill a promise, and in so doing discovers adventure, honor, valor and love.

Title: A Year Ago in Winter
Description: A renowned artist must uncover a young dancer's secrets in order to truly capture her likeness for a commissioned work.

Title: Les liens du sang
Description: The story of two rival brothers, one a pimp and the other a cop, and how the former manages to be the family favorite.

Title: Hello
Description: Call-center workers receive a phone call from God.

Title: Crime Is Our Business
Description: Prudence Beresford is investigating another murder. Her aunt had witnessed it, but no body was found, and nobody trusted her word. Nobody, except Prudence, of course!

Title: Riaru onigokko
Description: Teenager is transported to a parallel world where everyone who shares his family name is being hunted down by the dictatorial government.

Title: My Friends, My Love
Description: Mathias and Antoine become a modern-day odd couple when they move in together in London. But while establishing house rules is easy, handling relationships with the opposite sex is another matter!

Title: La possibilité d'une île
Description: A futuristic story about a man and his clone.

Title: Un giorno perfetto
Description: A jealous and violent bodyguard can't accept his ex-wife's abandonment.

Title: K-20: The Fiend with Twenty Faces
Description: Set in a fictional Japanese city in 1949, a master criminal hones in on his latest victim.

Title: The Poker Club
Description: Four friends discover and accidentally kill a burglar -- who may not be alone -- in the kitchen during their weekly poker night.

Title: Ulvenatten
Description: Under a live TV debate a group of Chechen takes several hostages, and demands that it is shown live across the world. We follow the dram from 22 at night to 08 next morning.

Title: Hotaru no haka
Description: Set during World War II, the film follows a young brother and sister as they attempt to survive the aftermath of the firebombing of Kobe City.

Title: The Great Alibi
Description: A psychoanalyst and consummate womanizer is brutally shot while his wife is standing over him with a revolver in her hand.

Title: Watch Out
Description: A narcissistic man sexually fascinated with his own body finds himself heading down a path of disturbed behavior.

Title: The Ode
Description: A young, gay Indian flees to Hollywood, away from an overprotective mother and memories of his father's violent death. A successful banker by day, at night his life unravels in a blur of alcohol, drugs, and sex as he grapples with love, loss and ultimately, forgiveness. Based on actual events and the acclaimed novel by Ghalib Shiraz Dhalla.

Title: Un gioco da ragazze
Description: Elena is a rich girl, leader of the school, that spend all nights dancing at disco consuming drugs with two friends who treats as slaves. They will play a dangerous game to harass a professor of their high school.

Title: I Was Here
Description: A 17-year-old boy becomes a drug dealer and the decision that draws him into causes turbulent events he can't control.

Title: Sweet Rain: Accuracy of Death
Description: Kaneshiro plays a Grim Reaper who appears to his victims in human form and spends a week with them before deciding whether to off them or not.

Title: Run Papa Run
Description: A father desperately tries to hide his Triad lifestyle from his daughter.

Title: As God Commands
Description: A dark drama centered on a 14-year-old boy and his neo-Nazi dad, who are both outcasts in their suburban town.

Title: De Gales hus
Description: At the psychiatric clinic Varden the attendants are mad and the inmates are sane. Here you find life in all it's different faces. Through 24 year old Aina we get to know the insane gang, bringing back her lust for life.

Title: Purple Mountain
Description: Personal accounts from the Japanese occupation of Eastern China during the 1930s when many innocent civilians were slaughtered by the Japanese military. Based on Iris Chang's "The Rape of Nanking: The Forgotten Holocaust of World War II".

Title: The Last Man
Description: The first contemporary adaptation of Mary Shelley's 1826 novel about a twenty-first century pandemic.

Title: Daddy Cool
Description: Philippe Le Tallec, a scientist living in the USA, has to come back to France to look after his young girl Eglantine. But it seems Eglantine cares more about parties and boyfriends than her uncool dad ...

Title: Kamisama no pazuru
Description: A set of twins -- one a hard-working student and the other a drifter -- team up with a dropout to unlock the secrets of the universe and to build one of their own.

Title: Nucingen House
Description: Surreal gothic comedy about a gambler who wins a strange Chilean mansion and takes his frail wife there.

Title: Down to the Dirt
Description: When Keith and Natasha's relationship goes rotten, Natasha runs away to Halifax. Keith makes it his mission to track her down, only to learn things about himself that he never realized before.

Title: Robert Zimmermann wundert sich über die Liebe
Description: A young game designer falls in love with an older woman and suddenly his whole life turns upside down.

Title: Kyûka
Description: The prison guards working in penitentiaries where death row inmates are locked up are forced to spend their daily lives constantly facing death.

Title: Die rote Zora
Description: A female-led gang of orphaned teenagers fights corruption.

Title: Just a Father
Description: Carlo is a doctor that has recently lost his wife. Affected by the loss, he is supported by his family and friends, and, above all, for the love he feels towards his little daughter. And then, one day, he meets Camille.

Title: Climbers High
Description: A newspaper editor (played by Shin'ichi Tsutsumi) who deals with the crash of Japan Airlines Flight 123.

Title: Hlidac c.47
Description: A WW I veteran still haunted by his time in the trenches settles in a small town to work for the railroad company. His pretty wife attracts the attention of the lonely young gravedigger.

Title: A Corte do Norte
Description: Emília de Sousa, the great 19th-century Portuguese actress, abandoned her career to marry a rich aristocrat and became the Baroness Magdalene of the Sea. As beautiful as Empress Sissi, she built a mystery that lasted four generations.

Title: Watashi wa kai ni naritai
Description: One relatively peaceful post-war day in Japan, a barber and good family man, is unexpectedly arrested by the Prefectural Police, declared a suspected war criminal, and subsequently sued for murder by the American occupation forces.

Title: To Live and Die in Dixie
Namida tsubo
Description: A magazine editor loses his wife to cancer and he keeps her ashes in a jar. When he begins dating her sister, he becomes overwhelmed with guilt.

Title: Putoavia enkeleitä
Description: A what-if story of authors Lauri Viita and Aila Meriluoto as told by their daughter of an alternative time line.

Title: Tintorettor Jishu
Description: Feluda, the famous Bengali detective tackles an international buyer, a corrupt arts agent, numerous henchmen and impostors in this story that revolves around a painting of Jesus by the famous Italian painter Tintoretto.

Title: Päätalo
Description: A contractor wants to become a writer but his unhappy marriage and financial problems are suppressing him.

Title: Sonetàula
Description: A Sardinian boy torn from his father by false accusations is raised by his grandfather and becomes an outlaw.

Title: Shuang shi ji
Description: A mystery about a gourmet in love with two different women who winds up poisoned.

Title: Feuerherz
Description: The true story of a young female soldier who comes of age during the Eritrean civil war.

Title: Ver van familie
Description: Following the death of her stepmother, a young woman leaves her life in the USA behind, and rekindles the bonds with her Indonesian-Dutch grandmother.

Title: The Homeless Student
Description: Based on autobiographical novel "The Homeless Junior High School Student" by Hiroshi Tamura. He was homeless during his high school days after the breakup of his parents.

Title: Half Past Ten
Description: An alcoholic married man discovers he has fallen out of love with his moody wife.

Title: Miss Shellagh's Miniskirt
Description: 50-year-old Alan Fletcher flirts alternately with his former high school teacher, the teen girl who lives across the hall, and the mystery girl in the window across the courtyard.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

Title: There Will Be Blood
Description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Title: The Girl Next Door
Description: Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

Title: Stardust
Description: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

Title: The Mist
Description: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

Title: I Am Legend
Description: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

Title: Shooter
Description: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. After being double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.

Title: Gone Baby Gone
Description: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

Title: The Golden Compass
Description: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Title: Shrek the Third
Description: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

Title: Bridge to Terabithia
Description: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

Title: The Invasion
Description: As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

Title: P.S. I Love You
Description: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

Title: The Bourne Ultimatum
Description: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

Title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
Description: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Title: Next
Description: A Las Vegas magician who can see into the future is pursued by FBI agents seeking to use his abilities to prevent a nuclear terrorist attack.

Title: Charlie Wilson's War
Description: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

Title: Hannibal Rising
Description: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

Title: Virgin Territory
Description: Young Florentines take refuge from the black plague and engage in bawdy adventures and lusty exchanges.

Title: Meet the Robinsons
Description: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

Title: The Last Legion
Description: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Title: The Kite Runner
Description: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.

Title: Death Sentence
Description: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

Title: The Nanny Diaries
Description: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

Title: The Water Horse
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Title: Blood and Chocolate
Description: A teenage werewolf is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man.

Title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
Description: A boy's life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.

Title: Reservation Road
Description: The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.

Title: The Jane Austen Book Club
Description: Six Californians start a club to discuss the works of Jane Austen, only to find their relationships -- both old and new -- begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.

Title: Love in the Time of Cholera
Description: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

Title: Arn: The Knight Templar
Description: Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.

Title: The Invisible
Description: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

Title: Feast of Love
Description: A meditation on love and its various incarnations, set within a community of friends in Oregon. and is described as an exploration of the magical, mysterious and sometimes painful incarnations of love.

Title: The Last Mistress
Description: Secrets, rumors and betrayals surround the upcoming marriage between a young dissolute man and virtuous woman of the French aristocracy.

Title: Hallam Foe
Description: Hallam's talent for spying on people reveals his darkest fears-and his most peculiar desires. Driven to expose the true cause of his mother's death, he instead finds himself searching the rooftops of the city for love.

Title: Flood
Description: When a raging storm coincides with high seas it unleashes a colossal tidal surge, which travels mercilessly down England's East Coast and into the Thames Estuary. It is not a question of if, but when London floods.

Title: The Life Before Her Eyes
Description: A woman's survivor's guilt from a Columbine-like event twenty years ago causes her present-day idyllic life to fall apart.

Title: Snow Angels
Description: A drama that interweaves the life of a teenager, with his old baby sitter, her estranged husband, and their daughter.

Title: Bobby Z
Description: A DEA agent provides former Marine Tim Kearney with a way out of his prison sentence: impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord.

Title: Paranoid Park
Description: A teenage skateboarder's life begins to fray after he is involved in the accidental death of a security guard.

Title: Secret Sunshine
Description: A woman moves to the town where her dead husband was born. As she tries to fit in, another tragic event overturns her life.

Title: The World Unseen
Description: A drama centered on two women who engage in a dangerous relationship during South Africa's apartheid era.

Title: Youth Without Youth
Description: A love story wrapped in a mystery. Set in World War II Europe, a professor is changed by a cataclysmic event and explores the mysteries of life.

Title: Boy A
Description: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

Title: Silk
Description: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

Title: Russkaya Lolita
Description: The events of the controversial novel "Lolita" by Vladimir Nabokov pick up in modern day Russia.

Title: December Boys
Description: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.

Title: The Banishment
Description: A trip to the pastoral countryside reveals a dark, sinister reality for a family from the city.

Title: Martian Child
Description: A science-fiction writer, recently widowed, considers whether to adopt a hyper-imaginative 6-year-old abandoned and socially rejected boy who says he's really from Mars.

Title: Then She Found Me
Description: April, 39, wants a baby but her husband leaves her. When her adoptive mother dies, she's contacted by her bio mom, a TV talk show host. April starts seeing the divorced dad of one of her students at school.

Title: When Nietzsche Wept
Description: Viennese doctor Josef Breuer meets with philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche to help him deal with his despair.

Title: Ex Drummer
Description: Three handicapped losers who form a band ask famous writer Dries to be their drummer. He joins the band and starts manipulating them.

Title: Angel
Description: The rise and fall of a young eccentric British writer, in the early 20th century.

Title: Fugitive Pieces
Description: A child escapes from Poland during World War II and first heads to Greece before coming of age in Canada.

Title: Married Life
Description: A 1940s-set drama where an adulterous man plots his wife's death instead of putting her through the humiliation of a divorce.

Title: 99 francs
Description: The life of Octave Parango, a flamboyant ad designer, filled with success, satire, misery and love.

Title: Saawariya
Description: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.

Title: The Trap
Description: A couple finds out their son urgently needs an expensive heart surgery. While struggling to find the money, the father is approached by a mysterious man proposing a sinister deal.

Title: Si j'étais toi
Description: A wife and mother passes away, and spirit returns in her daughter's body.

Title: A Secret
Description: A 15-year-old boy unearths a shocking family secret.

Title: The Garden of Sinners: Overlooking View
The Romance of Astrea and Celadon
Description: A romantic drama centered around a young shepherd and shepherdess and the ramifications of their forbidden affair.

Title: Brick Lane
Description: In 1980s London, Nazneem, a young Bangladeshi woman, feels her soul is quietly dying in her arranged marriage, until the day hot-headed Karim comes knocking at her door.

Title: Ben X
Description: As an alternative to getting bullied at school, an autistic teenager retreats into the world of online role-playing games.

Title: The Man from London
Description: After witnessing a crime during his night shift as railway switchman near the docks, a man finds a briefcase full of money. While he and his family step up their living standards, others start looking for the disappeared case.

Title: Hunting and Gathering
Description: When Camille (Audrey Tautou) falls ill, she is forced to live with Philibert and Franck (Guillaume Canet). A moving trio story.

Title: Dante's Inferno
Description: A darkly comedic travelogue of the underworld - set against an all-too-familiar urban backdrop of used car lots, gated communities, strip malls, and the U.S. Capitol. And populated with a contemporary cast of reprobates, including famous - and infamous - politicians, presidents, popes, pimps. And the Prince of Darkness himself.

Title: Breakfast with Scot
Description: Eric, a sports announcer and former hockey player, doesn't know how to deal with the flamboyant young boy to whom he and his partner suddenly become guardians.

Title: The Tracey Fragments
Description: 15-year-old Tracey Berkowitz is naked under a shower curtain at the back of a bus, looking for her little brother Sonny, who thinks he's a dog.

Title: The Last Sin Eater
Description: In seeking her own redemption from the man of whom she is most afraid, ten-year-old Cadi Forbes discovers a secret sin haunting her community of Welsh immigrants in 1850s Appalachia.

Title: Mutluluk
Description: When an unmarried teenage girl is believed by her family to have given up her virginity, she is ordered to be killed out of shame. But before her relative is able to complete the task, the two encounter a college professor.

Title: Canciones de amor en Lolita's Club
Description: The lives of two brothers are dramatically crossed when Raul a violent police targeted by gangs of prostitution return to the family home. While Valentín , who suffers from mental disabilities, works at a hostess club as handy boy.

Title: Saving Sarah Cain
Description: A thirty-something columnist becomes legal guardian of her Amish sister's five children and ends up 'using' the kids' lives as stories for her column, causing them to feel betrayed, since they had believed she was truly concerned for them.

Title: 13 French Street
Description: A neo-noir tale of a man who seeks out an old friend, only to succumb to the will of a beautiful, mysterious woman.

Title: Room of Death
Description: Two unemployed computer technicians discover 2 million euros next to a dead body in a field of windmills.

Title: The Stone Angel
Description: A 90-year-old woman, rapidly losing her memory and knowing that sooner or later her life will be over, returns to the Manitoba farmhouse she grew up in to try and make peace with her dysfunctional family.

Title: The Three Investigators and the Secret of Skeleton Island
Description: Three kid detectives go on an epic journey to eerie Skeleton Island. Once home to pirates, it's now plagued by a mysterious beast.

Title: The Girl by the Lake
Description: The body of a young woman is found in a small and quiet town in North Italy. A detective from the nearby main city is called to solve the mystery.

Title: Hito no sekkusu o warauna
Description: The love story of a young male student and a woman lecturer at art college.

Title: Solstorm
Description: The aurora borealis slithers like a dragon through the night skies when this story about religious and sexual dominance begins in the northernmost regions of Sweden above the Arctic Circle.

Title: The Little Traitor
Description: A coming of age tale of the unlikely bond between a kindly British soldier and a spirited Jewish boy set against the backdrop of the birth of the State of Israel.

Title: Beaufort
Description: The story of a group of Israeli soldiers stationed in an outpost prior to the withdrawal of forces of 2000.

Title: Le deuxième souffle
Description: Gu, a famous gangster, has just escaped from jail. All french police is after him. Before leaving the country with Manouche, the woman he loves, Gu needs a final job to get some money. The job works, but a police's scheming makes Gu appear as a traitor to his own accomplices. Gu will do whatever it takes to clean his honor...

Title: The Last Ottoman: Knockout Ali
Description: Story about an ottoman WWI veteran, who resistances against the occupiers.

Title: Funuke: Show Some Love, You Losers!
Description: Traumatic incidents, conflicts, and bloody quarrels awaits the Wago family members who return home to bury their parents.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Description: A contemporary adaptation of Oscar Wilde classic tale of vanity.

Title: Genghis Khan: To the Ends of the Earth and Sea
Description: A look at Genghis Khan's life, from his birth to conquests in Asia.

Title: Quiet room ni yôkoso
Description: Asuka Sakura wakes up in the mental asylums quiet room, with no recollection of how she got there.

Title: Starting Out in the Evening
Description: An ambitious graduate student convinces a writer that her thesis can resurrect his career.

Title: Geomeun jip
Description: Jun-oh, an insurance claims agent, faces off with a client who he suspects of committing murders with the intention of collecting insurance premiums.

Title: El pasado
Description: A couple decides to split after 12 years together. The man (Bernal) find it easy to move on, but difficult to prevent his ex from hounding him, or the new women in his life.

Title: Emotional Arithmetic
Description: A bond between three people in a German concentration camp is still there many years after they were split up, all deep scars from back then. One of them invites them to a reunion, and we're out for a night none of them will ever forget.

Title: Satanás
Description: Based on the Mario Mendoza's book and inspired by true events, tells three interconnected stories happening in the eve of the infamous Pozzetto Massacre.

Title: La masseria delle allodole
Description: A stirring and stunning story of an aristocratic family who is unexpectedly swept into the ravages of World War I and a forbidden passion that may be the family's only hope.

Title: Gone with the Woman
Description: A woman moves into a young man's home and starts to run his life -- a process that makes him fall hopelessly in love with her.

Title: Jekyll
Description: While researching a cure for cancer, DR. HENRY JEKYLL creates a computer-generated alter-ego, MR. HYDE, a creature of animal appetites and uncontrollable impulses who goes on a killing spree and ultimately tries to destroy his own creator...

Title: Liebesleben
Description: A married young academic falls under the sexual thrall of a much older man whose air of jaded ennui conceals a secret desire for vengeance...

Title: United Red Army
Description: The film outlines Japanese students movements in the 60s, then shows the formation of the Japanese United Red Army, a communist armed resistance group.

Title: Camila Jam
Description: The story of Camila, a young woman intent on becoming a writer.

Title: The Garden of Sinners: A Study in Murder - Part 1
A Thousand Years of Good Prayers
Description: A Chinese man travels to America to visit his daughter after her recent divorce. Though his trip starts off as a mission to see his daughter remarry, he sparks to an Iranian woman who, despite their language barrier, captures his heart.

Title: Jacquou le croquant
Description: Jacquou is a determined and attractive young man who transforms his vow of vengeance into a struggle against injustice.

Title: Autumn Ball
Description: A film about the loneliness, despair and hope of six people who all live in a bleak Soviet-era apartment complex in Tallinn, Estonia.

Title: Cañitas. Presencia
Description: A movie based in a real case that happened in Mexico City, in which a group of friends experiences demonic possession after using an Ouija to make contact with a spirit.

Title: De scheepsjongens van Bontekoe
Description: A ripping adventure yarn about teenage boys who join the crew of a ship of the Dutch East India Company in the 17th century. After a dramatic shipwreck and escape from an attack by natives, they must make their way to safety by themselves.

Title: Wild Chicks in Love
Description: The girl gang and its five members experience love for the first time and all the problems that come with it.

Title: Pars vite et reviens tard
Description: A modern-day Parisian town crier gradually learns that someone is using him to give cryptic warnings of a plague outbreak in the city.

Title: V2 - jäätynyt enkeli
Description: The tough Detective Vares, get hired by a friend accused of murdering a girl. His job is to find the real killer, but people aren't talking. Before he can get traction another homicide takes place- and things move toward a dire conclusion.

Title: Ett öga rött
Description: Halim, a young boy who tries to find himself after the death of his mother.

Title: Towards Zero
Description: A wealthy woman holds a party at her estate for family and friends. When a solicitor and the hostess herself are both murdered, only the trusty Inspector Bataille can put together the pieces.

Title: La carta esférica
Description: Spanish nautical adventure. Chasing up an old sea maps in order to find some emeralds in a ship wreck.

Title: Gympl
Description: A comedy about students, teachers, parents and graffiti.

Title: Warum Männer nicht zuhören und Frauen schlecht einparken
Description: The life of a young couple.

Title: Takumi-kun Series: Soshite harukaze ni sasayaite
Description: A 2nd year student is assigned a handsome new roommate at the start of the school year.

Title: Hände weg von Mississippi
Description: A girl is staying with her grandparents for the summer, where she meets a horse called Mississippi. Trouble begins when Mississippi is about to be sold, a fight for Mississippi begins.

Title: Wonderful and Loved by All
Description: Isabella is 30 and single. Her friends have fancy careers, getting married and so on. She is a freelance actor. In her CV, among other merits, she claims being an acrobat. One little lie will leads to another. Bigger.

Title: Tenkôsei: Sayonara anata
Description: A Japanese boy and girl meet again at 15 at school after many years apart. They magically switch bodies. They are forced to switch lives as well.

Title: Saido kâ ni inu
Description: In this coming of age story, ten-year-old Kaoru's life undergoes big changes when her mother leaves home. Kaoru forms a surprising bond with her father's lover, Yoko, as she learns a lot about life during one unforgettable summer.

Title: Karlas kabale
Description: Karla's parents are divorced and she lives with her mom, stepdad, brother and stepbrother. After arguments with mom, dad drinking again and no real X-mas in sight, she runs away from home. Will she be back for Christmas?

Title: Sunday Light
Description: In a small village in Asturias a bitter war between two political parties degenerates in a tragedy for the couple Urbano and Estrella.

Title: Colorado Avenue
Description: In the early 1900s, emigrant Hanna returns from Colorado to Finland. In America she was known as Dollar-Hanna, but in Finland she has to endure the Civil War and live through the prohibition. Hanna's independent spirit will guide her.

Title: Suden vuosi
Description: An unconventional love story of a young and talented student, Sari, suffering from epilepsy, and a middle-aged lecturer Mikko, who is immersed in his own world in the 18th century poetry.

Title: The Ten Lives of Titanic the Cat
Description: Just before she is going on a trip to Denmark, Liv and her best friend Thomas discover a secret room in the basement, and mystical things start happening.

Title: Anja og Viktor - brændende kærlighed
Description: Viktor is a fireman. Anja finally gets the promotion promised long ago at the advertising agency. She is, however, pregnant and only gets 2 weeks maternity leave so Viktor has to step up and in when the baby comes. Will he be emasculated?

Title: Tôkyô tawâ: Okan to boku to, tokidoki, oton
Description: Masaya is going through a period of intensely rebellious behavior. He then learned that his mom has contracted cancer; suddenly, his mother comes to live with him in Tokyo the entire emotional landscape of his life is altered.

Title: Tsubaki Sanjûrô
Description: A scruffy, masterless samurai decides to help a group of young warriors whose leader was taken captive by a gang of ambitious officers.

Title: Sans moi
Description: Anna, a divorced single mother, employs a mysterious young woman called Lise to care for her children.

Title: La question humaine
Description: A psychologist discovers troubling links between Nazism and modern-day big business.

Title: UV
Description: A young and handsome stranger moves in a villa during a particularly hot summer. The intrigued residents let him. But one of them starts questioning the stranger's motives.

Title: The Foreign Duck, the Native Duck and God in a Coin Locker
Description: A university student finds himself wrapped up in the bizarre world of his next door neighbor, learning about his history and relationship with a girl who changed his life.

Title: Koisuru madori
Description: Yui, a college student, moves in to her first own apartment, where she begins her new independent life in a big city. Soon after the upstairs neighbor Takashi sparks her interest.

Title: Beyond the Years
Description: A drama centered on brother-and-sister musicians trained to perform the epic Korean poems known as pansori.

Title: Sono toki wa kare ni yoroshiku
Description: A romantic love story of Satoshi, Karin and Yuji - who were friends in their childhood and suddenly bump back into each others' life after 13 years of parted away. Gentle, moving and meaningful, that what love is in "Say hello for me".

Title: O Mistério da Estrada de Sintra
Description: A critique of the romantic Portuguese society of the nineteenth century.

Title: The Sea Within
Description: A married woman falls in love with an Economics Professor and becomes pregnant and insane by the physical relationship outside her married life.

Title: Little DJ: Chiisana koi no monogatari
Batterî
Description: Takumi Harada and his family moves to Okayama during spring break before his entry to Junior High School. On the baseball field, Takumi has enormous confidence in his ability as a pitcher, but socially he is a loner.

Title: Anfea: The Movie
Description: She was the best crime fighter on the force...until a powerful conspiracy turned everyone against her.

Title: Orion-za kara no shôtaijô
Description: "The Invitation from Cinema Orion" tells the story of a couple's undying love for the cinema and each other.

Title: Remon no koro
Description: The experiences and relationships of five senior students at a rural high school, during the last year leading to graduation.

Title: Tonari machi sensô
Description: Kitahara Shuji, an ordinary business man turns into a spy for his town's war against a neighboring town in a Dystopian society.

Title: Podecrer!
Description: A group of high-school seniors who must face choices of everyday life: problems within groups and with having to face the future.

Title: Best Wishes for Tomorrow
Description: A Japanese Class B war criminal sets out to take full responsibility for the execution of American Airmen.

Title: Makiguri no ana
Description: Two holes appear suddenly on the walls of a cheap apartment where a piddling fiction writer, Makiguri, lives. What he wrote fiercely after that was his own death.

Title: Chouga
Description: A transposition of Leo Tolstoy's Anna Karenina to the modern day city of Almaty.

Title: La vérité ou presque
Description: Anne is married to Thomas, who has a weakness for Caroline, Marc's young wife, Anne's ex-husband, herself sensitive to Vincent's charm, terribly jealous of Lucas.

Title: Dennis P.
Description: Nothing is more difficult than stealing a heart.

Title: Un amore su misura
Description: Since his wife left him, Corrado Olmi's life is a boring routine of home, work and fishing. He thinks his loneliness will end when he finally meets the perfect woman.

Title: Little King Macius
Description: Macius was 9 when he became king of a small country. The young Macius quickly realizes that running a kingdom is not child's play, especially when the general of the armies tries to take advantage of his naivety.

Title: Rennschwein Rudi Rüssel 2 - Rudi rennt wieder!
Agi and Emma
Description: AGI is a warm tale of friendship forged between a lonely boy Agi and an elderly lady Ema. Abandoned by everyone, these two outcast manage to unite and overcome harsh reality.

Title: Tsukigami
Description: An unfortunate low-ranking samurai Hikoshiro decides to pray in a small shrine and ask gods for help. Unfortunately he accidentally attracts the attention of gods of poverty, pestilence and death.

Title: Casa de Remolienda
Description: Set in the 1950s in a town in the south of Chile, three young men who have just ventured down from the hills begin courting three mysterious prostitutes.

Title: Dolphin blue: Fuji, mou ichido sora e
Life in the Abyss
Description: As a flashback, a young man, living with his parents and with vague aspirations to find a better life, is fascinated by the confidence of a professional gambler, in 1972 Valencia.

Title: Postpartum
Description: A bitter young man searches for his birth mother to deliver his justice for being given up at birth, not knowing his biological mother has hired a private investigator to locate him.

Title: Ainda Orangotangos
Description: The film tells the story of sixteen people in the hottest day of the year in the city of Porto Alegre.

Title: Valsa para Bruno Stein
Description: A poetic film about the relationship of three generations that share the same house and the re-find of love between a man and a woman that didn't believe in a new love.

Title: Dublin Day
Description: An examination of Dublin as it is today and as it was in 1904, retracing the steps of the characters in James Joyce's novel Ulysses.

Title: Little Moth
Description: A couple purchases an eleven-year old girl who cannot walk, with the intention of using her to earn money through begging.

Title: The Dark Corners of the Shelves
Aozora no rûretto
Description: Window cleaners Tatsuyo, Yuusuke, Kazuma, Kudou, and Hagiwara are of different ages and backgrounds, but work side by side with their heads in the clouds. One day an accident at work completely changes their lives.

Title: Casino Royale
Description: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

Title: The Prestige
Description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Title: Children of Men
Description: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

Title: The Da Vinci Code
Description: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

Title: A Good Year
Description: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

Title: The Devil Wears Prada
Description: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

Title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
Description: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

Title: Little Children
Description: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Massachusetts.

Title: Marie Antoinette
Description: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 14 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

Title: Poseidon
Description: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

Title: Eragon
Description: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

Title: Aquamarine
Description: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Title: Paprika
Description: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

Title: Charlotte's Web
Description: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

Title: A Scanner Darkly
Description: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

Title: Candy
Description: A poet falls in love with an art student who gravitates to his bohemian lifestyle -- and his love of heroin. Hooked as much on one another as they are on the drug, their relationship alternates between states of oblivion, self-destruction, and despair.

Title: Death Note
Description: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

Title: Notes on a Scandal
Description: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

Title: The Painted Veil
Description: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

Title: Zoom
Description: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

Title: Tell No One
Description: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

Title: Arthur and the Invisibles
Description: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Title: The Ultimate Gift
Description: A deceased billionaire leaves his spoiled adult grandson a series of odd tasks to perform in order to receive "the ultimate gift," with the resentful grandson having no idea what that might be.

Title: Tales from Earthsea
Description: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

Title: Stormbreaker
Description: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special Operations Division of the UK's secret intelligence service, MI6, into a mission which will save millions of lives.

Title: All the King's Men
Description: Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.

Title: The Sentinel
Description: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

Title: Starter for 10
Description: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

Title: The Namesake
Description: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

Title: Peaceful Warrior
Description: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

Title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Description: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

Title: Eternal Summer
Description: Two best friends Shane and Jonathan learn more about themselves in an ever evolving sexuality.

Title: Hoot
Description: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.

Title: School for Scoundrels
Description: A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda.

Title: Freedomland
Description: A black police detective must solve a strange case of a kidnapped boy and deal with a big racial protest.

Title: The Night Listener
Description: In the midst of his crumbling relationship, a radio show host begins speaking to his biggest fan, a young boy, via the telephone. But when questions about the boy's identity come up, the host's life is thrown into chaos.

Title: OSS 117: Cairo, Nest of Spies
Description: Secret agent OSS 117 foils Nazis, beds local beauties, and brings peace to the Middle East.

Title: The Good German
Description: While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation which involves his former mistress and his driver.

Title: Flicka
Description: Young Katy claims a wild horse as her own -- an effort to prove to her father that she is capable of taking over the family horse ranch one day.

Title: One Night with the King
Description: In Biblical times, a girl disguises her Jewish origins when the Persian king comes looking for a new bride among his subjects.

Title: Dnevnoy dozor
Description: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Title: Captain Alatriste: The Spanish Musketeer
Description: Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.

Title: How to Eat Fried Worms
Description: During the first day of his new school year, a fifth grade boy squares off against a bully and winds up accepting a dare that could change the balance of power within the class.

Title: Ask the Dust
Description: Mexican beauty Camilla Lopez (Salma Hayek) hopes to rise above her station by marrying a wealthy American. That is complicated by meeting Arturo Bandini (Colin Farrell), a first-generation Italian hoping to land a writing career and a blue-eyed blonde on his arm.

Title: The Celestine Prophecy
Description: An adaptation of James Redfield's novel about the search for a sacred manuscript in the Peruvian rain forest.

Title: Boy Culture
Description: A successful male escort describes in a series of confessions his tangled romantic relationships with his two roommates and an older, enigmatic male client.

Title: Kiraware Matsuko no isshô
Description: When Matsuko dies of murder, her nephew Sho gets to progressively unveil many details of her mysterious past, discovering she wasn't only a forgotten outcast but led a very interesting yet bizarre life.

Title: In a Dark Place
Description: An art teacher is hired as nanny for 2 orphans, a boy and girl, at a huge, isolated country estate. The nanny starts seeing dead, former employees. Is she mad or is the estate haunted?

Title: Don't Worry, I'm Fine
Description: Lili returns from holidays and learns that her twin brother left the house after a violent argument with their father.

Title: Lady Chatterley
Description: A French adaptation of the second (and much less well-known) version of D.H. Lawrence's erotic tale.

Title: The Maidens' Conspiracy
Description: Tirante the knight is as committed to fighting the Turks in Constantinople as he is to relieving Carmesina, the heiress to the Byzantine Empire, of her virginity.

Title: Jar City
Description: A murder opens up a bleak trail of long buried secrets and small town corruption for a worn out police detective and his squad.

Title: The Lost
Description: 19-year-old Ray Pye murders two young women. Four years later, detective Charlie Schilling knows that Ray did it. He just needs to prove it. Meanwhile, Ray has met his match in a new girl in town, Katherine Wallace.

Title: House of the Sleeping Beauties
Description: Still mourning the loss of his beloved wife and daughter in a horrendous car accident, a reclusive sexagenarian decides to visit a rather peculiar and secretive brothel.

Title: The Yacoubian Building
Description: Meditations on corruption, fundamentalism, prostitution, homosexuality, and drugs in central Cairo.

Title: The Hottest State
Description: A young actor from Texas tries to make it in New York while struggling in his relationship with a beautiful singer/songwriter.

Title: Thr3e
Description: Innocent lives hang on the whim of an elusive psychopathic murderer whose strange riddles and impossible timelines force three people into a mission to end the game before one or all of them die.

Title: Elementarteilchen
Description: Two half brothers in Berlin, 30+, one an introverted scientist, the other a sexually frustrated teacher, have no love life. That's about to change.

Title: Obsluhoval jsem anglického krále
Description: A look at the glamorous life at an old-world Prague hotel.

Title: Gradiva (C'est Gradiva qui vous appelle)
Description: An orientalist professor researching Delacroix's North African work becomes entangled in an S&M waking dream in Morocco.

Title: Le dernier des fous
Description: A boy is forced to witness the slow and painful collapse of his family.

Title: Love's Abiding Joy
Description: Tragedy tests the faith and love of a family of pioneers as they carve out a life on the frontier.

Title: The Visitation
Description: The Visitation reveals a small town torn apart by supernatural events involving a mysterious stranger and his unsolved past.

Title: The Book of Revelation
Description: An erotic mystery about power and sex, the entanglement of victim and perpetrator, and a man's struggle to regain his lost self.

Title: Love and Honor
Description: A look at the relationship between a young blind samurai (Kimura) and his wife, who will make a sacrifice in order to defend her husband's honor.

Title: Doomsday: The Sinking of Japan
Description: Japan will sink down to the deep sea. The governments only hope is evacuate all Japanese to some other countries.

Title: American Masters and Champions of the Martial Arts
Description: Fashion photographer Vincent Mandel, in the midst of a difficult divorce, is suddenly being accused of rape and extorted. What does his former classmate Joseph Plender want from him?

Title: Umrao Jaan
Description: J.P. Dutta's adaption of the Urdu novel "Umrao Jan Ada" by Mirza Haadi Ruswa (1905).

Title: O Cheiro do Ralo
Description: A pawn shop proprietor buys used goods from desperate locals--as much to play perverse power games as for his own livelihood, but when the perfect rump and a backed-up toilet enter his life, he loses all control.

Title: Rene hjerter
Description: Kriss lives at a mental institution, where he spends all day watching an old black-and-white film called "Rene hjerter". One day he and his friend, Willy, escapes the institution to find the star of "Rene hjerter", Ulla Vilstrup.

Title: Die Wolke
Description: DIE WOLKE (The Cloud) is about a breakdown of a nuclear power station in Germany and the story of two teenager-lovers Hannah and Elmar who take refuge. 38.000 people die and Hannah unfortunately becomes contaminated.

Title: La faute à Fidel!
Description: A 9-year-old girl weathers big changes in her household as her parents become radical political activists in 1970-71 Paris.

Title: Kunsten at græde i kor
Description: Southern Jutland, DK, early 1970s: A dysfunctional family is burdened by an evil, self-righteous father, who manipulates his 11 y.o. son and 14 y.o. daughter with his repeated suicide threats.

Title: Urideul-ui haengbok-han shigan
Description: A suicidal girl started to visit a convicted murderer awaiting execution every Thursday.

Title: El camino de los ingleses
Description: A coming-of-age tale charting the first loves, lusts and obsessions of friends on vacation at the end of the 1970s.

Title: Master i Margarita
Description: Interwoven are a satire of the 1930's under Stalin, the inner struggle of Pontius Pilate around the execution of Jesus, and the love story between a writer in Moscow and his lover Margarita.

Title: Valley of Flowers
Description: A great Asian love story, an unforgettable tale about passion, death and reincarnation. A mesmerizing Himalayan epic that spans two centuries, from the Silk Route of the early 19th century to the bustling metropolis of modern-day Tokyo.

Title: Fight Club: Members Only
Description: Four college friends starts an underground fight club in order to earn quick money, nevertheless they become suspects of a murder of a man, who turns out to be the mob boss' brother.

Title: Saving Shiloh
Description: Marty Preston and Judd Travers must join together to clear the latter's name after he is accused of killing a man he once fought in a bar.

Title: The Hawk Is Dying
Description: When stricken with a family tragedy, George becomes obsessed with taming a wild, red-tail hawk. In a tour-de-force performance he locks himself into a battle of wills with a fierce creature that would rather die than succumb.

Title: 46-okunen no koi
Description: A visually stylish tale of two male prisoners bonded by emotion, love and murder.

Title: Opal Dream
Description: A young girl's relationship with her imaginary friends resonates throughout her town in the Australian Outback.

Title: Brave Story
Description: When eleven-year-old Wataru is told he can change his destiny by entering a magic gateway into another world, he jumps at the chance. But on his quest to find the Tower of Fortune and be granted any wish, he must conjure up all his bravery to battle a world of demons, his own friends and ultimately himself.

Title: The Work and the Glory III: A House Divided
The Treatment
Description: Jake Singer is at loose ends in New York City, and neck deep in psychoanalysis with the outrageous Dr. Morales, when he meets the enigmatic and beautiful widow Allegra Marshall.

Title: Rain
Description: A musical prodigy comes to grips with her true past and real identity. Raised by an African American family, she learns that she is actually the daughter of a white socialite who had paid her step-family to raise her as their own.

Title: The Ugly Swans
Description: The writer is invited to the town of Tashlinsk by the mutants who emerged after an unnatural and constant rain causing the evacuation of the city, and by the children who are studying the unearthly knowledge of mutants.

Title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
Description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

Title: Emmas Glück
