Description: Max is very ill. He decides to steal in his own company. But when he tries to run away with the money, he has a car accident that takes him to Emma's pigs farm.

Title: N (Io e Napoleone)
Description: When Napoleon arrives to Elba Island in exile, Martino, an idealist teacher and writer, plots to kill him.

Title: Things That Hang from Trees
Description: Connie Mae is a single mother and lingerie model in a bible belt 1960's southern town, a one woman scandal. She struggles to keep her life afloat amongst judging small town eyes that both resent and love her beauty.

Title: Hakase no aishita sûshiki
Description: The story of a single mother housekeeper and a mathematics professor, who has a brain damage.

Title: Disappearances
Description: Forced to smuggle whiskey in an attempt to save a family, Quebec Bill (Kris Kristofferson) and his son embark on an unforgettable trip through the vast reaches of the wilderness.

Title: Pirates of Treasure Island
Description: An innkeeper's life of monotony suddenly changes when he comes into possession of a treasure map.

Title: Kan shang qu hen mei
Description: A young boy starting school for the first time struggles to fit in to a strictly regimented society in in post-revolutionary China.

Title: Kurai tokoro de machiawase
Description: A precarious loner sneaks into a blind woman's home and begins living there without her noticing. Meanwhile, the woman mourns her recently deceased father and struggles to remain connected to the world.

Title: Afblijven
Description: Melissa is a nice and pretty girl with natural dreams and ambitions. But because of bad influences, her life becomes a nightmare. Until her real friends decide to get her out of there.

Title: Memories of Tomorrow
Description: A successful businessman's family life is shattered by an early onset of Alzheimer's.

Title: 48 Shades
Description: A sensitive, late-blooming teenage boy moves in with his twenty-something aunt to finish his final year of school, where he finds himself falling for her house-mate.

Title: Der Räuber Hotzenplotz
Description: Children's Story about a allways unlucky Highwayman of the southern geman Forestaicion's in the later half of the 19th Century,witty Grammafication by the Author,in,off Course german Lingua.

Title: Quixotic/Honor de Cavelleria
Description: In this minimalist take on Cervantes' Don Quixote story, there are no windmills - only wind, trees, grass and sunlight. It is a soulful study of two lone figures against an unspoiled landscape.

Title: The Stone Merchant
Description: Ludovico is a precious stone merchant who trades between Europe and the Middle East. He is also an Islam convert, with Jihad as his highest religious duty, plotting a terrorist attack on an epic scale that will bring the West to its knees.

Title: Carnal Utopia
Description: Marcelo Santiago's period romance Dancing in Utopia (AKA Sonjos E Desejos 2006) explores variations of passion and lust as manifest in a potentially incendiary love triangle ...

Title: Inugami-ke no ichizoku
Description: A web of deceit, adultery and greed manifests in Kon Ichikawa's remake of his own 1976 hit about a murder investigation that reveals years of hidden skeletons and a shocking family secret.

Title: Wounded Animals
Description: Animals, when they've been wounded, lick themselves where it hurts. Nonetheless, they also pick themselves up and keep going; wounded, but still alive.

Title: Nihon igai zenbu chinbotsu
Description: Due to global warming and the shifting of tectonic plates, most of the Earth's land has sunk beneath the surface of the ocean. Only Japan remains and refugees from all nations try to incorporate themselves into Japanese society:

Title: TKKG und die rätselhafte Mind-Machine
Description: Four teenage sleuths solve a case regarding abducted children and teenagers and a mind machine.

Title: Rokonok
Description: Young honest public official is sworn in after his predecessor had to leave due to a corruption scandal. Soon, the young idealist discovers just how far-reaching the corruption is in his town and how easy it is to become corrupt yourself.

Title: La educación de las hadas
Description: A happily married woman with an eight-year-old son suddenly decides to end her relationship with her second husband. His son thinks only a fairy can save their marriage. But do fairies exist?

Title: A Thousand Kisses
Description: After a death in the family turns his world upside down, an introverted young novelist struggles to maintain his relationship with his successful girlfriend.

Title: Yi ma de hou xian dai sheng huo
Description: Ye Rutang, a single-living woman in her late fifties, struggles to maintain a dignified life amid the dangers of Shanghai.

Title: Jakarta Undercover
Description: How is Jakarta at midnight? You will find it out in this movie.

Title: El carnaval de Sodoma
Description: Residents of a bordello scurry to put together their outfits for an annual carnival.

Title: Saga no gabai-baachan
Description: Gabai Granny is based on the bestseller Saga No Gabai Baachan (Gabai Granny from Saga), which is penned by comedian Shimada Yoshichi as he recounts his childhood memories of growing up under the care of his grandmother.

Title: Herbert
Description: Herbert, a middle-aged man who believes he can talk to the dead, experiences fame and fortune after one of his predictions come true. However, an organisation tries to expose him and ruin his life.

Title: Le pressentiment
Description: A Parisian lawyer (Darroussin) moves to a working-class neighborhood in an attempt to shed his social conditioning and bourgeois values.

Title: La stella che non c'è
Description: Labourer Vincenzo travels from Italy to China in search of a machine with a deficiency that was produced in the now defunct establishment at which Vincenzo worked for years.

Title: Le lièvre de Vatanen
Description: A reporter who's soon to receive the Journalist of the Year Award hits a young hare on his way home. He gets out of the car to see if it's ok, but the hare runs off deeper into the forest, taking him on adventure of self-discovery.

Title: Peullai, daedi
Description: Jang Ga-Pil is an ordinary middle-aged father. One day, he returns home to learn that his teenage daughter was assaulted by a group of guys at a karaoke bar. He then concocts a plan to stab the boy on his way to school.

Title: Si le vent soulève les sables
Nondito Noroke
Description: A simple middle class family having problems because of their mentally sick girl.

Title: Nothing But Ghosts
Description: Episodes about different stages of relationships: from flirtation to falling out of love.

Title: Secret of the Cave
Description: A young American boy spends his summer in Ireland and solves the mystery that captivates the entire village. Driven by curiosity and his own search for meaning in life, he faces his fears and discovers the Secret of the Cave.

Title: L'estate del mio primo bacio
Description: In the summer of 1987, the 13-year-old Camilla Randone falls in love with Adelmo Franci, the boy who cleans the pool of his villa at the Argentario sea.

Title: A Christmas Carol: Scrooge's Ghostly Tale
Description: This all-animal version of the much-loved classic by Charles Dickens is retold in stunning CGI animation and is destined to become a family favorite for years to come.

Title: Aju teukbyeolhan sonnim
Description: A young girl is asked by strangers to impersonate a prodigal daughter to fulfill a father's dying wish, and in doing so tests the fragility of family bonds.

Title: Der Liebeswunsch
Description: When she was a student, Anja worked in the department of Lars and Marlene, two soon-to-be married doctors. At the time, she worked with one of the couple's friends, Leonhard, whom she eventually married and with whom she had a child

Title: Ajiantamu burû
Description: Adiantum Blue is about a pianist with a terminal illness, who wishes to spend her last happy days with her lover in Nice.

Title: Yôki na gyangu ga chikyû o mawasu
Description: A comedy about four strangers who decide to make a gang and start robbing banks just for the fun of it.

Title: Salt of the Earth
Description: Four friends in heart and soul with army experience in their past, plan the perfect crime without thinking that reality always surprises those who try to trick it.

Title: La caja
Description: Strange events occur when Eloise, widow of Don Lucius, must ask her neighbor to lend her her house for the wake. This petition resurrects a series of memories involving all the neighbors.

Title: Quei loro incontri
Description: This movie is the sequel of Straub and Huillet's Dalla nube alla resistenza and like its prequel is inspired by Cesare Pavese's book Dialoghi con Leucò.

Title: Kenchô no hoshi
Description: An ambitious clerk Satoru Nomura is sent to Mantendo, an unsuccessful supermarket where he needs to cooperate with a Ninomiya Aki, a hardworking employee. Due to his arrogant attitude he gets disliked by the staff, including Ninomiya.

Title: Tin sang yat dui
Description: An advertising executive with a carefree lifestyle discovers she has breast cancer.

Title: Oyayubi sagashi
Description: Eight school friends innocently join together to play a game that, if played well, promised to make their greatest dreams come true. But, they soon discover that mistakes may cost them more than even their dreams could tell.

Title: C'est beau une ville la nuit
Mamiya kyodai
Description: What do two nerdy brothers have to do to finally gain acceptance, become popular and meet women? Why, throw a curry party of course. Who to invite? How about the girl at the video store, the co-worker and the girls we could never ever get?

Title: Aogeba tôtoshi
Description: Aogeba Totoshi is a film about mourning and coping with loss.

Title: Charell
Description: Near the Bois de Boulogne, Daniel meets Charell by accident. The two men haven't seen each other for twenty years.

Title: Ja wam pokaze!
Description: Judyta and Adam love each other very much, but everyday life starts getting hard. Judyta's daughter turns eighteen soon and she has just "unblocked the fuse in a hormone bomb". Despite the problems, Judyta and Adam plan to get married.

Title: Catch a Wave
Description: Three high school students decide to challenge the legendary surf at Shonan Beach.

Title: The Monster's Mind
Description: A court-appointed psychiatrist must look beyond the cold facade of a killer in order to discover the motives behind his terrible crime.

Title: Dvoynaya familiya
Description: A happy new father learns that's he is not the natural father of his son; despite this he decides to raise the child as his own. His wife leaves him after several years of quiet acrimony for the boy's natural father.

Title: Vier Töchter
Description: At 30, Hillevi learns that she has been adopted. She then goes in search of her biological mother, real estate agent, whom she finds in a luxurious residence. She dares not approach it and begins to observe it, as well as her three sisters

Title: Niotkuda s lyubovyu, ili Vesyolye pokhorony
Forestillingen om et ukompliceret liv med en mand
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Title: Pride & Prejudice
Description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Description: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

Title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Description: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

Title: The Amityville Horror
Description: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

Title: War of the Worlds
Description: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

Title: Lie with Me
Description: An outgoing, sexually aggressive young woman meets and begins a torrid affair with an equally aggressive young man in which their affair begins to bring a strain on their personal lives.

Title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Description: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

Title: Memoirs of a Geisha
Description: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Description: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

Title: Nanny McPhee
Description: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

Title: Thank You for Smoking
Description: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

Title: The Constant Gardener
Description: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

Title: Dark Water
Description: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

Title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
Description: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

Title: The Interpreter
Description: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

Title: The Ring Two
Description: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

Title: In Her Shoes
Description: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

Title: Monamour
Description: A neglected housewife has an affair behind her boring husband's back, triggering a passionate transformation. Now, a dash of infidelity awakens his dormant enthusiasm for her; however, is his new-found interest too little, too late?

Title: Sahara
Description: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

Title: Yours, Mine & Ours
Description: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widow handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of her 10 and his 8 children.

Title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
Description: The Bakers, while on vacation, find themselves competing with a rival family of eight children.

Title: Just Like Heaven
Description: A lonely landscape architect falls for the spirit of the beautiful woman who used to live in his new apartment.

Title: Be Cool
Description: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

Title: Fun with Dick and Jane
Description: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

Title: Breakfast on Pluto
Description: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

Title: Hostage
Description: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

Title: Fever Pitch
Description: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

Title: Asylum
Description: A woman becomes very curious about one of her psychiatrist husband's inmates, a man who was found guilty in the murder and disfigurement of his former wife.

Title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer
Description: On his way to becoming an immortal demon, a gang leader orchestrates the murder of an ex-con and his girlfriend.

Title: Because of Winn-Dixie
Description: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Title: Oliver Twist
Description: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Title: Where the Truth Lies
Description: Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

Title: Must Love Dogs
Description: A thirty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.

Title: Tideland
Description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

Title: An American Haunting
Description: Based on the true events of the only case in U.S. history where a spirit caused the death of a man.

Title: Everything Is Illuminated
Description: A young Jewish American man endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village, that was ultimately razed by the Nazis, with the help of an eccentric local.

Title: Thumbsucker
Description: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

Title: Shopgirl
Description: A film adaptation of Steve Martin's novel about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man.

Title: Factotum
Description: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

Title: The Dark
Description: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.

Title: The Ice Harvest
Description: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

Title: Tsotsi
Description: Six days in the violent life of a young Johannesburg gang leader.

Title: My Brother's Wife
Description: Unable to get intimate with her husband of 10 years, a woman embarks on a steamy affair with his brother.

Title: Ripley Under Ground
Description: Professional swindler hides the death of a famous artist in order to earn money by selling pictures on his own behalf.

Title: The Mistress of Spices
Description: An immigrant in San Francisco brings the Indian magic with her thru spices. To keep the magic, she can never leave the spice store or touch another's skin. One day, a handsome architect bachelor enters her store.

Title: Loverboy
Description: A neglected daughter becomes a possessive mother in an emotional journey into the heart and mind of a woman who loved too much.

Title: Left Behind III: World at War
Description: The world falls into chaos as Nicolae Carpathia detonates nuclear devices across the globe and stages multiple devastating attacks against both the Tribulation Force and an international militia, led by U.S. President Gerald Fitzhugh.

Title: Bad Girls from Valley High
Description: Three snobbish high school girls prematurely age brought on from a curse, a drug (or something) after the arrival of new transfer student whom they believe is connected to a murder they committed a year earlier. A fate worse than death.

Title: Fateless
Description: 14-year-old György's life is torn apart in WWII Hungary, as he is deported first to Auschwitz and then to Buchenwald, where he is forced to become a man in the midst of hatred, and what it really means to be Jewish.

Title: Tristram Shandy
Description: Director Michael Winterbottom (Northam) attempts to shoot the adaptation of Laurence Sterne's essentially unfilmable novel, "The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman."

Title: The Great Yokai War
Description: A young boy is chosen as the defender of good and must team up with Japan's ancient spirits and creatures of lore to attempt to destroy the forces of evil.

Title: Seven Swords
Description: Seven warriors come together to protect a village from a diabolical General.

Title: Bee Season
Description: A wife and mother begins a downward emotional spiral, as her husband avoids their collapsing marriage by immersing himself in his 11 year-old daughter's quest to become a spelling bee champion.

Title: The Ring Finger
Description: Iris finds a new job working in a preservation lab where she gradually enters into a troubled relationship with her boss.

Title: Lassie
Description: A family in financial crisis is forced to sell Lassie, their beloved dog. Hundreds of miles away from her true family, Lassie escapes and sets out on a journey home.

Title: The Ax
Description: A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.

Title: Romanzo Criminale
Description: Set in the 1970s, it's the story of three lifelong friends who take control of organized crime in Rome.

Title: Tjenare kungen
Description: A story about a young girl who leaves her hometown to pursue her dream of becoming a famous punk artist.

Title: Empire of the Wolves
Description: A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.

Title: Paheli
Description: A folk tale - supernatural love story about a ghost who falls in love with a newlywed woman.

Title: Heading South
Description: Three female tourists have their eyes opened while visiting the poverty-stricken and dangerous world of 1980s Haiti.

Title: Otoko-tachi no Yamato
Description: The movie follows 3 Japanese friends from embarking on Yamato, the world's largest battleship, until it's sunk 3 1/2 years later on April 7, 1945 on it's way to Okinawa to stop American advance at the end of WWII.

Title: Separate Lies
Description: A couple's marriage is complicated by the introduction of a third party.

Title: Parineeta
Description: The lifelong romance between Lolita (Balan) and Shekar (Khan) is upset by the arrival of another man.

Title: Mrs. Palfrey at the Claremont
Description: All but abandoned by her family in a London retirement hotel, an elderly woman strikes up a curious friendship with a young writer.

Title: The Fine Art of Love: Mine Ha-Ha
Kim Novak Never Swam in Genesaret's Lake
Tara Road
Description: Two women -- one American, one Irish -- swap houses and alter the course of their lives.

Title: La fiesta del Chivo
Description: Urania Cabral (Isabella Rossellini) returns to Santo Domingo, after several years, and remembers her and her family's relationship to Rafael Leonidas Trujillo (Tomas Milian), the Dominican dictator, as well as the events surrounding his assassination.

Title: Rosario Tijeras
Description: Two friends meet and are seduced by sensuous hit woman Rosario Tijeras. Full of hatred, violence is her way of life. The trio loose themselves in a passionate love triangle where the pain of love will be confused with that of death.

Title: Brothers of the Head
Description: In the 1970s a music promoter plucks Siamese twins from obscurity and grooms them into a freakish rock'n'roll act. A dark tale of sex, strangeness and rock music.

Title: One Missed Call 2
Description: A Japanese restaurant cook/owner dies after answering his daughter's cellphone. Other people are getting strange, same ringtone calls as well and dying painfully. It happened in Taiwan as well. Can the police stop it if it's a ghost?

Title: The Crime of Father Amaro
Description: An young priest commits a crime when he falls in love with a beautiful and troubled woman.

Title: Deepwater
Description: A drifter comes to the town of Deepwater and is seduced into a twisted game of deceit and murder.

Title: Nearing Grace
Description: In the shadow of a family loss, the youngest son develops interest in an attractive high school classmate, paying little mind of her athletic boyfriend or of his own female best friend.

Title: Shinobi: Heart Under Blade
Description: Star-crossed lovers must fight on opposing sides in a battle that will determine the next Shogun.

Title: Gabrielle
Description: The marriage between Gabrielle and Jean begins to fray after the discovery of a letter that belongs to Gabrielle.

Title: Nynne
Description: The Danish Bridget Jones.

Title: Sandor slash Ida
Description: Party girl meets a male ballet dancer on the Internet.

Title: The Tenants
Description: In an abandoned tenement, an African-American militant writer and a Jewish novelist develop a friendship while struggling to complete their novels, but inner tension rises between the two.

Title: The Work and the Glory II: American Zion
King of the Lost World
Description: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's action-adventure classic, four plane crash survivors encounter danger in a world that time forgot.

Title: Hanging Garden
Description: A family struggling to live together even with the outrageous behaviors from each family members.

Title: The Days of Abandonment
Description: Olga's life is shattered when her husband abandons her. This prompts her to fall into a period of self-degradation and self-destructive behaviors.

Title: The Californians
Description: Caught between Olive's righteousness and Gavin's affection, the idealistic and innocent Zoe must choose between a cause she's grown up supporting, or the affections of a man who stands for everything she believes is wrong.

Title: Tokyo Tower
Description: Toru Kojima and his friend Koji are young student boys with one thing in common - they both love to date older women. Koji is a playboy with several women, young and older, whereas Toru is a romantic with his heart set on on certain lady.

Title: Snowland
Description: In the snowy landscape of Lapland, a newly-widowed writer discovers the traces of a bygone love story through which she finds a way back to her own life.

Title: Lorelei
Description: A drama set during World War II where a submarine carrying a secret weapon attempts to stop a planned third atomic bombing of Japan. Based on Harutoshi Fukui's novel Shuusen no Lorelei.

Title: Angels in Fast Motion
Description: The intense, realistic and unflinching tale of Maria, Allan and Steso, who are struggling for survival in urban life, about drugs.

Title: Iluminados por el fuego
Description: The suicide of an old soldier buddy brings up some old memories for an Argentinian man.

Title: Hating Alison Ashley
Description: Classmates Erica Yurgen and Alison Ashley vie with each other to become the undisputed star of their class.

Title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
Description: "An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge" is a psychological thriller that takes many emotional turns and finally catches the audience off guard as it ends with an unsettling, macabre twist.

Title: American Visa
Description: After being denied an American visa, a Bolivian professor becomes involved in a web of criminal activities, holds-up the American consulate and falls for a beautiful prostitute from the Bolivian lowlands.

Title: Guy X
Description: A black comedy set in 1979, about a soldier mistakenly posted to an Arctic military base.

Title: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
Description: The Beresfords investigate mysterious deaths at an old people's home.

Title: Het schnitzelparadijs
Description: A romantic comedy about the adventures of Nordip Doenia, a young Moroccan criminal in The Netherlands. His parents destine him for great things, but Nordip clearly has different ideas

Title: Heidi
Description: Young orphan Heidi (Emma Bolger) stays with her grandfather (Max von Sydow) in the mountains.

Title: 50 Ways of Saying Fabulous
Description: Growing up is mystifying, but Billy discovers all he has to be is himself

Title: Loranga, Masarin & Dartanjang
Description: Three days of the wacky lives of an unemployed but competitive man, his son and father who thinks he has a new profession every day.

Title: Le survenant
Description: A stranger knocks on Didace his door. As he refuses to name himself, he is nicknamed the Survenant. Didace soon realized that this stranger, in addition to being a good worker, is a cheerful fellow who brings life to a house.

Title: Once You're Born You Can No Longer Hide
Description: A coming-of-age drama set in contemporary Italy.

Title: Bôkoku no îjisu
Description: A biological weapon is smuggled aboard a high tech battleship named Aegis. Militants are determined to unleash it on Japan. But a brave Chief Petty Officer has other ideas. He and an undercover agent attempt to stop them.

Title: Obaba
Description: A rural drama set in Obaba, a mythical region in northern Spain, where a young filmmaker struggled to capture the feel of the area, which in turn leads to a wealth of self-discovery.

Title: Quo Vadis, Baby?
Description: A private detective investigates her sister's suicide 16 years earlier.

Title: Le parfum de la dame en noir
Description: Newly married, Mathilde and Robert are honeymooning at a resort owned by their friends Edith and Arthur, the Chateau d'Hercule. But an unpleasant shock is in store for them.

Title: Aspects of Love
Description: A young soldier and a starving actress engage in a love affair they will remember for years to come, even after it's end.

Title: Gu lian hua
Description: A woman's lesbian feeling towards two different female singers - one in Shanghai during late 1940s and another in Taiwan during late 1950s.

Title: U-Carmen eKhayelitsha
Description: A version of Georges Bizet's Carmen, set in a modern-day South African township.

Title: The Three Musketeers
Description: Alexander Dumas' classic swashbuckling novel comes to life in this delightful interpretation told through the art of puppetry.

Title: Rascals on the Road
Description: Four kids - Eugen, Wrigley, Bäschteli and Eduard - leave for an adventure around Switzerland, searching for the fabulous treasure of Titicaca Lake, discovered by Fritzli Bühler.

Title: Gisela
Description: Revolves around the encounters of three protagonists who become entangled in a kind of love triangle.

Title: Haru no yuki
Description: Early 20th century Japan. Kiyoaki Matsugae, a young aristocrat falls in love with a girl he grew up with; Satoko Ayakura, who is to be married to a prince of the royal family.

Title: Le passager
Description: Thomas has just learned of the death of his brother Richard, whom he has not seen for several years. He leaves Paris and goes to Marseille to recognize the body.

Title: Veronika wa shinu koto ni shita
Kalpurush
Description: A man struggles with his memories of his powerful father.

Title: The Heart of the Beast
Description: After his mother's death, Stephanos inherits her debts and, in order to pay them, decides to help an old classmate who wants to rob a bank.

Title: The Jealous God
Description: A reserved schoolteacher battles against family conflict when he falls in love with the 'wrong' young woman.

Title: Hasami otoko
Description: A psychological thriller about a series of murders committed using scissors, the people who carried out the murders, and the police who are trying to catch them.

Title: Rainbow boy... Rung tua thii paet khawng khwaam rak
Description: Three teen students growing and maturing together in Bangkok, Thailand as they deal with family, peer pressure, and coming to terms with their own sexuality.

Title: Semishigure
Description: A young swordsman is forced into a tough situation. He must resolve a potential power struggle that involves his adolescent crush Fuku.

Title: Basain
Description: A poor farmer Dhane and his family suffer one calamity after another, and a series of quarrels with fellow villagers forces them to leave the village.

Title: In za pûru
Description: 3 people suffering from psychiatric problems, and a doctor stranger than any of them.

Title: The Wretched Life of Juanita Narboni
Onaji tsuki wo miteiru
Description: Two young heroines struggles to keep their true gender identities a secret when they are forced apart by they fascist government. Watch as they travel through worlds of bureaucracy to find each other once again.

Title: O Fatalista
Description: A driver and his master drive around Portugal, having philosophical conversations throughout the journey. An adaptation of Denis Diderot's "The Fatalist and His Master".

Title: Yokubô
Description: A young man searching for physical comfort and dumb lust, and the world-weary woman drowning in a sea of men that works with him. This is a fantastic film from a remarkably skilled cast about "the beauty of sensualism".

Title: O Veneno da Madrugada
Description: A small town is stirred by anonymous notes delivered during the night, telling the secrets of its inhabitants.

Title: Benares
Description: Two young men went on a ride with their old friend in his truck across the whole Mauritius, the sole purpose of it being finding and getting two girls to entertain them that very night back home.

Title: Mother's Little Helpers
Description: Nine girls escape from a penal institution in an attempt to bring down the Great Mother Goddess and change the world.

Title: Kono mune ippai no ai wo
Description: A group of people suddenly find themselves 20 years in the past. Hiroshi, a 30 year-old businessman, regard it as an opportunity to help a young woman from his past, the memory of whom he has always cherished.

Title: The Illustrated Family Doctor
Description: "The Illustrated Family Doctor" is a dark comedy, that centres on the story of Gary Kelp, a young man who condenses reference books for a company called the Info Digest.

Title: Les mots bleus
Description: Clara a peur des mots. Sa fille, Anna, a peur des autres. Vincent a peur de grandir... Mais il n'aura pas peur de les aimer.

Title: La trahison
Description: During the Algerian War of Independence, mistrust abounds between the drafted local Algerians and metropolitan French forming a French army platoon.

Title: Unkenrufe
Description: In a new political situation of 1989, just as communism crumbles and the Berlin Wall collapses, a middle-aged Polish woman and German man need to face their memories, feelings and stereotypes while meeting in Gdansk.

Title: Nishijapon
Description: A family gets alienated in a mountain forest villa after an earthquake. After 3 days of starvation, the true nature of each character begins to reveal.

Title: Shinku
Description: Shinku is a compelling drama that focuses on the strange relationship that develops between two people who find their lives irrevocably changed as a result of a horrible multiple homicide.

Title: Grabuge!
Description: Maurice works at the police service for foreigners. He is single, loves Spanish music and spends all his free time in a Hispanic cabaret.

Title: Aux abois
Description: Paul, a former insurer, is struggling to make ends meet. He agrees to meet Sarrebry, a loan shark introduced to him by his friend Daubelle. Paul mortally knocks out the disgusting crook and steals a large sum of money from him.

Title: Jiyû ren'ai
Description: Set during Japan's Taisho Era (1912-1926), "Bluestockings" tells the tale story of a love triangle between wealthy businessman Yuichiro (Etsushi Toyokawa), his wife Akiko (Kyoko Hasegawa), and Kiyoko (Yoshino Kimura).

Title: A Few People, a Little Time
Description: The unusual bond between a blind female writer and an acclaimed poet changes their lives and forms an exceptional creative cooperation, free of politics and the complexities of mundane life.

Title: Trois couples en quête d'orages
Description: Olivier, Rémi and Pascale, three longtime friends, close to forty, a woman, two men, with their respective wives and husbands, have formed a clan. But this group will know its first questioning.

Title: La tierra ardía
Description: "La tierra ardía" is the film version of the novel written by Jorge Ritter, who was a doctor in the Chaco's War with Bolivia (1932-1935)

Title: Troy
Description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Description: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

Title: Van Helsing
Description: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

Title: Man on Fire
Description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: The Notebook
Description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

Title: Layer Cake
Description: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

Title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Description: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Title: Secret Window
Description: A successful writer in the midst of a painful divorce is stalked at his remote lake house by a would-be scribe who accuses him of plagiarism.

Title: Exorcist: The Beginning
Description: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Title: I, Robot
Description: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

Title: Sideways
Description: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

Title: The Bourne Supremacy
Description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

Title: Flight of the Phoenix
Description: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

Title: Taking Lives
Description: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

Title: Ella Enchanted
Description: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

Title: The Manchurian Candidate
Description: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

Title: Speak
Description: After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.

Title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
Description: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she'd ever dreamed of having.

Title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
Description: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

Title: My Summer of Love
Description: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

Title: Anatomy of Hell
Description: A woman employs a gay man to spend four nights at her house to watch her when she's "unwatchable".

Title: Christmas with the Kranks
Description: With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.

Title: Around the World in 80 Days
Description: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor, beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

Title: Mysterious Skin
Description: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Description: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

Title: A Very Long Engagement
Description: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

Title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
Description: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

Title: Vanity Fair
Description: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia Sedley.

Title: Night Watch
Description: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

Title: Bride & Prejudice
Description: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

Title: The Football Factory
Description: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

Title: The Door in the Floor
Description: A writer's young assistant becomes both pawn and catalyst in his boss's disintegrating household.

Title: Surviving Christmas
Description: A lonely, obnoxious young millionaire pays a family to spend Christmas with him.

Title: Enduring Love
Description: Two strangers become connected by a tragedy, yet one dangerously feels that the connection goes much deeper than the other is willing to admit.

Title: Ma mère
Description: When his father dies, a young man is introduced by his attractive, amoral mother to a world of hedonism and depravity.

Title: Arsène Lupin
Description: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

Title: A Love Song for Bobby Long
Description: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

Title: The Big Bounce
Description: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

Title: Five Children and It
Description: Five children staying in their eccentric uncle's labyrinthine mansion for protection during World War I befriend a sand fairy who has the power to grant wishes.

Title: Being Julia
Description: Set in 1930s London, this movie involves stage actors and actresses and their experiences with love and revenge.

Title: P.S.
Description: An unfulfilled divorced woman gets the chance to relive her past when she meets a young man who appears to be her high school sweetheart who died many years before.

Title: Never Die Alone
Description: A drug kingpin's return home touches off a turf war.

Title: Innocence
Description: A look inside an offbeat boarding school for young girls.

Title: A Home at the End of the World
Description: A boy who has experienced many losses in his life grows to manhood and enters into a love triangle with a woman and his boyhood friend.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

Title: The Hidden Blade
Description: A 19th Century samurai, held in low esteem due to an action by his late father, must resolve his history with a maid and with his close friend.

Title: Marebito
Description: A fear-obsessed freelance cameraman (Shinya Tsukamoto) investigates an urban legend involving mysterious spirits that haunt the subways of Tokyo.

Title: In My Father's Den
Description: A disillusioned war journalist's return home is blighted when he becomes implicated in the mysterious disappearance of a teenage girl he has befriended.

Title: Kamikaze Girls
Description: Momoko, a strange and seemingly emotionless girl obsessed with 18th century France, befriends a Yanki biker and the two experience the ups and downs of their unusual lives in a rural Japanese town.

Title: Don't Move
Description: A destitute woman (Cruz) becomes involved with an upper-crust physician (Castellitto).

Title: Three Way
Description: When a blackmailer shares his secrets with three extremely untrustworthy women, his million-dollar scheme spins murderously out of control. Starring sultry Gina Gershon and Panic Room's Dwight Yoakam.

Title: The Bridge of San Luis Rey
Description: In 1714 Peru, a friar is tried by the Inquisition for questioning God's intentions when five die in the collapse of an Andean rope bridge.

Title: The Intruder
Description: An emotionally cold man leaves the safety of his Alpine home to seek a heart transplant and an estranged son.

Title: Kongekabale
Description: Election for the Danish parliament is up and the main opposition party has a chance at winning and its leader at becoming the next prime minister. The leader is hospitalized and the scheming begins.

Title: Ima, ai ni yukimasu
Description: A young woman returns from the dead to her guilt-ridden husband and son, but she cannot remember them.

Title: Tony Takitani
Description: When technical illustrator Tony Takitani asks his wife to resist her all-consuming obsession for designer clothes, the consequences are tragic.

Title: Red Dust
Description: Police officer Dirk Hendricks files an amnesty application for Alex Mpondo, a member of the South African Parliament who can't remember the torture he once endured as a captive political activist. South African-born attorney Sarah Barcant, meanwhile, returns to her homeland to represent Mpondo, as well as Steve Sizela, Mpondo's friend who was arrested along with him and never heard from again.

Title: Crying Out Love in the Center of the World
Description: While searching for his fiancee Ritsuko, Sakutarou rediscovers through flashbacks the void deep within him caused by the events from his high school days.

Title: Populärmusik från Vittula
Description: Two boys grow up together in the town of Pajala during the 1960s. United by rock'n'roll music.

Title: Woman Thou Art Loosed
Description: An adaptation of Bishop T.D. Jakes' self-help novel, chronciling a woman's struggle to come to terms with her legacy of abuse, addiction and poverty.

Title: Piccadilly Jim
Description: Set in the 1930s, an American with a scandalous reputation on both sides of the Atlantic must do an about-face in order to win back the woman of his dreams.

Title: 72 metra
Description: Every second is precious for a Russian submarine crew, as they are stranded 72 meters below the ocean's surface.

Title: The Keys to the House
Description: Meeting his handicapped son for the first time, a young father attempts to forge a relationship with the teenager.

Title: The Bridesmaid
Description: A hard-working young man meets and falls in love with his sister's bridesmaid. He soon finds out how disturbed she really is.

Title: Cavedweller
Description: A traumatic event sends a musician (Sedgwick) back to her hometown in an effort to reunite with the daughters she abandoned. To do so, she must confront her abusive ex-husband (Quinn), from whom she fled years ago.

Title: Baptists at Our Barbecue
Description: Longwinded, USA: a small but divided, feuding town of 262 Mormons and 262 Baptists. One man will try anything to end the ridiculous feud, bring the town together, and keep the peace-loving girl of his dreams from leaving town.

Title: Killer Diller
Description: A guitar playing car thief meets an autistic savant piano player, and together they transform a group of reluctant halfway house convicts into The Killer Diller Blues Band.

Title: Pinocchio 3000
Description: The year is 3000. Geppetto, with the help of his faithful assistant, Spencer the cyber penguin, and by the holographic fairy Cyberina, creates Pinocchio, a prototype super-robot equipped for emotions.

Title: Puerto Vallarta Squeeze
Description: An American government hitman on the run, makes a pact with two travellers to help him disappear into the Mexican jungle.

Title: 100 Days with Mr. Arrogant
Description: A cute, poor, Korean high school senior's dumped by her boyfriend so she kicks a beer can hitting a handsome driver, who "crashes" his convertible. He insists on 3M won/USD3000 in damages. She can work it off over 100 days. Comedy follows.

Title: Tre metri sopra il cielo
Description: A bad boy and a socialite girl hook-up.

Title: Hipnos
Description: A woman suffers a traumatic incident as a young girl, whereas she doesn't know which reality is the real one.

Title: De dominee
Description: In the world of the drugs business - where it's is all about money - friendship and loyalty is most important. That is what becomes the demise of gangster Klaas Bruinsma.

Title: Cold Light
Description: What could be better than knowing your future? And what could be worse? A love-filled childhood abruptly ends when catastrophe descends. One that the child had foreseen yet failed to act upon.

Title: Company K
Description: World War I troubled veteran Joe Delaney attempts to compile a history of his U.S. Marines company but nightmares about the German soldier he killed haunt him still.

Title: The Art of Losing
Description: The best Colombian thriller of the last decade. The discovery of an impaled corpse near Bogota, prostitutes, a real estate fraud scheme, emerald hunters, corrupt politicians and journalists reflect the actuality of the conflicting country.

Title: Nigdy w zyciu!
Description: Judyta is a middle-aged housewife whose peaceful life suddenly falls apart due to divorce. But soon she finds the strength to carry on fighting for her happiness, a place in the sun and love of her life.

Title: Håkan Bråkan & Josef
Description: When Håkan gets a little sister, it is as if Mom and Dad completely forgot about him.

Title: Last Goodbye
Description: A confusing intermingling of individuals, drunk office worker, vampire slayer actress, rock band members, runaway teenage girl, father, whiskey drinking preacher etc., whose lives are somehow connected.

Title: Run Away Home
Description: A coming-of-age story of a teenage girl from a liberal upbringing who moves to a conservative baptist community in rural 1950s America.

Title: Private Eye Vares
Description: On the trail of a woman, Vares finds himself caught up with underworld characters who are on the trail of hidden millions.

Title: Fracture
Description: The story of how one man's crime ruins the lives of two families forever.

Title: I-Fak
Description: Fak, a young Thai man leaves the monkhood to care for his ailing father. When he returns home, he finds his father has married a much younger woman. She is very beautiful, but she is also mentally unbalanced. Then the father dies.

Title: Familien Gregersen
Description: An adaptation of Christian Kampmann's four novels about the two decades from 1954 to 1974 as experienced by the five sons and daughters of the Gregersen family.

Title: Quill: The Life of a Guide Dog
The Great Water
Description: An ailing communist reflects on his childhood in Stalinist Yugoslavia.

Title: Neukdaeui yuhok
Description: Han-kyung comes to town to live with her mom. Attracted to her pure charm, the most popular guys Hae-won and Tae-sung fight each other for her.

Title: Den som frykter ulven
Description: An unfortunate bank robber takes an escaped mental patient, wanted for murder, as hostage.

Title: Silentium
Description: A man who accused a catholic bishop of abusing him when he was a child dies in the Austrian city Salzburg. Everyone except his widow and the eccentrical detective Simon Brenner keeps silent and believes that the man killed himself.

Title: Idiot Love
Description: One night, Pere-Lluc heading home drunk, hits his head on the aluminum ladder a girl is using to hang banners from the streetlights. As the days go by, he becomes more and more obsessed with her.

Title: The Guy Was Cool
Description: A girl insults a bully on internet. He starts calling her repeatedly and finally finds her. On an escape attempt she trips and their lips meet. Being the first to kiss him, she now has to promise to marry him. Is life over or...?

Title: Bulutlari Beklerken
Description: Ayse/Eleni who is a member of a Greek family in Turkey is forced to immigrate from Trabzon to Mersin in her early ages. However, the events that happen cause her to face her own past.

Title: Going Upriver
Description: A documentary on Senator John Kerry's Navy tour of duty in Vietnam, his contributions to the peace movement that followed, and the ultimate shape of his future political career.

Title: Occhi di cristallo
Description: While hunting a cultured, intelligent and vicious psychopath, Inspector Amaldi comes face to face with the physical and moral decay of his city as well as the ghosts of his own past.

Title: Mo li hua kai
Description: Generational family saga set in Shanghai in the thirties, sixties and eighties.
A group of rebellious teenagers cause mischief and disorder in a 1969 Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan as a result of tensions from their school and a US military base.

Title: Spooked
Description: A thriller loosely based on Ian Wishart's book The Paradise Conspiracy, about the mysterious death of a New Zealander who happened upon international banking records after purchasing a used computer.

Title: Fakiren fra Bilbao
Description: When two children move into an old house with their mother they find magical mystery involving a lively spirit and a precious diamond.

Title: Nina
Description: Psychological thriller larded with manga-like animations about the young, poor comic strip illustrator Nina, living with her mean landlady. She sinks further and further into a violent fantasy world.

Title: Pacchigi!
Description: Kyoto 1968. Several high school students deal with their life as Korean-Japanese trying to earn each other's love and respect. But the times are not kind to them.

Title: Juoksuhaudantie
Description: Matti Virtanen is trying to get his family back by buying a house.

Title: Zwölf Stühle
Description: A classic Russian story filmed at least half a dozen times including by Mel Brooks is updated for a portrait of society and politics in the now independent country of Ukraine in 2004.

Title: Je suis un assassin
Description: A writer of novels in need of an editor accepts the contract offered to him by a famous writer: to eliminate his ex-wife against a large sum of money.

Title: Il siero della vanità
Description: The vips of italian television disappear in a mysterious way. Two detectives, Lucia and Franco, try to investigate in this mystery, drowning into a strange world, where the leader is the powerful star Sonia Norton.

Title: Vsadnik po imeni Smert
Description: In pre-Soviet Russia, Boris Savinkov leads a terrorist faction of Socialist-Revolutionary Party members responsible for the deaths of governors and ministers.

Title: Vismayathumbathu
Description: A soul in search of herself.

Title: The Grey
Description: A dark Southern tale of a twelve-year-old boy who is introduced into the world of cockfighting by his overbearing father against the wishes of his caring mother.

Title: La peau blanche
Description: Two roommates discover that the family of one of their girlfriends is populated with vampires.

Title: Au secours, j'ai 30 ans!
Description: Kathy, Tara and Yann left their Breton island to settle in Paris. While Yann is happy, the two girls have rather disastrous romantic lives. Convinced that he will soon die, Yann forces his two friends to take control of their lives.

Title: Yi ge mo sheng nu ren de lai xin
Shinkuronishiti
Description: A Tokyo detective investigates after a fashion model witnesses a brutal slaying by a serial killer.

Title: Riyû
Description: Four people are murdered in an apartment block, but none of them seem connected.

Title: Nos amis les flics
Description: A bunch of harmless young thugs make a living with little blows. After a failed robbery, they find it impossible to settle their debts to the local boss, who, to repay him, offers them the robbery of a modern art foundation.

Title: Pourquoi (pas) le Brésil
Description: A film director, whose career is going downhill, reluctantly decides to adapt an inadaptable best selling novel.

Title: Joyjatra
Description: It's a story of boat journey of Bangladesh in 1971 of helpless people was going towards the safe border.Pakistan military had unleashed genocide in the country. Heroic sons of the soil started a war of liberation.

Title: Who the Hell's Bonnie and Clyde?
Description: The film tells the true story of a young couple 'The Hungarian Bonnie & Clyde'.

Title: Buai laju-laju
Description: Zaiton seduces a drifter named Amran into murdering her elderly husband, Ibrahim, to get his money and land.

Title: Nitaboh
Description: Nitaboh inherits a shamisen after going blind at a young age. As he improves his skills, he tries to perfect his own unique style.

Title: The Miracle According to Salomé
Description: An alternative, almost heretical, explanation for the Fátima apparition of Our Lady and related miracles.

Title: Les aventures extraordinaires de Michel Strogoff
Description: In Russia, the Tartars invade Siberia, devastating villages and sowing terror among the populations. The Tsar sent Michael Strogoff 5,000 kilometers from Moscow to warn the Grand Duke of the imminent danger in Irkutsk.

Title: A Costa dos Murmúrios
Description: Based on the novel by Lidia Jorge.

Title: La première fois que j'ai eu 20 ans
Lightweight
Description: A young man tries his way in boxing, supported by a coach. He meets a girl, falls in love and she becomes pregnant.

Title: Natale a casa Deejay - A Christmas Carol
Febrer
Description: A metaphorical tale about pain and loss. Sela, a famous writer, committed suicide. Lars, her ex-lover, tries to find out why she did it. In the process, he discovers an unknown world of feelings and sense of guiltiness.

Title: Milenci & vrazi
Description: Set in a Northern Bohemian factory town in the sixties, the story of the varied residents of an apartment building whose lives are changed when young engineer Borek turns up on the scene.

Title: Il resto di niente
Description: Set in the 1790s, this historical drama follows the travails of an idealistic noblewoman who helps lead a daring revolution in Italy.

Title: The Story of an African Farm
Kindan no jikenbo: Sutôkâ o ai shita onna
Iti Srikanta
Description: The film portrays the disreputable life of Srikanta and his encounters with various women. After facing many failures in love he becomes a monk.

Title: Mrs. Stevens Hears the Mermaids Singing
Description: In the 1920s she wrote a scandalous novel about two women in love. Now, it's 1964 and everyone wants to know, "Who was the muse?"

Title: Byways
Description: A story about a father and his kid , who are travelling around the world

Title: El año del diluvio
Description: In a particularly hot summer, Sister Consuelo, superior of an order dedicated to caring for the sick, decided to transform the dilapidated hospital into a modern nursing.

Title: Joensuun Elli
Description: Summer in the 1970's. Small Eastern-Finland village. One pretty young woman (Elli) and all the men wanting her...

Title: O Quinze
Description: 1915, backcountry in northeastern Brazil. A severe drought has decimated much of the local population. A young teacher, who works in the capital, spends holidays on the farm of her grandmother, and becomes involved with her cousin.

Title: L'après-midi de monsieur Andesmas
Description: Set mostly in the woods in the south of France, a fateful encounter changes the lives of a man and a woman.

Title: Le quattro porte del deserto
Description: Based on the life of Charles the Foucault, the christian missionary that first visited the desert and tried to convert the nomad populations of the Tuareg.

Title: Internet Detectives: Net Bandits
Description: When Tamsyn Smith and Josh Allan get an email calling for help from a mysterious internet user who goes by the ID of ZMASTER, they have to find a way to save him before time runs out.

Title: Cheshmane John Malkovich 1: Viggo Mortensen
Description: This movie is based on the Trilogy Novel called "Cheshmane John Malkovich" (John Malkovich's Eyes). It has 3 episodes namely "Kamin" (Ambush), "Sayeha Bidarand" (The Shadows are Awake) and "Cheshmane John Malkovich" (John Malkovich's Eyes.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: The Dreamers
Description: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

Title: Mystic River
Description: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

Title: Big Fish
Description: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

Title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
Description: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

Title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Title: Cold Mountain
Description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

Title: Holes
Description: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

Title: Peter Pan
Description: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

Title: Dreamcatcher
Description: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

Title: Freaky Friday
Description: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

Title: Cheaper by the Dozen
Description: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

Title: Open Range
Description: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

Title: In the Cut
Description: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

Title: The Missing
Description: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Title: Timeline
Description: A group of archaeologists become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve a friend. The group must survive in 14th-century France before they can escape back to the twenty-first century.

Title: Under the Tuscan Sun
Description: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

Title: Matchstick Men
Description: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

Title: House of Sand and Fog
Description: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

Title: The Human Stain
Description: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

Title: Runaway Jury
Description: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

Title: Gods and Generals
Description: The rise and fall of confederate general Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, as he meets with military success against the Union from 1861 to 1863, when he is accidentally killed by his own soldiers.

Title: Evil
Description: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

Title: Young Adam
Description: A young drifter working on a river barge disrupts his employers' lives while hiding the fact that he knows more about a dead woman found in the river than he admits.

Title: Willard
Description: A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.

Title: The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi
Description: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.

Title: Ned Kelly
Description: An innocent man becomes one of the most wanted criminals the world has ever known.

Title: Bright Young Things
Description: An adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's novel "Vile Bodies", is a look into the lives of a young novelist, his would-be lover, and a host of young people who beautified London in the 1930s.

Title: I Capture the Castle
Description: A love story set in 1930s England that follows 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain, and the fortunes of her eccentric family, struggling to survive in a decaying English castle.

Title: The Statement
Description: Tale of a former Nazi executioner who becomes a target of hitmen and police investigators.

Title: One Missed Call
Description: People mysteriously start receiving voicemail messages from their future selves, foretelling their deaths.

Title: The Jungle Book 2
Description: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

Title: How to Deal
Description: A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...

Title: Le divorce
Description: French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.

Title: Good Boy
Description: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.

Title: I Am David
Description: A twelve-year-old boy escapes from a Bulgarian Communist concentration camp and sets out on a journey to reach Denmark.

Title: King of the Ants
Description: A young drifter discovers his true calling when he's hired by a mobster to stalk and kill a prominent accountant, and then decides to seek revenge when the stingy thugs try to kill him rather than pay him.

Title: Untold Scandal
Description: In late 1700s Korea, Lady Cho challenges the playboy Lord Jo-won into seducing and sleeping with her husband's coming young, virgin concubine. Lady Cho agrees to sleep with him if he succeeds.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Description: Jane Austen's classic is transplanted to modern-day Utah. While her college roommates search for love, aspiring writer Elizabeth Bennet focuses on her career but constantly finds herself fighting haughty businessman Will Darcy.

Title: Hope Springs
Description: A brokenhearted English artist travels to Hope, USA, hoping to get on with his life. He starts by drawing faces there. He befriends the cute Mandy. But then his scheming ex shows up and wants him back.

Title: Where the Red Fern Grows
Description: Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.

Title: I'm Not Scared
Description: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.

Title: The Memory of a Killer
Description: Vincke and Verstuyft are the best detectives of the Antwerp police department. They are confronted with the murder on a leading executive and put all their effort to catch the murderer.

Title: The Favourite Game
Description: To live in the Here and Now, and write poems, that is what Leo wants - unlike the women who fall in love with him.

Title: Imagining Argentina
Description: A man has the power to see the fate of missing people - with the exception of his own beloved wife.

Title: Monsieur Ibrahim
Description: In Paris, a Turkish shop owner befriends a Jewish boy in his mid-teens.

Title: Pinjar
Description: In the days leading up to Partition, a Hindu woman is abducted by a Muslim man. Soon, she finds herself not only forced into marriage, but living in a new country as the borders between India and Pakistan are drawn.

Title: The Tesseract
Description: A psychologist, an Englishman, a bellboy and a wounded female assassin have their fates crossed at a sleazy Bangkok hotel.

Title: Zelary
Description: A nurse is part of the resistance in 1940s Czech Republic. She is discovered and must find a place to hide. A patient whose life she saved, from a remote mountain village where time stopped 150 years ago, agrees to hide her as his wife.

Title: Georges Bataille's Story of the Eye
Description: In a seemingly abandoned house, a group of people engage in wordless acts of passion. From evening to morning, the sexual couplings among the members of the house become increasingly harrowing as daylight arrives.

Title: Strayed
Description: Emmanuelle Béart stars as a widowed schoolteacher who flees Nazi-occupied Paris with her children. A teenaged boy comes to their rescue by leading them into the forest -- their best shot at survival.

Title: Choker Bali: A Passion Play
Description: Binodini is a young widow who lives with a woman and her son, Mahendra, who had once refused to marry her. Their lives are thrown into disarray when there is deceit and adultery between Binodini, Mahendra, his wife and his friend.

Title: His Brother
Description: Two brothers with a problematic relationship in the past, find together again when the elder one gets a dangerous disease and asks his brother to accompany him to several doctors.

Title: The Young Black Stallion
Description: A young girl befriends a wild black stallion.

Title: Eiffel... I'm in Love
Description: A teenage girl who led a perfect life. Her life completely changes when her parents good friend and his son came from France to stay with them.

Title: Pact with the Devil
Description: A modern retelling of the Oscar Wilde novel.

Title: The Adventures of Ociee Nash
Description: In 1898, spirited nine-year-old Ociee Nash lives with her father and brother in rural Mississippi until her father sends her to live with her refined aunt in Asheville, North Carolina.

Title: My Father
Description: A man who grew up an orphan finally gets to meet his father: The psychopath Dr. Josef Mengele, the Auschwitz surgeon who performed genetic experiments on concentration camp refugees during WWII.

Title: Good Morning, Night
Description: The 1978 kidnapping of politician Aldo Moro as seen from the perspective of one of his assailants: a conflicted young woman in the ranks of the Red Brigade.

Title: Stara basn. Kiedy slonce bylo bogiem
Description: In the 9th century, a tyrant oppresses pre-Christian Slavic tribes living on the Polish lands. They must unite for the common future.

Title: When Zachary Beaver Came to Town
Description: Zachary Beaver, a sideshow attraction known as the world's fattest boy, arrives in the sleepy town of Granger, Texas.

Title: Bulgarian Lovers
Description: A straight-laced Spanish man falls in love with a young foreigner.

Title: Capricciosa
Description: Henrik is seventeen and dreaming of becoming a professional soccer player. He lives with his parents and two younger siblings. When his mother dies it shakes the family's life. Henrik is the one who has to keep the family together.

Title: Effroyables jardins
Description: France under occupation by the Germans during WW2: Two men inspired by a free France radio broadcast perpetrate an act of sabotage with unwitting consequences for them and their fellow villagers.

Title: Spin
Description: Young Eddie loses his parents in an accident and his uncle leaves him for ten years in the care of his Hispanic rancher. In high school he reconnects with a girl from his past, and their grow an interracial relationship.

Title: La tregua
Description: A lonely man in his fifties finds once again love in the arms of a young woman.

Title: Bloom
Description: Adapted from James Joyce's Ulysses, Bloom is the enthralling story of June 16th, 1904 and a gateway into the consiousness of its three main characters: Stephen Dedalus, Molly Bloom and the extraordinary Leopold Bloom.

Title: Pornografia
Description: Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation.

Title: The Book of Mormon Movie, Volume 1: The Journey
Twist
Description: A queer "Oliver Twist" update set in the hustler district of modern-day Toronto.

Title: De schippers van de Kameleon
Description: Young twin boys receive a boat of their own by a stroke of luck. It turns out to be very fast and they use their boat to help out their friends.

Title: Les enfants de la pluie
Description: The Pyross and the Hydross are have been at war for as long as they can remember. The Pyross, who worship the sun, water brings only death and desolation, whereas the Hydross must always stay protected from heat, which petrifies them.

Title: The Pact of Silence
Description: A priest who is also a doctor investigates the mysterious illness of a young nun who shares a dark secret with her twin sister who is a convicted child murderer.

Title: The Republic of Love
Description: A thrice-divorced radio host and a commitment-shy art curator fall in love, but their relationship is affected by the experiences of their friends and families.

Title: De passievrucht
Description: After the passing of his wife, a man learns he is infirtile and their son cannot be his.

Title: Soloalbum
Description: Ben is a young editor for a famous german music magazine in the mid 1990s. His life is falling apart after his girlfriend breaks up with him. From now on he decides to go solo...

Title: Crime Partners
Description: Billy Goode, a street-smart crook and his partner Jackie Williams are two small time gangsters with dream of seeing their names in the headlines.

Title: Bless the Woman
Description: A young girl falls in love with an experienced soldier.

Title: Lucía, Lucía
Description: A woman trying to cope with the recent disappearance of her husband finds that the event uncovers some dark secrets. Subtitled.

Title: Apám beájulna
Description: Two young girls, Szarka and Barbie decides to trave through Europe.

Title: Das fliegende Klassenzimmer
Description: A boy who was once a perpetual outcast finds friends in a new boarding school, united with his new peers gets involved in a heated rivalry with a group of students that lives outside of the school premises.

Title: The Mystery of the Yellow Room
Description: Following the attempted murder of Mathilde, daughter of renowned Professor Stangerson, Joseph Rouletabille, a young reporter, accompanied by photographer Sainclair, visits the Château du Glandier to try and shed some light on the mystery.

Title: Ao no hono-o
Description: A 17 y.o. Japanese secondary school student is living happily with his mom and sister but one day his stepdad returns, drunk much of the time and cruel to his mom and sister. Is there such a thing as the perfect murder?

Title: The Man of the Year
Description: Maiquel has lost a bet and dyed his hair blond. This little event triggers a head-on collision with destiny in which Maiquel goes from nobody to hero to outlaw--all in 24 hours.

Title: A Different Way
Description: A 17-year-old girl named Hannah stumbles through a love triangle while also dealing with a mysterious stalker.

Title: Alo
Description: The true love between a couple living in a village.

Title: Shubho Mahurat
Description: An actress mysteriously dies after the "Shubho Mahurat," a celebration of the first shot of the film. A journalist and her perceptive aunt investigate.

Title: Kanzen-naru shiiku: Onna rihatsushi no koi
Kanzen-naru shiiku: Himitsu no chika-shitsu
Description: A shy man finds an unconscious schoolgirl near a Tokyo park and decides to bring her home, and locks her up in a secret basement.

Title: Shôwa kayô daizenshû
