Description: One of a gang of karaoke loving middle aged women is murdered by a young man. Her friends track him down and kill him. His friends track them down and kill the killer ..... and it escalates!

Title: Night Corridor
Description: When Sam searches for answers in the mysterious accident that has befallen his twin, he soon wonders if anyone close to him can be trusted.

Title: Kommer du med mig då
Description: A film about the love of life, love of truth and love between two people who do not understand that they love each other.

Title: En som Hodder
Description: A young bullied boy is asked by a fairy to save the world.

Title: Karmen
Description: A young and handsome prison guard falls in love with a beautiful lady-prisoner. She makes him hooked on sex and manipulates him into becoming a gang member. He kills and steals under her control.

Title: A Sight for Sore Eyes
Description: Young woman who lives under the gaze of her overprotective stepmother falls for a young man she meets. He is infatuated by her beauty, but is also a sociopath. She wants to leave her stepmother's hold and he is ready to kill.

Title: G@me
Description: Kidnapping and deceit abound in this thriller. From romance to mild-action, this movie has it all.

Title: Alila
Description: Slice-of-life look at the lives of twelve people who live or work in the same apartment complex in Tel Aviv.

Title: Day of Defense
Description: Two Mormon missionaries are arrested for preaching in a small town. Attorneys and best friends Thomas and James stir the town into a frenzy when they take opposing sides in a court battle over the validity of the missionaries' religion.

Title: The Fascination
Description: O FASCÍNIO is an intriguing story about a family and a manor house (where some terrible crimes were committed in the past by a member of that family) adapted from a novel with the same title by Tabajara Ruas.

Title: Dom
Description: Free adaptation of Machado de Assis's "Dom Casmurro". Bento marries an actress, and soon afterwards she gets pregnant. He begins to suspect the child isn't his, but his best friend's.

Title: Lovely Rita, sainte patronne des cas désespérés
Description: An accountant decides to treat himself to a dream date with Rita which turns into a living nightmare.

Title: The Undesirables
Description: USA, 1951. When a group of Italian immigrants suspected to have connections with the Mafia are sent back to Italy with the brand of "undesirable", a journalist decide to inquire about the story.

Title: The Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde Rock 'n Roll Musical
Description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

Title: Bombaiyer Bombete
Description: Satyajit Ray's creation Feluda travels to Mumbai with his nephew Topshe to witness a film being made on a story written by their author-friend Lalmohan Ganguly under his pen-name Jatayu. Trouble follows them.

Title: El lápiz del carpintero
Description: A love story between Republican Dr. Daniel Da Barca and a rich businessman' s the daughter Maris Mallo during the Spanish civil war.

Title: Sprickorna i muren
Description: Lars interrupts his studies in mathematics at Uppsala University. Instead he takes a job as a teacher in an industrial community. When he discovers that one of his students is a mathematical genius, his desire for studies awakens.

Title: In Search of an Impotent Man
Description: A woman goes in search of an impotent man.

Title: Antena
Description: Yuichiro is a college student whose sister went missing 15 years ago. That traumatic event hangs over him as he wanders Japan's S&M clubs. But his younger brother claims to be able to sense their sister with his "antenna."

Title: Thirteen Steps
Description: A released inmate is hired to solve a murder case.

Title: Radosti i pechali malenkogo lorda
Description: A 19th century American boy is discovered to be the heir to a grand aristocratic estate in England. He wins the heart of the local common folk and eventually his dour elderly grandfather.

Title: Vida de Menina
Description: The day-to-day life of a young girl in the town of Diamantina, Brazil, on the end of 19th Century, based on real life diaries.

Title: Terror in the Darkness
Description: A young woman experiences a living nightmare with the man of her dreams.

Title: And in the Morning They Woke Up
Description: And in The Morning They Woke Up

Title: Naneun nareul pagoehal gwolliga itda
Description: S is a suicide designer who assists people to commit suicide according to a method of their own choosing. When a woman kills herself, her boyfriend decides to investigate, and discovers that S is behind the suicide...

Title: Serva e padrona
Description: A free interpretation from Jean Genet's novel 'Les bonnes'.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

Title: Catch Me If You Can
Description: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

Title: The Ring
Description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: Red Dragon
Description: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

Title: The Count of Monte Cristo
Description: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

Title: The Bourne Identity
Description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Title: Road to Perdition
Description: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Title: We Were Soldiers
Description: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

Title: A Walk to Remember
Description: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

Title: Treasure Planet
Description: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that this movie is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

Title: The Sum of All Fears
Description: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

Title: The Time Machine
Description: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

Title: About a Boy
Description: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

Title: The Hours
Description: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

Title: Killing Me Softly
Description: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

Title: 25th Hour
Description: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

Title: The Mothman Prophecies
Description: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

Title: The Rules of Attraction
Description: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

Title: Solaris
Description: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Title: High Crimes
Description: A successful lawyer's husband is arrested for murdering 9 villagers in El Salvador in 1988 as US soldier under a different name. She defends him in military court and investigates. Framed?

Title: Tuck Everlasting
Description: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

Title: About Schmidt
Description: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

Title: Spider
Description: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

Title: White Oleander
Description: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

Title: Vampires: Los Muertos
Description: A vampire hunter and a priest fight a band of the walking dead in Mexico.

Title: Dark Water
Description: A mother and her 6 year old daughter move into a creepy apartment whose every surface is permeated by water.

Title: Black Angel
Description: Trapped in an unhappy marriage, the wife of a high ranking Fascist official starts a dangerous, self-destructive relationship with a duplicitous S.S. Officer.

Title: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
Description: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.

Title: Trapped
Description: The Jennings' fight for their daughters life after she is kidnapped by an experienced gang of thieves.

Title: Nicholas Nickleby
Description: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

Title: Devdas
Description: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: The Four Feathers
Description: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

Title: Whale Rider
Description: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

Title: Stuart Little 2
Description: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Title: Perfect Blue
Description: A girl named Ai gets a major record deal to sing a song written by a friend of hers who is deceased. However an obsessed stalker fan slowly starts becoming more like her and tearing her world apart.

Title: Big Trouble
Description: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

Title: The Quiet American
Description: An old British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

Title: The Twilight Samurai
Description: As the feudal Japan era draws to a close, a widower samurai experiences difficulty balancing clan loyalties, 2 young daughters, an aged mother, and the sudden reappearance of his childhood sweetheart.

Title: Hart's War
Description: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Title: Eye See You
Description: A lead detective being stalked by a serial killer is asked to check into a clinic treating law enforcement officials who can't face their jobs.

Title: Peter Pan 2: Return to Never Land
Description: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

Title: Ripley's Game
Description: A dying family man in need of money is persuaded to assassinate a European crime boss.

Title: Pinocchio
Description: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.

Title: Morvern Callar
Description: After her beloved boyfriend's suicide, a mourning supermarket worker and her best friend hit the road in Scotland, but find that grief is something that you can't run away from forever.

Title: Possession
Description: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

Title: The Reckoning
Description: A priest on the lam takes up with a traveling band of actors, who then discover a murder has occurred and try to solve it by recreating the crime in a play.

Title: The Crime of Padre Amaro
Description: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.

Title: The Story of O: Untold Pleasures
Description: Sir Stephen introduces O, a talented photographer in her late 20s, to a seductive world of deceit, power and eroticism.

Title: I Am Dina
Description: Dina grows up in a village at a fjord in 1860s north Norway. As child, she accidentally kills her mom and loses her rich dad's love. She grows up to be a clever, pretty, wild and strange woman. She marries a rich Frenchman.

Title: Left Behind II: Tribulation Force
Description: After the Rapture and the revealing of the identity of the Antichrist, a group of converts form the Tribulation Force, a secret society with the sole purpose of converting non-believers to Christianity.

Title: La habitación azul
Description: A couple meet each other often in a motel room.

Title: Crime and Punishment
Description: A modern day adaptation of Dostoyevsky's classic novel about a young student who is forever haunted by the murder he has committed.

Title: The Dancer Upstairs
Description: A police detective in a South American country is dedicated to hunting down a revolutionary guerilla leader.

Title: The Kid Stays in the Picture
Description: Documentary about legendary Paramount producer Robert Evans (the film shares the same name as Evans's famous 1994 autobiography).

Title: Skins
Description: An inspirational tale about the relationship between two Sioux Indian brothers living on the Pine Ridge Indian reservation.

Title: The Adversary
Description: When a man murders his wife, children and parents, the ensuing investigation reveals that he's been living a lie for almost 20 years.

Title: When the Last Sword Is Drawn
Description: A samurai goes to extraordinary lengths to provide for his family.

Title: Close Your Eyes
Description: A hypnotherapist is caught up in the pursuit of a serial killer.

Title: The Heart of Me
Description: 1930's London. Two sisters - Madeleine and Dinah - One marries Rickie, the other falls in love with him. He begins an affair which is to have repercussions throughout their lives.

Title: Twin Sisters
Description: Twin Sisters is an epic love story based on the Dutch bestseller by Tessa de Loo that has been read by more than 3.5 million readers in Holland and Germany.

Title: Joshua
Description: "Joshua" tells the story of a possible second coming of Christ to a small U.S. town.

Title: Pietje Bell
Description: There is never a dull moment in 10-year-old Peter's life; his adventures appearing in newspaper headlines based unfortunately on outright lies. Together with his own little army, The Black Hand Club, Peter decides to right these wrongs.

Title: Little Big Girl
Description: Denmark 1850. Tinke, a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness, struggles to find her unknown, rich grandparents. She comes from nothing and finally gets everything, but - Tinke isn't Cinderella. Tinke is more than that."

Title: The First $20 Million Is Always the Hardest
Description: Andy works in marketing but wants to create something "real" so he gets a job in research with huge a pay cut. He teams with 3 nerds to develop a $99 PC for 3rd world students. Then comes the dot-com crash.

Title: She's No Angel
Description: A young woman on the run allows grieving parents to believe she is their late son's wife.

Title: Graveyard of Honor
Description: A barkeeper saves a Yakuza boss' life and thus makes his way up in the organization. However his fear of nothing soon causes problems.

Title: Dracula: Pages from a Virgin's Diary
Description: A ballet rendition of Bram Stoker's "Dracula", stylized as an Expressionistic silent film.

Title: Charly
Description: Sam Roberts thinks he has all the answers: the purpose of life, the meaning of love, the plan for a perfect future. Until Charly walks into his life.

Title: The Invisible
Description: After an attack leaves him in limbo, invisible to the living and also near death, a teenager discovers the only person who might be able to help him is his attacker.

Title: Friday Night
Description: It's Friday night--she's moving in with her boyfriend tomorrow--so she goes out, but gets stuck in traffic--where she meets a handsome stranger.

Title: Zig Zag
Description: An autistic 15-year-old boy steals money from his boss to provide rent for his abusive father, who uses the money to repay a loan shark.

Title: Food of Love
Description: Paul, a handsome and talented music student is employed as the page-turner at one of the world famous pianist Kennington's concerts in San Francisco.

Title: The Secret Lives of Dentists
Description: An introspective dentist's suspicions about his wife's infidelity stresses his mental well being and family life to the breaking point.

Title: A Gentleman's Game
Description: A drama revolving around characters whose lives are transformed one summer at an exclusive East Coast country club.

Title: Séraphin: Heart of Stone
Description: A young woman is forced to marry an old greedy man to save her father from bankruptcy although she has promised her heart to another man.

Title: Mrs Caldicot's Cabbage War
Description: After her husband's death and being forced into a nursing home, a woman starts looking for independence.

Title: Grabben i graven bredvid
Description: Modern, urban librarian meets simple, traditional farmer and falls in love.

Title: Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress
Description: Two youths sent for a Maoist "re-education" in the mountains fall in love with the village tailor's granddaughter.

Title: Elina: As If I Wasn't There
Description: Elina is sinking in the quicksand and she is going under and she got the white thing on her hair.

Title: Crazy as Hell
Description: Psychiatrist Ty Adams doesn't believe in using drugs, but the head of Sedah State Hospital does, then 'Satan' arrives ~ walk-in patient extraordinaire... From there it's a full-on freaky ride.

Title: The Red Siren
Description: A 12 y.o. girl reports her powerful mom to the police for having killed the nanny. She runs away and is helped by an ex-soldier/assassin to find her dad in Portugal while the mom has her people try prevent this. Shooting follows.

Title: Names Engraved in Marble
Description: This movie is about the Estonian War of Independence (1918-1920), specifically the students fighting on the nationalist side, but also shown the conflict between two ideologies (Estonian nationalism and communism).

Title: P.S. Your Cat Is Dead!
Description: An actor holds a burglar hostage on New Year's Eve, after his girlfriend leaves him and his cat dies.

Title: El embrujo de Shanghai
Description: Barcelona, 1948: An old man living with 14 y.o. Dani and his mom, arranges for Dani to draw the cute 15 y.o. Susana, bedridden with TB. Her dad's friend visits Susana and her sexy mom and tells about her dad and Shanghai.

Title: The Year That Trembled
Description: The Year That Trembled is a 1970 coming-of-age story set in the shadow of Kent State that focuses on a group of young characters facing the Vietnam Draft Lottery.

Title: Corto Maltese: Secret Court of the Arcanes
Description: In 1918, civil wars are tearing Russia and China apart. Laconic adventurer Corto Maltese is hired by a Chinese secret society to capture a train that's taking Tzar's gold abroad. His friend Rasputin joins him, but only hell awaits them.

Title: Perfect Education 3
Description: A lonely Chinese taxi driver kidnaps a Japanese high school girl. As the days go by the captive girl who is the single daughter of a broken home realizes that she is as lonely as her captor and falls in love with him

Title: The Angel Doll
Description: Two small town boys sharing paper route. "Whitey" Black lives in poverty with his single mother and young middle class Jerry Barlow. When Whitey wants to buy his small sister a doll it all opens their eyes to the vastness life around them.

Title: Oesters van Nam Kee
Description: A young dropout falls in love with a nightclub dancer...

Title: Out
Description: Four down on their luck housewives murder their husbands and find whacky ways to hide the bodies!

Title: La repentie
Description: When an indistinct woman named Charlotte leaves a train station in hopes of changing her life forever, she's followed by a mysterious stranger with ill intentions.

Title: The Book of Eve
Description: A Romanian immigrant (Daniel Lavoie) uses good food, good humor and good conversation to break down the walls around a reclusive woman's (Claire Bloom) heart.

Title: 24 heures de la vie d'une femme
Yomigaeri
Description: When the dead come back to life, an inspector is sent to the town of Aso.

Title: Asesino en serio
Description: Martinez is a police detective with a weird case on his hands: Gorkisolo, a priest, is responsible for a series of unique murders. He kills prostitutes with orgasms.

Title: Karlsson on the Roof
Description: A beautiful, wise and fairly fat man at his best age - that's Karlsson on the Roof. And he isn't very shy. His door sign says "The world's best Karlsson". One day he just flew threw the window into Little Brothers bedroom.

Title: O Princípio da Incerteza
Description: Having lost her place among the social elite, a widow remarries and starts a family.

Title: Prüfstand VII
Description: About the V2 rocket and the rocket research in the Peenemünde Army Research Center. The film deals with the history of ideas surrounding the rocket research and the conquest of space.

Title: Amida-do dayori
Description: An urban Japanese couple decide to move to the country.

Title: Tahara
Description: A successful author, Liz, searches for her daughter, Rachel, in the Sinai Desert. There she meets a Bedouin storyteller who relays the unusual love story of a Western tourist and the son of a Bedouin Sheik named Najim. Their relationship is torn apart when the American is exposed to a tribal ritual.

Title: Patul lui Procust
Description: George Ladima, a poet and renowned journalist, loves Emilia, an actress whom he helps in her career, but who takes advantage of him. He commits suicide and in his pocket is found a love note to a Mrs. T.

Title: The Seventies
Description: A middle-class Filipino family struggles to survive in the era of dictatorship.

Title: Bertram & Co
Description: Bertram and his family seek compensation after being swindled by a shop manager. George, a relative of Bertram's has an idea when he discovers that the shop will display the most valuable diamond in the world.

Title: El alquimista impaciente
Description: Policeman Vila and his buddy Chamorro discover a link between two apparently unconnected murders and begin to suspect a sinister conspiracy.

Title: Kuutamolla
Description: This movie is about Iiris Vaara. She turns 30 and meets young director Marko. All dreams come true but does Marko share her dreams?

Title: Desmundo
Description: The story of Orisbela, a young and religious woman who comes from Portugal to Brazil to marry Francisco de Albuquerque, a rude sugar-cane plantation owner, in 1570.

Title: A Selva
Description: Young man, of Portuguese nobility ascendancy, starts working in a rubber plantation in the Amazon, in 1912, and falls in love with pretty Yayá, a married woman.

Title: Prevrashchenie
Description: Based on Kafka's story of the same name, "The Metamorphosis" tells the story of a traveling salesman, Gregor Samsa, who wakes up one morning to find himself transformed into a gigantic insect.

Title: Claim
Description: A young ambitious claims assesor investigates a multi million dollar marine insurance fraud.

Title: Nancy & Frank - A Manhattan Love Story
Description: Nancy, born in Hungary, now lives in New York and studies behaviorism at the Columbia University. At a party on a yacht she meet the German businessman Frank.

Title: O Delfim
Description: Based on José Cardoso Pires' novel, O Delfim shows a rotten country, full of feudal lords who dominate its territory with dictatorship. One of them is Tomás da Palma Bravo, also known as O Delfim.

Title: Kedma
Description: In May 1948, shortly before the creation of the State of Israel, hundreds of immigrants from across Europe arrive in Palestine--only to risk arrest by British troops.

Title: Die Datsche
Description: A couple drives to their weekend-cottage, one final time: The woman wants to sell it, the man does not, because he has too many personal connections with the place. When a duo of intruders shows up, everything seems to escalate...

Title: Return from India
Description: This beautiful love story that starts in Israel and goes through all scenes of India, its cultural, beauty and religions traditions, brings us to the question: "What is this love?"

Title: Break of Dawn
Description: The story of two ex-legionnaires in a mission of political assasination in Romania. A candid portrayal of the human side of assassins.

Title: Wo men hai pa
Description: Set in Shanghai. Everyone panics.

Title: El caballero Don Quijote
Description: A film version of the second half of Cervantes' "Don Quixote".

Title: Glasskår
Description: Roger, Viktor and Arnor er friends, and wants to start a band to charm the ladies, in stead of playing ice hockey. But their new image only almost succeeds.

Title: Inochi
Description: Yu Miri is a writer who's just become pregnant by her married lover. When she decides to keep the baby without his help, her ex-boyfriend Yutaka, decides to help raise him.

Title: La dernière lettre
Description: Locked away in the Jewish ghetto of an occupied Ukrainian town in 1941, a mother revisits her life in a last letter to her son.

Title: Assassini dei giorni di festa
Description: Family of stray artists disguised their son in a woman and trying to steal the bequest of a rich stranger by force of old gypsy habit.

Title: Kin'yû hametsu Nippon: Tôgenkyô no hito-bito
La bande du drugstore
Description: Set in Paris during the 1960s, a group of stylish teenagers hang out at a club called the Drugstore.

Title: A+ Pollux
Description: Halvard is madly in love with his beauty, because Pollux is the woman of his life. But it suddenly disappears - Halvard then has only one idea in mind: to find her at all costs. But this disappearance will create many worries.

Title: Volverás
Description: Days before he's set to fly to Los Angeles for grad school, aspiring architect Ignacio is forced to put his plans on hold when his brother, Carlos, comes looking for refuge from gangsters out to get him over unpaid gambling debts.

Title: A Trumpet in the Wadi
Description: A love story in Israel in the 80's about an Arabic woman and a newcomer from Russia.

Title: Le doux amour des hommes
Description: In Paris, young Raoul is a writer who wishes to find love. He first falls for Jeanne and spends the bulk of his time lounging around with his circle of friends and sleeping around.

Title: Umur
Description: A young border guard falls in love with a beautiful but mysterious Lappish woman, unaware of her dark past.

Title: Promised Land
Description: Promised Land is the story one man's journey to find truth... and one community's desperate struggle to hide from it. The script is based on an award winning novel by Karel Schoeman.

Title: Dweepa
Description: Nagi is the pillar of her small family that includes her husband and her rigid father-in-law. Faced with the possibility of losing her home due to the construction of a dam, Nagi proves her strength.

Title: El lugar donde estuvo el paraíso
Description: In Iquitos, during the era of military dictatorships, a consul must face the arrival of a daughter he does not see in years and the stalking of a military collaborator diplomat who comes to discover his protection to a deserter pilot.

Title: Mohou-han
Description: Leopold and Loeb-styled thriller about serial murders.

Title: Scherbentanz
Description: Un hombre enfermo de leucemia busca desesperadamente un donador de médula.

Title: Primer y último amor
Description: An elderly man returns to his native town with the hope of finding his childhood love.

Title: Bella Bettien
Description: The gripping true story of a Dutch girl who made an amazing career in the international narcotics world.

Title: Pernicioso vegetal
Description: A policeman lifts a boy who was smoking marijuana in the street and in the patrol car they go through the streets of Buenos Aires.

Title: To Dance with the White Dog
Description: A white dog suddenly comes into the life of an aged man who recently lost his wife. Life with the dog gradually helps to heal the heart of the old man. It appears the dog may actually be a reincarnation of his wife.

Title: A Thief and His Wife
Description: A thief asks his wife to visit him in prison, she goes without imagining that he is planning his escape.

Title: Cinta 200 Ela
Description: Yazid and Yati have been good friends since childhood. As adults they both served as caddy at a small, lesser known Golf Club.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: Planet of the Apes
Description: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

Title: Legally Blonde
Description: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

Title: Hannibal
Description: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Description: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

Title: The Princess Diaries
Description: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

Title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Description: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

Title: Original Sin
Description: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

Title: Along Came a Spider
Description: When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

Title: The Piano Teacher
Description: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

Title: Don't Say a Word
Description: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Title: The Hole
Description: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

Title: Valentine
Description: Five women are stalked by an unknown assailant while preparing for Valentine's Day.

Title: Hearts in Atlantis
Description: Widowed Liz Garfield and her son Bobby change when mysterious stranger Ted Brautigan enters their lives.

Title: Riding in Cars with Boys
Description: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

Title: K-PAX
Description: PROT is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a faraway planet named K-PAX. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

Title: Dagon
Description: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

Title: The Tailor of Panama
Description: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.

Title: Monkeybone
Description: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

Title: The Pledge
Description: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

Title: The Experiment
Description: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

Title: Lost and Delirious
Description: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

Title: My Sassy Girl
Description: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

Title: Exit Wounds
Description: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Title: Buffalo Soldiers
Description: A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.

Title: Enigma
Description: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.

Title: Someone Like You
Description: After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talk show talent scout writes a column on the relationship habits of men which gains her national fame.

Title: The Shipping News
Description: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Title: The Musketeer
Description: Alexander Dumas' novel is updated with an eastern influence as D'Artagnan attempts to join the king's elite guards, the Royal Musketeers, and find the man who killed his parents.

Title: Charlotte Gray
Description: A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

Title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
Description: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

Title: The Deep End
Description: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.

Title: Nowhere in Africa
Description: A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930s Kenya.

Title: Last Orders
Description: A group of old friends reminisce about their lives over the years after the death of one of their crew.

Title: The Body
Description: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.

Title: The Emperor's New Clothes
Description: During Napoleon's exile on St. Helena, some loyalists hire a look-alike to swap places with the deposed Emperor. While the impostor lives in luxury on the island, the real Napoleon returns to Paris in order to retake the throne.

Title: Love the Hard Way
Description: The story of a petty thief who meets an innocent young woman and brings her into his world of crime while she teaches him the lessons of enjoying life and being loved.

Title: Miss Minoes
Description: A cat who turns into a young woman helps a journalist protect their town from a factory boss with an evil plan.

Title: Mr In-Between
Description: A hitman falls in love with an old friend and starts questioning the meaning of life. In HD.

Title: Failan
Description: A marriage of convenience between a petty gangster and an illegal immigrant he has never met has unforeseen consequences for them both.

Title: Aalavandhan
Description: Nandu and Vijay are brothers, who were abused by their stepmother during their younger days. Nandhu, who is mentally ill, decides to kill Vijay's fiancee as he visualizes her as his stepmother.

Title: Minä ja Morrison
Description: A young drifting woman finds love that is not what it first seems.

Title: Christmas Carol: The Movie
Description: Old bitter miser Ebenezer Scrooge (Simon Callow) who makes excuses for his uncaring nature learns real compassion when three ghosts visit him on Christmas Eve.

Title: Abril Despedaçado
Description: When ordered by his father to avenge the death of his older brother, a young man questions the tradition of violence between two rival families.

Title: Belphegor: Phantom of the Louvre
Description: At the Louvre museum in Paris, the phantom Belphegor awakens and causes electrical havoc. Night guards at the museum start dying, Lisa gets possessed, and Martin tries to help her.

Title: The Caveman's Valentine
Description: A cave-dwelling man sets out to track down the killer of a homeless boy, and bring him to justice.

Title: He Died with a Felafel in His Hand
Description: A nightmare chase through hell in a never-ending, unrequited daisy chain of desire...

Title: The Invisible Circus
Description: A teenage girl travels to Paris in the 1970s trying to find out about her sister's suicide, and falls in love with her dead sister's boyfriend.

Title: I Love You Too
Description: Reza explodes into the boring life of writer Eric, she's unpredictable and intense. After she moves in with him, jealousy and fits of bizarre self-destruction become part of her quixotic moods.

Title: The Trumpet of the Swan
Description: It's a high-flying adventure when Louie, a mute trumpeter swan, is given the gift of a trumpet, and finds his voice.

Title: Rare Birds
Description: A down-and-out restaurateur and his neighbor hatch a plan to lure luminaries to their small Newfoundland town.

Title: Lavoura Arcaica
Description: A young son who ran from his dominant family descends into decadence, then returns to the nest. Tyrannical fathers, incest, fierce family conflicts, and an intense visual style to match.

Title: Onmyoji: The Yin Yang Master
Description: When samurai Hiromasa comes to Seimei, Kyoto's court Onmyoji (a fortune teller in commune with the spirits), to warn of a plot against the government, the two discover that the court's formidable magician, Doson, is indeed planning a coup.

Title: The Point Men
Description: Some time after their botched operation to capture a known Palestinian terrorist, a team of Israeli agents starts to get killed off one by one. Their leader must get to the bottom of things before the killer(s) plan is complete.

Title: Go
Description: Sugihara, born in Japan but with North Korean parents, falls in love with a Japanese girl after changing from a North Korean school to a Japanese school. His boxer dad teaches him boxing - skills used a lot.

Title: The Knights of the Quest
Description: In 1271, five young knights journey to Thebes in Greece to recover the Sacred Shroud and deliver it back to France and into the hands of the royal family.

Title: Warm Water Under a Red Bridge
Description: A down-and-out businessman travels to a seaside town, where he meets a woman with unusual sexual powers.

Title: The Pearl
Description: A poor Mexican diver finds a priceless pearl that will change his impoverished family's future, if he can fend off his own greed and the people trying to take advantage of him.

Title: Inugami
Description: Akira, the young new schoolteacher in town falls for secretive Miki, an older woman who takes care of her family's urn that supposedly holds a forest wolf-spirit, inugami. People soon start disappearing and the town blames Akira.

Title: The Fourth Angel
Description: A man seeks justice after his wife and two daughters are gunned down in a terrorist attack.

Title: Rain
Description: Whilst on a family vacation on the Mahurangi Peninsula in New Zealand, 13-year-old Janey begins to realize that her parents' marriage is on the rocks.

Title: Fast Sofa
Description: Rick loses his girlfriend to his friend when he spends a night with his favorite porn star. He moves out, picks up a weirdo and goes on a wild road trip to find the porn star again.

Title: Life and Debt
Description: Documentary look at the effects of globalization on Jamaican industry and agriculture.

Title: Så vit som en snö
Description: Inspired by real-life Elsa Andersson, this mostly fictional movie tells the story of her upbringing as a farmer's daughter, in the early 1900s, who dreams of getting away from the farm and becoming an aviatrix.

Title: Kanzen-naru shiiku: Ai no 40-nichi
Description: A lonely 40 year old man kidnap a 17 year old school girl and patiently during 40 days - teach her to love him and become his lover.

Title: Fulltime Killer
Description: Two very different hitmen find themselves to be in each other's way. They use all their skill to solve the problem.

Title: Ricochet River
Description: High school seniors Wade and Lorna have spent all their lives in the small logging town of Calamus Grove, a conservative place where change comes slowly. Jesse Howl, a teenager of Native American ancestry.

Title: This Filthy Earth
Description: The tragic story of two sisters whose lives are disrupted by two men. Amidst a landscape of rural hardship and a community consumed with superstition, events unfurl which threaten their sibling bond.

Title: Young Blades
Description: Young Blades follows D'artagnan (Hugh Dancy), a young arrogant swordsman; Radegonde (Sarah-Jane Potts), a clever girl he meets in the woods; and a trio of Musketeers as they attempt to thwart a plot to send France and Spain into war.

Title: Pavilion of Women
Description: With World War 2 looming, a prominent family in China must confront the contrasting ideas of traditionalism, communism and Western thinking, while dealing with the most important ideal of all: love and its meaning in society.

Title: En sång för Martin
Description: Swedish composer/conductor Martin and concertmaster Barbara fall in love. After their divorces, they're happily married. While composing an opera, Martin is diagnosed with Alzheimer's. It slowly changes him.

Title: Emil und die Detektive
Description: Emil goes to Berlin to see his grandmother with a large amount of money and is offered sweets by a strange man that make him sleep. He wakes up at his stop with no money. It is up to him and a group of children to save the day.

Title: Princess Arete
Description: Confined in the castle tower by her father, Princess Arete spends her days watching the world outside her window. Sometimes she sneaks out. Prospective suitors are sent on quests to collect magic treasures to win her hand in marriage.

Title: Anja & Viktor
Description: Highschool sweethearts Anja and Viktor find themselves in a lesser state of love when Anja graduates and gets a job in the city.

Title: W pustyni i w puszczy
Description: Two young children, 14-year-old Stas and 8-year-old Nel, are kidnapped for ransom by Muslim leader called Mahdi.

Title: Angel of Death
Description: The most spectacular Easter celebration in the World. Hosts of hooded Penitents parade through the ancient, narrow streets

Title: Lime
Description: Tanja is almost 16 and angry. In love with Henrik, but miserable. Why? Mother has decided that they shall move to the countryside the very day she is asked to join Henrik's band, Limbo. She hates her mother's shifting boyfriends.

Title: Det største i verden
Description: Petra is driven away by a raging mob after engaging to merry 3 bachelors in her 1800's home town. On her flight toward the capitol, she lies her way into a vicarage. Based upon Bjørnstjerne Bjørnsons famous 1968-novel "The fisher girl".

Title: My Sister's Kids
Description: When a professor in child psychology in Denmark offers to look after his sister's 5 kids, while she's on vacation with her husband, it becomes obvious that he lacks practical experience.

Title: Memórias Póstumas de Brás Cubas
Description: Free adaptation of Machado de Assis's classic. The narrator is a rich dead man, who tells us about his life and times, making fun of both.

Title: Das Sams
Description: One day a nerdy middle-aged small-town man gets an exotic companion who can make wishes come true. Because the creature looks funny and behaves in an obnoxious way, he encounters all kinds of funny and embarrassing situations.

Title: Momo alla conquista del tempo
Description: Momo, a little girl, tries to save the world from the Gray Men who are intent on stealing people's time.

Title: La chambre des officiers
Description: French lieutenant has been mutilated in the early days of World War I, so he is forced to adapt in hospital to a new life.

Title: Gaudi Afternoon
Description: Alone in a foreign city, Cassandra must solve a family's darkest, deepest secrets before she can confront her own past.

Title: The Cave
Description: Psychological thriller. Geography teacher smuggles a case of heroin for a friend.

Title: Stacy: Attack of the Schoolgirl Zombies
Description: Girls surrounding 17 years old are affected by an illness that make her to be 'Stacies': they feel a strange and momentary happiness until they become zombies.

Title: The Old Man Who Read Love Stories
Description: A man is forced to confront a dangerous female jaguar and his own past through the sacrificial killing of the beast he has grown to love.

Title: Eden
Description: Is the story of Samantha and Dov Ernst, American Zionists who emigrated to Palestine. Kalkofsky, a German Jew and bookseller, left behind his family in Europe. He accommodates Silvia, a young revolutionary against British rule.

Title: Weiser
Description: Pawel Heller returns to his hometown after many years, to try to unravel the mystery of disappearance of his schoolmate.

Title: Lalsalu
Description: In this tragic-comic study of religious hypocrisy, a disreputable cleric convinces villagers that their community is home to a famous holyman's grave.

Title: The Hollywood Sign
Description: Three washed-up actors must deliver the most convincing performances of their lives as part of a dangerous plot designed to finance their triumphant comeback.

Title: Karmen Gei
Description: Like every Carmen, Karmen Geï is about the conflict between infinite desire for freedom and the laws, conventions, languages, the human limitations which constrain that desire.

Title: Reisei to jônetsu no aida
Description: A man is studying abroad in Italy, and while he does well, he yearns for his true love. After promising to meet her in Florence, they reconnect after not seeing one another for 10 years.

Title: The Trespasser
Description: Two businessmen hire a hitman to kill their third partner and are then blackmailed by the hitman as he takes over their company.

Title: C'est la vie
Description: Dimitri joins La Maison, a place where people are welcomed for whom medicine can not do anything anymore. There he meets Suzanne, a volunteer who is dedicated to supporting people at the end of their lives.

Title: Daun Haus
Description: The plot is set in modern Moscow, in the 1990s, with "New Russians", Hummer H1 jeeps, bribery, violence, truck fulls of tinned stew as a dowry, etc.

Title: St. John's Wort
Description: A game designer, and his girlfriend Nami, drive out to a decrepit mansion she just inherited, to film backgrounds for a new video game called St. John's Wort.

Title: The Rising Place
Description: The close friendship of two young women, each of a different race, and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war.

Title: Gasoline
Description: Mechanic Stella owns a gas station with introvert Lenni. When Stella accidentally kills Lenni's abusive mother, they try to dump the body. They run into trouble, thugs and cops but stick together as they fall in love with each other.

Title: L'Art (délicat) de la séduction
Description: A man must wait until a fixed date to have sex with the woman he loves

Title: Le stade de Wimbledon
Description: A young woman investigates a dead writer, without ever having published anything. During her journey, which brings her from Trieste to London, she meets relatives and friends of the deceased.

Title: A Partilha
Description: After the death of their mother, four sisters gather to divide their inheritance, and bring back several family troubles.

Title: Yingxiong Zheng Chengong
Description: The story is set in the mid-17th century, when most of China is conquered by the Manchu-led Qing dynasty after the collapse of the Ming dynasty. Ming remnants have fled south and established a Southern Ming regime based in Fujian.

Title: Bufo & Spallanzani
Description: Ivan Canabrava is a detective in a Pan-American insurance company and is investigating the case of a landowner who dies shortly after taking out a 1 million dollar insurance policy.

Title: Mon père, il m'a sauvé la vie
Description: Joe, international poker player, is considered an irresponsible family-chief. His two sons drifted into gangsterism. The older dies from it. The younger, Manu, was sentenced to death. Joe takes on to a terrific battle in order to save his son. Will he succeed in it? For life has more than one trick in its well-worn sleeve.

Title: Dupa-amiaza unui tortionar
Description: A young journalist interviews a man who was a torturer during the early days of the communist regime in Romania.

Title: Off to the Revolution by a 2CV
Te quiero
Description: Jean and Sylvia left France with a stolen diamond to start a new life in South America. They land in Lima to live their passion. But the diamond is not easy to sell. They meet a French couple and hope to sell them the stolen diamond.

Title: Amar y morir en Sevilla (Don Juan Tenorio)
From the Queen to the Chief Executive
Description: In the ex British colony Hong Kong, young offenders unlimitedly had been prisoned for their committed crimes before their term of imprisonment is settled. The lawmaker Liang Zhongqin helps these young offenders.

Title: Anita no perd el tren
Description: Anita has been working at a cinema box office for almost three decades, but the building is demolished to give way to a cinema complex, and she is forced into early retirement because she does not fit into the new company's image.

Title: Ndeysaan
Description: Mythical story about a fishing village on the south coast of Senegal. Two men in the village are both in love with the same beautiful girl.

Title: Uma Vida em Segredo
Description: Young girl, born and raised in an isolated farm, is brought to a small town to live with her cousins, her only relatives. Once in town, she encounters great difficulty adapting to city life.

Title: A House with a View of the Sea
Netto Perde Sua Alma
Description: The story of a man that invented a country.

Title: Klassikko
Description: A self-loving fictional autobiography of author Kari Hotakainen

Title: La bête de miséricorde
Description: After a car accident, Jean Mardet ends the agony of his wife with a rock. Mardet then keeps killing because he believes that God himself has entrusted a mission to him: kill the unfortunate souls.

Title: Lo strano caso del signor Kappa
Elvis Is Alive
Description: Elvis Presley is alive and well and living in Paris, earning a living as an Elvis impersonator.

Title: La plage noire
Description: After a period of dictatorial rule, an imaginary country finds itself in the middle of learning democracy. A., a fervent supporter of this new freedom, finds himself threatened with death by members of the old regime.

Title: Morabbaye shirin
Description: The doors of the jam produced by a company do not open. In order for them to be able to sell their jam, they reward the one who can open the jam. All the people try to open the door of the jam.

Title: Sekai no owari to iu na no zakkaten
American Psycho
Description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Title: Battle Royale
Description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

Title: The Perfect Storm
Description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Title: The Beach
Description: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

Title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
Description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Title: The Little Vampire
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Title: High Fidelity
Description: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Title: Chocolat
Description: A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

Title: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
Description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Title: Battlefield Earth
Description: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Description: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

Title: Pay It Forward
Description: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

Title: Where the Heart Is
Description: A pregnant seventeen-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Walmart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

Title: Wonder Boys
Description: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

Title: Shaft
Description: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

Title: Bless the Child
Description: Cody, a little girl abandoned by her mother and raised by her aunt, a nurse, is kidnapped. The girl's guardian, aided by an F.B.I. agent, learn that Cody has supernatural abilities, and the abductees are a Satanic cult willing to do anything to gain them.

Title: Get Carter
Description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

Title: Under Suspicion
Description: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

Title: Left Behind: The Movie
Description: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

Title: Joint Security Area
Description: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

Title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
Description: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

Title: The Guilty
Description: A young person gets hired to kill someone completely unknown, by someone equally unknown. Or is that true? Nothing is what it seems.

Title: All the Pretty Horses
Description: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

Title: The Crimson Rivers
Description: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

Title: Pollock
Description: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

Title: Faust
Description: A man sells his soul to the devil in order to gain superpowers and avenge the brutal death of his girlfriend. When he realizes that the price is the soul of his new love interest, he turns on the devil.

Title: Werckmeister Harmonies
Description: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

Title: The House of Mirth
Description: A woman risks losing her chance of happiness with the only man she has ever loved.

Title: My Dog Skip
Description: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

Title: Waking the Dead
Description: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

Title: The Weight of Water
Description: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.

Title: La fidélité
Description: A talented photographer who lands a lucrative job in Paris with a scandal-mongering tabloid and becomes romantically involved with an eccentric children's book publisher while resisting the sexual advances of another photographer.

Title: Animal Factory
Description: A young man goes to prison and a tough, older convict takes him under his wing as a mentor.

Title: The Claim
Description: A prospector who sold his wife and infant daughter in exchange for a mining claim, tries desperately to win them back as he helps to build the Pacific Railroad with a group of pioneer friends.

Title: Skipped Parts
Description: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

Title: Sade
Description: A man prepares himself to be transferred to a detention center and rest home where he will relive one more time the highlights of his youth.

Title: The Golden Bowl
Description: A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.

Title: Devils on the Doorstep
Description: Villagers in World War II China are unsure what to do with the two enemy prisoners who have been left in their care.

Title: Maybe Baby
Description: A comedy about a couple (Hugh Laurie and Joely Richardson) who are trying to conceive a child.

Title: Complicity
Description: Cameron Colley is a young scottish journalist, with an interest in exposing the wrongs committed by the rich and powerful. Life is comfortable enough but uneventful, until someone starts murdering the people in his articles.

Title: 101 Reykjavík
Description: Will the 30 y.o. Hlynur ever move out of his mother's apartment in Reykjavík? Social welfare keeps him passive but things change when his mother's Spanish friend, Lola, arrives and stays through Xmas and New Year's Eve.

Title: The Monkey's Mask
Description: A lesbian private detective dives head first into murder, manipulation and the consuming power of sex.

Title: Crime + Punishment in Suburbia
Description: A darkly romantic story of murder and redemption, set against an eerily familiar American landscape.

Title: Burnt Money
Description: Nene & Angel and their accomplice Cuervo participate in a botched bank robbery in 1965 Buenos Aires, then hide out from the police in Uruguay while the gang breaks down.

Title: Mercy
Description: Detective Catherine Palmer investigates a series of sexually gruesome serial murders and becomes embroiled in a world of lesbianism and bondage after she becomes obsessed with one of the victims' paramours.

Title: Ritual
Description: A disillusioned filmmaker has an encounter with a young girl who has a ritual of repeating "Tomorrow is my birthday" everyday. He tries to communicate with her through his video camera.

Title: Ivans xtc.
Description: Update on Leo Tolstoy's "The Death of Ivan Ilyich," set in contemporary Hollywood.

Title: Suspicious River
Description: A young married woman (Parker) sells her body, not just for money, to guests at the motel where she works as a receptionist.

Title: Purely Belter
Description: Two teenage boys will do anything to get money to buy season tickets for their local team.

Title: La captive
Description: An adaptation of Proust's "La Prisoniere" (book five of "Remembrance of Things Past"). Set in Paris, France, it is a serious tale of a tragic and dysfunctional love.

Title: El mar
Description: Two young men and a woman who shared the same traumatic childhood experience during the Spanish Civil War are reunited years later at a hospital for tuberculosis treatment.

Title: Priyuralu Pilichindi
Description: An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.

Title: The Luzhin Defence
Description: Two worlds collide when an eccentric genius falls in love with a strong-willed society beauty.

Title: Dead Babies
Description: Residents prime themselves for both a visit from three Americans and a weekend of copious decadence.

Title: A Rumor of Angels
Description: An old woman helps a young boy resolve his feelings over the death of his mother.

Title: Ants in the Pants
Description: A late bloomer, 15-year-old Flo experiences his sexual awakening, relentlessly targeting his gorgeous classmate Leonie. Flos friends eagerly try to help him out. The only problem may be Leonies boyfriend.

Title: Jill Rips
Description: A tough guy goes undercover on a personal mission of vengeance into the hardcore world of S&M, to find out who's responsible for the death of his brother.

Title: Up at the Villa
Description: A widow finds choosing a new husband might not be her choice at all, as the actions of her various prospects confine her freedom.

Title: Playing with Fire
Description: Two young people falling in love while exploring the politics of sexual awakening and social relations leading to a complex web of deceit and understanding.

Title: Divided We Fall
Description: In Nazi occupied Czech Republic (then Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia), a childless couple agree to hide a Jewish friend at great personal risk of discovery and execution.

Title: Held for Ransom
Description: Five spoiled high-school students are kidnapped and held for ransom in a remote swamp area.

Title: Murderous Maids
Description: Based on the true story of two chambermaids (the Papin sisters) of 1930s France who murdered their employer and her daughter.

Title: Prince of Central Park
Description: A young boy sets out to find his mother. After setting up camp in Central Park, he encounters a group of people even needier than himself.

Title: Six-Pack
Description: A few young women are murdered in Paris and as police progress in the investigation they realise that discovering the identity of the serial killer is not enough to bring the maniac to justice.

Title: Rancid Aluminum
Description: Pete in London inherits a company. The ambitious accountant makes a deal with a Russian mafia boss. The Russian wants hard currency and grand-kids but kills his daughter's lovers. His daughter needs an Englishman like Sir Francis Drake.

Title: Gripsholm
Description: The summerly adventures of Kurt (Tucholsky) and girl friend staying in a Swedish castle whilst the political changes in Germany in the thirties.

Title: The Ghost of Greville Lodge
Description: Inquisitive teenage orphan James is invited to stay at his uncle's country mansion. He explores the property and discovers the house holds many mysterious secrets.

Title: Lion of Oz
Description: A circus lion (Jason Priestley) finds himself in a magical land where he becomes the leader of a journey to stop the Wicked Witch of the East (Lynn Redgrave), a task which may lead him to lose a part of himself.

Title: La mécanique des femmes
Description: A man stands before the insatiable desire of women, their sensual instincts and carnivores, their hilarious seduction games, their grace, their rudeness, their needs; love them.

Title: Denti
Description: Antonio is a man who was born with unusually large incisors; his freakishly huge teeth make him an outcast from his peers as a child, and he attempts more than once to break off the offending choppers.

Title: Living the Life
Description: Two childhood friends, now in a street gang, look to their dancing ability as a way out.

Title: The City of Lost Souls
Description: Violent gangster movie with a Brazilian protagonist.

Title: Lázaro de Tormes
Description: A grown Lazaro has to prove to a court that his unlawful ways are not his choice but the only option to escape hunger.

Title: Tinta roja
Description: Alfonso wants to be a writer, but he decides to practice as a journalist. When he is assigned to the crime section of a newspaper, he will witness the dirty world of Peruvian tabloids.

Title: Come Sweet Death
Description: Ex-detective Brenner wants to keep himself out of trouble but several murder cases and his ex-girlfriend Klara finally get him involved. But making decisions is not one his strengths.

Title: La candide madame Duff
Description: Married to a younger woman, Jacob sinks into jealousy, alcohol and violence.

Title: Christie Malry's Own Double-Entry
Description: A man uses the principles of double-entry bookkeeping to settle his accounts with society.

Title: Poor Liza
Description: A beautiful peasant girl is romanced and abandoned by a young nobleman.

Title: Coronación
Description: A lonely man becomes increasingly obsessed with the beautiful teenager he used to help care for his grandmother.

Title: The Law of Enclosures
Description: Story of the same couple, first in their teenage years and then in their twilight years, paradoxically set in the same time during the backdrop of the Gulf War in the Middle East.

Title: Taliesin Jones
Description: A lonely boy, from a broken family, becomes inspired by faith healers.

Title: Tierra del fuego
Description: The chronicles of the Romanian engineer Julius Popper, a nationalized Argentine and one of the principle actors in the genocide of the Selk'nam, one of the indigenous peoples who inhabited the Tierra del Fuego Archipelago.

Title: Srabon Megher Din
Description: The second movie directed by Humayun Ahmed. A village drama interweave around a charming girl, a folk singer, his love interest and the local aristocratic family's involvement, the movie provide with some beautiful songs.

Title: Yeshe Dolma
Description: 'Song of Tibet', displays the last century of Tibetan history by telling the love story of Yeshe Dolma a Tibetan woman, her romance with three men and her whole life. The actors and actress are all of Tibetan nationality.

Title: Lakeuden kutsu
Description: Erkki Hakala returns home from America.

Title: Russkiy bunt
Description: A historical drama based on the novel of the same name.

Title: I Went To
Description: New magistrate cleans up a corrupt town in his own comic Samurai way.

Title: Lijmen/Het been
Description: Story of two con men, Boorman and his younger assistant Laarmans, who are trying to sell companies their non-existing magazine.

Title: It Was an Accident
Description: An ex-con gets caught in the wrong place at the wrong time.

Title: Way Past Cool
Description: Based on the award-winning best seller by Jess Mowry, "Way Past Cool" is a coming-of-age story told in reverse, for it is the story of a group of young black kids and their fight to reclaim their childhood.

Title: Five Seconds to Spare
Description: A young musician travels to London in pursuit of his dreams, but winds up the sole witness to a bizarre murder.

Title: Karafuru
Description: Upon reaching the train station to death, a dejected soul is informed that he is 'lucky' and will have another chance at life. He is placed in the body of a 14-year-old boy named Makoto Kobayashi, who has just committed suicide.

Title: Blinker en het Bagbag-juweel
Description: Blinker, a boy who likes to play a detective, goes looking for the stolen family jewels of a baroness together with his friends Nellie and Sara.

Title: Baba
Description: A middle-aged man raises his son all by himself. He works as the chairman of the labor union and acts the way of putting on airs and cocky style both at work and home. He tries to build good relations with son but it does not work.

Title: Saint-Cyr
Description: Madame de Maintenon rises from humble beginnings to become a courtesan to the royal court and eventually marries King Louis XIV. With the king's indulgence, Maintenon opens a special school for girls.

Title: Hassel/Förgörarna
Description: Roland Hassel meets the dangerous Russian mafia.

Title: Crossfire
Description: A woman with the power to start fires with her mind searches for revenge for the murder of her friend by men above the law.

Title: El astillero
Description: To the ruins of an Argentinean town arrives Larsen as general manager of the shipyard, that is the source of income of that place.

Title: Samia
Description: Samia is the sixth of eight children in an Algerian family living in the outskirts of Marseille. Outside there are all the pressures and temptations of modern France; temptations Samia's brothers are watchful that she resists.

Title: Pleure pas Germaine
Description: After the dead of the eldest daughter, Germaine and Gilles and their children leave for a holiday in the mountains to restore their bond. However, the killer of their daughter also resides in those mountains and Gilles wants revenge.

Title: Telegram
Description: In Jakarta, a young journalist struggling to escape from the confines of familiar obligations, receives a telegram informing him that his mother is dying.

Title: Total Loss
Description: A drifter, the doctor who has fallen for him and a third man who has recently lost his father are involved in a fiery auto crash.

Title: Y decirte alguna estupidez, por ejemplo, te quiero
Description: The adventures of a group of secondary school . Juan, one of the group, falls in love with Sara, the new girl.

Title: Nella terra di nessuno
Description: Beginning of the 80's: a politician is kidnapped and dies of heart attack during an interrogation. Before his death, the terrorists videotape his report on the exchange of money between businesspersons and politicians.

Title: Sulla spiaggia e di là dal molo
Anna
Description: Ambassador Anna leaves her husband in Morocco to go to Denmark and prepare a divorce.

Title: Voci
Description: A woman journalist is involved in a murder and must find the killer.

Title: Total Kheops
Description: A man is murdered soon after getting out of jail. His longtime friend, a cop, sets out to find out who did it and why.

Title: Just Run!
Description: 13-year-old Milio admires his older brother Luis who belongs to a drug gang in a poor Madrid suburb. But after the death of a friend and gang member, Luis himself only wants to get out of the dealer scene and lead a normal life.

Title: To Die (Or Not)
Description: Seven individual stories ending with each character meeting their doom are replayed with alternate endings, showing how one slight shift of events can change their fate.

Title: Pelon maantiede
Description: When her sister is mugged and raped, Oili, a young female forensic dentist, meets a group of abused women who have taken matters to their own hands to make the living in fear and just letting it happen stop.

Title: Estorvo
Description: The journey of a middle-class amateur.

Title: The Boy Who Saw the Wind
Description: A boy has a powerful gift, a war hungery government comes to use him to create a weapon. He learns the origins of his power and units a people to over throw the evil government.

Title: De zwarte meteoor
Description: About the first black professional soccer player in the Netherlands Steve Mokone who played for Heracles. Based on true events.

Title: El inocente
Description: A child worker of the Interior, in the frame of the decade of the '20 and of the myths and popular customs.

Title: The Loneliness of the Crocodiles
Description: A journalist looks for the reason of a young man's suicide. During his research, he talks to the oddest kinds of people and finds out that he himself is not very different from the dead man.

Title: Chimhyang
Description: A young novelist just home from the army, receives notice of an old lover's death. He returns to the lake where they once spent time together, and becomes acquainted with the owner of a local inn.

Title: Elze Is Gilijos
Description: At the end of the 19th century, proud but poor fisherman Jurgaitis gets imprisoned for a crime he did not commit. His beautiful daughter Elze is sent to live with rich German merchant Michael. There she falls for his son Endrik.

Title: Dreamland
Description: A documentary about the temptations of gambling, and the day to day challenges of living in Las Vegas.

Title: Rackelhane
Description: An old man fights to keep the government from building a dam on his fishing river.

Title: The Lucifer Factor
Description: After writing a controversial novel, a preacher struggling with his faith is suddenly thrust in the middle of a spiritual war.
